T02TD1538E:117b-1: shr'i tsa kra samba ro da ya n'a ma mandala no pi k'a /
T02TD1538E:117b-3: dpal 'khor lo bde mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga //
T02TD1538E:117b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1538E:117b-5: rnal 'byor bdud rtsi ro gcig gsol bas rnam par dag pa'i thugs //
T02TD1538E:117b-6: gnas la sogs pa yul du bgrod pas rnam par dag pa'i sku //
T02TD1538E:117b-7: dpal ldan gnas kyi dbus na dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i mchog / bla ma mchog la rtag tu spyi bos btud de phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1538E:117b-8: gang gi rgyud ni de nas shes //
T02TD1538E:117b-9: zhes sogs rdzogs pa gsung che ba //
T02TD1538E:117b-11: rdo rje phag mo de phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1538E:117b-12: lha mo'i phreng bas brgyan cing rin chen sku //
T02TD1538E:117b-13: lus kun la ni rtag tu sa bon gyis mdzes pa //
T02TD1538E:117b-14: 'khor lo la gnas rang bzhin dri ma med //
T02TD1538E:117b-15: rtag tu sdom par sbyor ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1538E:117b-16: padma mchog gi nang na snying po yi ge ae 'dra'i gzhi //
T02TD1538E:117b-17: de yi dbus na dang ba mchog dang kunda dkar po ltar skyes thams cad bdag / thams cad mkhyen cing legs pa rnam dag sangs rgyas gzhi dang lha mo'i gzhir gyur mdzes //
T02TD1538E:117b-18: lhan cig skyes pa dri med mchog tu dga' ba 'dren pa bde mchog dpal la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1538E:117b-19: dpal ldan rin chen mngon brjod ri ni rdo rje thugs kyi rang bzhin mchog gi gzhi //
T02TD1538E:117b-20: gcig tu dpa' bo bzhugs shing sna tshogs mang por spro ba 'byung gnas sgra yi tshul //
T02TD1538E:117b-21: rnal 'byor chen po mchog gi 'khor lo bzang po mang po'i dbus su nges par ngo mtshar yang //
T02TD1538E:117b-22: de ru gnas nas bdag gzhan skye bo la phan sgrub pa'i thabs bshad bya //
T02TD1538E:118a-0: gcig tu thugs ni snying po lhan cig skyes @118a * //
T02TD1538E:118a-1: pa dpe med rdo rje spyod pa'i bdag / rdo rje lha mo phag mo dang ni bla ma mchog gi zhabs la lus kun phul nas phyag byas te //
T02TD1538E:118a-2: dag dang ma dag bdag gis mi shes rtag tu rang yid bde ba skyed pa'i phyir //
T02TD1538E:118a-3: gang zhig bdag gis cung zad thob pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i chog bdag gis bshad //
T02TD1538E:118a-4: ji ltar ba lang shi ba'i blo las d'ur ba'i myu gyur skye ba dang //
T02TD1538E:118a-5: yung ba dang ni phye mar gyur par rdzas rnams dmar por 'gyur ba dang //
T02TD1538E:118a-6: 'khor ba'i rdo rnyed pas ni myur du lcags 'khor 'gyur ba bzhin //
T02TD1538E:118a-7: sems la rol bas rnal 'byor pa ni rnal 'byor rin chen de bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:118a-8: 'dir ni gang gis gzhung mang ba'am //
T02TD1538E:118a-9: nyung ba mthong bar 'gyur ba de //
T02TD1538E:118a-10: bla ma'i skyon min bdag blo'i nyes pa yin //
T02TD1538E:118a-11: gang yang dkrugs dang ma dkrugs lugs 'byung lugs bzlog za ba pa yin //
T02TD1538E:118a-12: rgyud 'di bla ma'i man ngag las shes rang nyid dran phyir 'di bri bya //
T02TD1538E:118a-13: gzhan phan la brtson rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1538E:118a-14: bsam dang bsam med ting 'dzin ldan //
T02TD1538E:118a-15: rnam par mkhas shing rnam par rgyas pa'i zhal //
T02TD1538E:118a-16: rtag tu srid pa zhi bar mdzad pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD1538E:118a-17: thog mar chu dang thod la gtsug tor rdo rje dang /
T02TD1538E:118a-18: bdag po bsnyems par byas dang ming dang rig pa'i dbang //
T02TD1538E:118a-19: mchog tu dga' bar byas pa gsang ba rnal 'byor ma ni ye shes dbang //
T02TD1538E:118a-20: ming btags gyur nas lung bstan dbugs dbyung mtha' //
T02TD1538E:118a-21: dngos grub bsgrub pa'i don du nges par sdom zhes bya ba'i 'khor los sgyur //
T02TD1538E:118a-22: mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dang ni gang zhig mar ngo'i bcu bzhir gyur dang zla ba yi //
T02TD1538E:118a-23: mtshan mo mchod byas bla ma'i zhabs dang dpa' bo la btud nas //
T02TD1538E:118a-24: dag cing gcig tu dpa' bos skye bo kun la phan pa'i don du der ni brtsam par bya //
T02TD1538E:118a-25: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa la //
T02TD1538E:118a-26: dkyil 'khor ji bzhin de bzhin du //
T02TD1538E:118a-27: gang gis nus par rab tu brtag /
T02TD1538E:118a-28: gang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas //
T02TD1538E:118a-29: sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya //
T02TD1538E:118a-30: bsod nams don dang slob mas bskul //
T02TD1538E:118a-31: sngags pas sgrub pa'i don du bri //
T02TD1538E:118a-32: gzhan du rdzas kyi don du ni //
T02TD1538E:118a-33: skye ba bye bar dngos grub med //
T02TD1538E:118a-34: lhan cig skyes don bstan pa yi //
T02TD1538E:118b-1: 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi ni //
T02TD1538E:118b-2: dkyil 'khor bri bar mi bya ste //
T02TD1538E:118b-3: dngos grub don du dam bcas nas //
T02TD1538E:118b-4: bde mchog gi ni dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD1538E:118b-5: gang du'ang mchog tu ma yin zhes //
T02TD1538E:118b-6: nges med don du bdag gis bstan //
T02TD1538E:118b-7: lhan cig skyes byas rnal 'byor ma la myur du gus //
T02TD1538E:118b-8: rmongs pa kun spangs sdig pa kun las grol //
T02TD1538E:118b-9: rnal 'byor snying la spas shing brda yi dngos po goms //
T02TD1538E:118b-10: bde bar 'dri zhing dag pa'i sems ldan rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1538E:118b-11: gang la yod pa'i rnam rtog tshes grangs dang ni smyung ba la sogs med //
T02TD1538E:118b-12: de ni bde mchog byang chub mchog 'di nges par rnyed ;
T02TD1538E:118b-13: / rang yid nges byas rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar ldan //
T02TD1538E:118b-14: gcig tu rnal 'byor kun dang gsang ba kun rig pa //
T02TD1538E:118b-15: de nas cho gar ldan par gcig tu gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas //
T02TD1538E:118b-16: yi ge bdun dang snying po yang ni de bzhin gsung //
T02TD1538E:118b-17: snying rjer bcas pa'i 'od kyi tshogs kyis bdud kyi las 'jig pa //
T02TD1538E:118b-18: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma yi nges par khri phrag gcig tu bzlas //
T02TD1538E:118b-19: rang yid yongs su dga' zhing he ru ka yi bka' thob dang //
T02TD1538E:118b-20: rang bzhin las skyes 'khor lo'i lha dang lha mo'i lung thob dang //
T02TD1538E:118b-21: rnal 'byor pa de brtan par gyur cing dkyil 'khor 'dri la brtson //
T02TD1538E:118b-22: 'dir ni nga rgyal can dang brkam chags sems ma yin //
T02TD1538E:118b-23: dpal ldan ao dya na gnas nas bla ma'i gsung gi rim pa las mngon du //
T02TD1538E:118b-24: bdag nyid dga' ba'i don du thams cad bdag gis smra //
T02TD1538E:118b-25: ji ltar bu ram mngar ba dang //
T02TD1538E:118b-26: me ni tsa ba ji bzhin du //
T02TD1538E:118b-27: de bzhin lha mo dpal chen po'i //
T02TD1538E:118b-28: dga' ba'i ye shes rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:118b-29: de la rol ba lta bu yi //
T02TD1538E:118b-30: dkyil 'khor ltar gyur legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:118b-31: lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bstan dang //
T02TD1538E:118b-32: rdul tshon dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1538E:118b-33: ji srid nad med lus dang ni //
T02TD1538E:118b-34: rnam par mkhas pas brtsam par bya //
T02TD1538E:118b-35: dkyil 'khor gnyis po bsgrub don du //
T02TD1538E:118b-36: de srid he ru ka la brjod //
T02TD1538E:118b-37: g-yul chen mi sdug shin tu 'jigs //
T02TD1538E:118b-38: yi dags mo tshogs 'jigs pa'i sgra //
T02TD1538E:118b-39: 'byung po sha za mo dang ce spyang mo la sogs //
T02TD1538E:118b-40: dur khrod du ni nges par sngon du bsnyen pa bya //
T02TD1538E:119a-0: shin tu shes rab la chags snying @119a * //
T02TD1538E:119a-2: rnal 'byor bdud rtsi myang ba'i chogs mi ngoms shing //
T02TD1538E:119a-3: byams pa'i legs par spyad pas srid gsum dbang du gyur //
T02TD1538E:119a-4: dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs don rab tu brtsam //
T02TD1538E:119a-5: gang zhig bstan dang ma bstan pa //
T02TD1538E:119a-6: de kun he ru ka la gnas //
T02TD1538E:119a-7: 'di don legs par shes byas na //
T02TD1538E:119a-8: 'dus pa la sogs legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:119a-9: bla ma'i legs pa'i zhabs gnyis ni /
T02TD1538E:119a-10: spyi bo'i gnas su rnam par bsam //
T02TD1538E:119a-11: gnas sogs sbyor bas bkod nas ni //
T02TD1538E:119a-12: legs par mchod nas bsam gtan brtsam //
T02TD1538E:119a-13: g-yon pas brla mnan legs par brtan //
T02TD1538E:119a-14: rkang pas rdo rje skyil krung gnas //
T02TD1538E:119a-15: phur bu ri ba sngon rig pas //
T02TD1538E:119a-16: phyogs bcur dra ba khro gzugs kyis //
T02TD1538E:119a-17: lag na da ma ru 'dzin cing //
T02TD1538E:119a-18: rdo rje kha tv'am phyag bsnams pa'i //
T02TD1538E:119a-19: he ru ka dpal zhes bya bsam //
T02TD1538E:119a-20: byang chub yan lag sogs kun gyis //
T02TD1538E:119a-21: legs mdzes de nyid rin chen bsgom //
T02TD1538E:119a-22: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um phat //
T02TD1538E:119a-23: aom gri hna grihna h'um phat //
T02TD1538E:119a-24: aom grihna pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um phat //
T02TD1538E:119a-25: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga p'a na badzra r'a dza h'um phat //
T02TD1538E:119a-26: gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad ces bya bar rtag tu 'gyur /
T02TD1538E:119a-27: tshor ba rdo rje nyi mar rab tu 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:119a-28: 'du shes dpal ldan rdo rje gar te 'du byed ni //
T02TD1538E:119a-29: rdo rje rgyal po yon tan sna tshogs gzhi //
T02TD1538E:119a-30: rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems te ma lus rgyal //
T02TD1538E:119a-31: rang bzhin tshogs kyi snying po ste //
T02TD1538E:119a-32: nges par he dang rdo rje 'di ni legs par nga rgyal thob par bsam //
T02TD1538E:119a-33: mig ni dpal ldan gti mug rdo rje lhan cig skyes pa yi //
T02TD1538E:119a-34: bde ba yid de rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje'o //
T02TD1538E:119a-35: sna ni ser sna rdo rje zhes grags kha la ni //
T02TD1538E:119a-36: mchog tu dga' ba las byung 'dod chags rdo rje'o //
T02TD1538E:119a-37: reg la ser sna rdo rje yul dang yang dag ldan gyur khams kyi dag pa de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1538E:119a-38: rnam pa kun gyis legs gnas mchog tu bde ba'i rnam par rnal 'byor ma chogs rol //
T02TD1538E:119a-39: sa ni dpal ldan spyan zhes grags pa byams pa ltung bar byed ma zhes bya'i lha mor rab tu bstan //
T02TD1538E:119a-40: chu yi khams la gsod byed ma gang rdo rje rigs kyi dngos po snying rje'i sems kyis brgyan //
T02TD1538E:119b-0: me la rno ba'i 'gugs byed ma gnas rlung la gar dbang phyug / nam mkha' la @119b ni padma'i 'od zer bde ba kun mdzad chos dbyings rang bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:119b-1: lus rjes dran pas dag pa'i chu yi gzugs ni mkha' 'gro ma yis rtag tu mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1538E:119b-2: tshor ba'i ming yang l'a ma sgrol ma rlung gi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:119b-3: chos rjes dran byed skye ba ru skyes du ma skyes ma zhes bya //
T02TD1538E:119b-4: sems rjes dran pa'i rang bzhin gzugs can ma de spyan zhes grags //
T02TD1538E:119b-5: 'dun pa rab gtum gtum mig ma ni brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul //
T02TD1538E:119b-6: 'od ldan ma ni dpyod pa sna chen ma ni sems su gyur //
T02TD1538E:119b-7: dpa' bo'i blo ma dad dbang gsungs //
T02TD1538E:119b-8: brtson 'grus dbang po mi thung ma //
T02TD1538E:119b-9: lang ka zhes grags dran ma'i ming //
T02TD1538E:119b-10: ting 'dzin ming ni ljon grib ma //
T02TD1538E:119b-11: lha mo chen mo sa srung ma //
T02TD1538E:119b-12: shes rab dbang por yang dag byung //
T02TD1538E:119b-13: dbang po lngar grags 'di rnams ni //
T02TD1538E:119b-14: lha mo de yi bdag nyid can //
T02TD1538E:119b-15: dad stobs shin tu dpa' mo ste //
T02TD1538E:119b-16: rlung gi shugs ma brtson 'grus so //
T02TD1538E:119b-17: chang 'thung ma ni dran pa nyid //
T02TD1538E:119b-18: sngo bsangs lha mo ting 'dzin skyes //
T02TD1538E:119b-19: shin tu bzang mo shes rab stobs //
T02TD1538E:119b-20: phyag rgya lnga stobs dag par gsungs //
T02TD1538E:119b-21: rta rna ting 'dzin yan lag gyur //
T02TD1538E:119b-22: brtson 'grus yan lag bya gdong ma //
T02TD1538E:119b-23: 'khor lo'i shugs ma rtag tu dga' //
T02TD1538E:119b-24: shin tu dbyangs ma dum skyes ma //
T02TD1538E:119b-25: chos yan lag ni shoondi nyid //
T02TD1538E:119b-26: 'khor lo'i go cha dran yan lag / btang snyoms yan lag rab dpa' mo //
T02TD1538E:119b-27: byang chub yan lag bdun grags pa //
T02TD1538E:119b-28: yan lag 'dis ni rtag tu mtshan //
T02TD1538E:119b-29: rnal 'byor sa yi steng na rol //
T02TD1538E:119b-30: yang dag lta ba stobs po che ste yang dag dag ni kun rtog legs par za //
T02TD1538E:119b-31: yang dag rtog pa legs pa'i 'khor lo ma ste rtag tu sems can mchog phan brtson //
T02TD1538E:119b-32: yang dag rtag tu sna tshogs mdzes pas brgyan pa'i brtson 'grus chen mo yi //
T02TD1538E:119b-33: yang dag las ni pha rol gnon la mkhas pa de ming khva yi gdong can ma //
T02TD1538E:119b-34: yang dag 'tsho ba nyin re bzhin du mchog tu legs par srung ba 'ug gdong mngon brjod mchog / yang dag rtsol ba rtag tu mdzes pas yang dag brgyan pa lha mo khyi gdong ma //
T02TD1538E:119b-35: yang dag dran pa nye bar spyod pas mdzes pa phag gdong zhes bya nyid //
T02TD1538E:120a-0: lha mo 'di dag thams cad rnam pa kun gyi @120a * //
T02TD1538E:120a-1: mchog ldan rang gi las la mkhas pa'o //
T02TD1538E:120a-2: bsod nams ma skyes bskyed pa gshin rje brtan mar gyur pa nyid //
T02TD1538E:120a-3: dpag tu med par rtag tu bsod nams bskyed pa srung ba gshin rje pho nya mo'o //
T02TD1538E:120a-4: ma skyes pa yi sdig pa spang ba gshin rje mi che bar rab tu grags //
T02TD1538E:120a-5: skyes pa'i sdig pa spong ba gshin rje 'joms mar gsungs //
T02TD1538E:120a-7: ting 'dzin yang dag rang bzhin dpal ldan phag mor shin tu legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:120a-8: sum cu drug tu 'byung ba yi //
T02TD1538E:120a-9: byang chub yan lag de yis rdzogs //
T02TD1538E:120a-10: so dang sen mo'i phyogs su mgon po thod pa'i dum bu ste //
T02TD1538E:120a-11: thog mar chen po keng rus mtha' ni skra dang spu ru byung //
T02TD1538E:120a-12: grub pa'i dpa' bo rkang rus pags pa dri ma rnam dag sha la 'jigs pa'i mche bar gyur //
T02TD1538E:120a-13: dpe med ro yi rang bzhin chad dgra dpag med yon tan rnam 'gyur dpag med 'od ni rus par byung //
T02TD1538E:120a-14: yid la byas pa'i snying ni rdo rje 'od kyi rang bzhin dri med snying gi phyogs su rdo rje lus su gyur //
T02TD1538E:120a-15: mig la myu gu can dgod mkhris pa la ni ral can gnas //
T02TD1538E:120a-16: glo ba la ni dpa' bo chen po rgyu mar h'um mdzad mdzes //
T02TD1538E:120a-17: gnye mar shin tu rab tu bzang po grod par rdo rje bzang //
T02TD1538E:120a-18: 'jigs byed bshad pa'i lam ste mig mi bzang ni mdoms par mdzes //
T02TD1538E:120a-19: bad kan stobs po che ste rin chen rdo rje rnag la bsam //
T02TD1538E:120a-20: khrag la rta mgrin nam mkha'i snying po rdul du gyur //
T02TD1538E:120a-21: tshil la he ru ka dpal mchi mar padma gar //
T02TD1538E:120a-22: mchil mar mgon po rnam snang mdzad de snabs la dang po'i sangs rgyas gyur //
T02TD1538E:120a-23: brtan pa dpa' bor yang dag gsungs //
T02TD1538E:120a-24: rnal 'byor ma ni g-yo bar gnas //
T02TD1538E:120a-25: gnyis po sdud par gyur pa ni //
T02TD1538E:120a-26: he ru ka yi yan lag gsungs /
T02TD1538E:120a-27: snying ga'i dbus der rdo rje mgon po h'um yig 'od dang ldan //
T02TD1538E:120a-28: spros pa'i 'od kyis gsal bar bsams nas cho ga bzhin du dang por rdo rje ldan pa'i phur bu sogs dbus su //
T02TD1538E:120a-29: snying ga mgo bo spyi gtsug phrag pa mig dang yan lag kun te yan lag drug / dgod byas dpe med bde mchog ces bya'i gzi rab 'bar ba gsungs //
T02TD1538E:120a-30: dang po dang ni snang mdzad nyid dang padma gar dbang che //
T02TD1538E:120b-0: he ru ka dang rdo rje nyi ma yan lag drug la @120b rta dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:120b-1: aom ha na ma hi sv'a h'a hu bo shat he h'um h'um ho phat ham //
T02TD1538E:120b-2: lte bar phag mo gshin rje ma ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba can te snying gar rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:120b-3: kha la gti mug pa ste mgo bor shin tu mdzes pa'i skyod byed ma'o //
T02TD1538E:120b-4: spyi gtsug dbus su skrag byed ma ni 'jigs pa'i gzugs can 'bar ba'i me dang 'dra //
T02TD1538E:120b-5: yan lag kun gyi phyogs su gtum mo lus la mchog tu brgyan pa'i sngags ni lus kyi go cha'o //
T02TD1538E:120b-6: aom bam ham yom hrim mom hrem hrim h'um h'um phat phat //
T02TD1538E:120b-7: snying po'i gsang sngags bzhi ni lhan cig skyes gyur rtag tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin sems //
T02TD1538E:120b-8: rnam kun gcig tu snying po 'phro ba'i sprin mkha' 'gro yi dra bar rol //
T02TD1538E:120b-9: rtog dang rtog med las grol thub pa'i yon tan skyes shing bde mchog ces bya shin tu legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:120b-10: blo bzang pos ni rdo rje mchog gi kha dang lte ba snying ga klad par bsam par bya //
T02TD1538E:120b-11: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra brna n'i ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1538E:120b-12: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1538E:120b-13: aom hri: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:120b-14: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:120b-15: d'a ki nn'i dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD1538E:120b-16: shar gyi zhal du mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD1538E:120b-17: g-yon pa'i zhal du l'a ma'o //
T02TD1538E:120b-18: rgyab kyi zhal du dum skyes ma //
T02TD1538E:120b-19: lho yi zhal du gzugs can ma'o //
T02TD1538E:120b-20: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin mchog tu bde byed rtag pa la sogs rang bzhin can /
T02TD1538E:120b-21: thod pa bzhi po gang zhig bdud rtsi rang bzhin ldan zhing stong nyid las byung sna tshogs pa //
T02TD1538E:120b-22: dga' kun gcig tu snying pos gsum skyes padma'i lte ba'i phyogs //
T02TD1538E:120b-23: de yang rtag tu rang bzhin las skyes gcig tu dpa' bo sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dgod //
T02TD1538E:120b-24: bu ste mgo bor rab gtum mo ni thod par ldan pa spyi gtsug tu //
T02TD1538E:120b-25: dz'a landha ra zhes byar keng rus chen po dang ni gtum mig bzhugs /
T02TD1538E:120b-26: ao ste rna ba g-yas pa ao rgyan zhes bya bar //
T02TD1538E:120b-27: keng rus dang bcas 'od ldan ma dang aa ni aar bu der gnas pa //
T02TD1538E:120b-28: mche ba rnam par gtsigs dang sna chen ma ni rgyab kyi tshigs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:120b-29: 'di ni stan gyi rnam par dgod pa bde mchog nang nas gsungs //
T02TD1538E:120b-30: go ste rna ba g-yon pa go d'a b'a ri zhes bya bar //
T02TD1538E:120b-31: dpa' bo'i blo ma dang ldan chang la dpa' bo legs par bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:121a-0: smin ma'i dbus su r'a ste r'a me sh'a rar legs @121a * //
T02TD1538E:121a-2: 'od dpag med dang ldan pa'i mi thung ma ni khro bo'i gzugs can ma'o //
T02TD1538E:121a-3: de ste mig gi phyogs su de b'i ko ta ri rnam gnas pa //
T02TD1538E:121a-4: dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'od dang langka'i dbang phyug yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:121a-5: m'a ste dpung pa'i rtsa bar m'a la bar grags shin tu legs gnas pa //
T02TD1538E:121a-6: rdo rje lus dang shing grib ma ste nye ba'i gnas su rab tu grags //
T02TD1538E:121a-7: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin gyi //
T02TD1538E:121a-8: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:121a-9: mkha' spyod ces pa'i 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1538E:121a-10: 'khor lo bde mchog las rab bstan //
T02TD1538E:121a-11: k'a zhes pa ni k'a ma r'u pa mchan khung dag la rnam gnas pa //
T02TD1538E:121a-12: dpa' chen myu gu can dang ae r'a wa t'ir yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:121a-13: ao ste nu ma'i phyogs su ao t+yer rdo rje ral pa can dang ni //
T02TD1538E:121a-14: 'jigs byed chen por ldan par bzhugs zhes mngon par brjod //
T02TD1538E:121a-15: tri ste tri sha ku ner lte ba'i phyogs su rtag bzhugs pa //
T02TD1538E:121a-16: dpa' bo chen por yang dag ldan pa'i rlung gi shugs ma legs pa'i gzugs can ma'o //
T02TD1538E:121a-17: ko ste sna yi rtse mor rdo rje h'um mdzad ko sa lar //
T02TD1538E:121a-18: chang 'thung ma dang yang dag ldan pa nye ba'i zhing du rab tu grags //
T02TD1538E:121a-19: ka ste kha yi phyogs su shy'a ma de bir yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:121a-20: rab tu bzang por grags pa bsten par gyur ba ka ling+gar ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
T02TD1538E:121a-21: la ste mgrin pa'i phyogs su lam p'a ka zhes bya bar rnam gnas pa //
T02TD1538E:121a-22: rdo rje 'od dang shin tu bzang mor yang dag ldan pa tsha nod ha'o //
T02TD1538E:121a-23: k'a ste snying gar dgod pa k'a nytsi phyogs su rnam grags la //
T02TD1538E:121a-24: dpa' bo chen por yang dag ldan pa'i rta rna ma ni 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1538E:121a-25: hi ste mdoms su 'bar ba chen po mig mi bzang ni bya gdong ma dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:121a-26: hi m'a la ste nye ba'i tshan do zhes su grags //
T02TD1538E:121a-27: gsung gi 'khor lo sa la spyod pa lha mo 'dzum par bcas pa'i dpa' bo yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:121a-28: dngos grub thams cad rtag tu byed cing lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:121a-29: pre ste pre ta bu ring rdo rje'i phyogs su rnam gnas pa //
T02TD1538E:121a-30: stobs po che dang yang dag ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i shugs ma'i rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02TD1538E:121a-31: gri ste bsang ba'i gnas su gri ha de ba t'a dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:121b-0: dum skyes ma dang rin chen shin tu legs @121b par gnas pa 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1538E:121b-1: brla yi phyogs su rta mgrin shoondi n'i dang lhan cig 'di ni 'dod pa'i lha mo'o //
T02TD1538E:121b-2: soo ste soo r'ashtar rdo rje dra bar ldan ma'o //
T02TD1538E:121b-3: su ste byin pa dag la 'khor lo'i go cha ma nyid dang //
T02TD1538E:121b-4: nam mkha'i snying por yang dag ldan pa gser gling la legs gnas //
T02TD1538E:121b-5: de ni dpa' po'i nye ba'i 'dus pa 'on te sor mor legs gnas pa //
T02TD1538E:121b-6: na ga rar ni he ru ka dang ldan pa'i lha mo shin tu dpa' mo'o //
T02TD1538E:121b-7: si ste sindhur rkang ba'i bol la padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang //
T02TD1538E:121b-8: stobs chen mo dang yang dag ldan zhugs dur khrod do //
T02TD1538E:121b-9: ma ste mthe bo'i phyogs su ma rur rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:121b-10: 'dod pa'i dngos grub kun ster dgyes nyid 'khor los sgyur ma'o //
T02TD1538E:121b-11: ku ste pus mo'i phyogs su ku la t'a ra ni rnam dag pa //
T02TD1538E:121b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen mor yang dag ldan par rtag tu gyur //
T02TD1538E:121b-13: sku yi 'khor lo sa 'og spyod pa'i lha mo rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:121b-14: 'khor lo gsum bkod nang dang phyir bcas gnas par bstan //
T02TD1538E:121b-15: pu la sogs par bkod pa'i dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' dang por brjod //
T02TD1538E:121b-16: padma nyi mar ldan pa'i gdan la rnal 'byor mas ni legs par bsrung //
T02TD1538E:121b-17: yan lag la dgod smra ba slob dpon gzhan gyi gzhung //
T02TD1538E:121b-18: lugs gnyis gang 'dod de blangs nas ni legs par spyad //
T02TD1538E:121b-19: sa bon thig le yang dag ldan par gang zhig kun du gyur //
T02TD1538E:121b-20: de ni 'bras bu yin zhes rnal 'byor pa yis gsungs //
T02TD1538E:121b-21: thig legs kun du khyab cing gang phyir mi 'gyur mtshan nyid gyur pa gang //
T02TD1538E:121b-22: de ni dgar gyur dga' las lhan cig skyes par gyur //
T02TD1538E:121b-23: lhan cig skyes pas 'gro ba bskyed pa bskyed pa'i lhan cig skyes par gyur //
T02TD1538E:121b-24: bskyed pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bye brag 'di ni kun rdzob ces su bdag gis bstan //
T02TD1538E:121b-25: lha mo khva dang 'ug pa'i gdong can dang //
T02TD1538E:121b-26: khyi yi gdong dang phag gi gdong can dang //
T02TD1538E:121b-27: zhal la dgod par gsungs pa zhal bzhi rnam dag pa //
T02TD1538E:121b-28: gshin rje brtan ma dang ni gshin rje pho nya mo //
T02TD1538E:121b-29: gshin rje mche ba ma rnams de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1538E:121b-30: gshin rje 'joms ma dang ldan dgod pa ni //
T02TD1538E:121b-31: mtshams su bzhugs par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1538E:121b-32: pha rol phyin bcu rnam dag pa //
T02TD1538E:121b-33: sa bcu rnams su rab tu gnas //
T02TD1538E:122a-0: @122a * // shes pa bcu yi rang bzhin bdag / bcu yi dbye bas rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:122a-1: stan ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //
T02TD1538E:122a-2: de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin //
T02TD1538E:122a-3: dri med tshul khrims yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:122a-4: nye ba'i stan du rab tu grags //
T02TD1538E:122a-5: zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya //
T02TD1538E:122a-6: de ni bzod pa'i pha rol phyin //
T02TD1538E:122a-7: nye ba'i zhing ni brtson 'grus gyur //
T02TD1538E:122a-9: tshando bsam gtan yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:122a-10: mngon gyur zhes bya'i sa ru gnas //
T02TD1538E:122a-11: nye ba'i tshando shes rab ste //
T02TD1538E:122a-12: de ni sbyang dka'i sa zhes bya //
T02TD1538E:122a-13: 'dus pa rtag tu thabs yin te //
T02TD1538E:122a-14: ring du song ba'i sa ru gnas //
T02TD1538E:122a-15: nye ba'i 'dus pa rtag tu ni //
T02TD1538E:122a-16: mi g-yo ba dang thabs su gnas //
T02TD1538E:122a-17: dur khrod smon lam rtag tu gsungs //
T02TD1538E:122a-18: legs pa'i blo gros sa dang ldan //
T02TD1538E:122a-19: rgyal chen dpal dang he ru ka //
T02TD1538E:122a-20: de ru rol pas legs par bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:122a-21: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa //
T02TD1538E:122a-22: rang 'byung mchog gi dbang phyug ste //
T02TD1538E:122a-23: ston pa dpa' bo kun gyi gzhi //
T02TD1538E:122a-24: rnam pa kun gyi mtshan nyid gcig / sa gzhan dang por tshogs ldan tha mar sprin te rtag tu ye shes mchog tu grags //
T02TD1538E:122a-25: nye ba'i dur khrod 'byung po'i gnas te he ru ka chags bdag gis bstan //
T02TD1538E:122a-26: stan ni sdug bsngal dag tu shes //
T02TD1538E:122a-27: nye ba'i stan ni kun 'byung ste //
T02TD1538E:122a-29: lam ni rtag tu nye ba'i zhing //
T02TD1538E:122a-30: zad pa shes pa tshando ha //
T02TD1538E:122a-31: nye ba'i tshando mi skye ba //
T02TD1538E:122a-32: chos ni 'dus pa nyid yin no //
T02TD1538E:122a-33: nye ba'i 'dus pa rjes su shes //
T02TD1538E:122a-34: dur khrod kun rdzob shes pa'o //
T02TD1538E:122a-35: don dam nye ba'i dur khrod do //
T02TD1538E:122a-36: shes pa bcu yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1538E:122a-37: gnas la sogs pa dag par grags //
T02TD1538E:122a-38: zab mo 'bum gyi mdo las kyang //
T02TD1538E:122a-39: ye shes grags par gyur pa yang //
T02TD1538E:122a-40: sangs rgyas gzugs kyi rang bzhin du //
T02TD1538E:122a-41: 'khor lo bde mchog la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1538E:122a-43: kha dog mtshon cha dang ldan pa //
T02TD1538E:122a-44: lha mo rnams dang dpa' bo kun //
T02TD1538E:122a-45: pu llir la sogs rab bsam bya //
T02TD1538E:122a-46: byang chub kyi chos sum cu bdun //
T02TD1538E:122a-48: sen sogs lan lag bkod pa yang //
T02TD1538E:122a-49: de ni go cha chen por dran //
T02TD1538E:122b-0: lhan cig skyes @122b pa gzhan yin no //
T02TD1538E:122b-1: phyi rol nang dang mnyam ldan pa //
T02TD1538E:122b-2: he ru ka skur yang dag gnas //
T02TD1538E:122b-3: ma skyes pa yi rang bzhin phyir //
T02TD1538E:122b-4: stong pa zhes ni mngon par brjod //
T02TD1538E:122b-5: gang phyir rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir //
T02TD1538E:122b-6: de ni mtshan ma med par brjod //
T02TD1538E:122b-7: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1538E:122b-8: thog mar stong bsgoms de rjes mkha' byas rlung dang me dbus chu //
T02TD1538E:122b-9: gzhi bsam gzhan yang brgya byin rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gzugs su byung //
T02TD1538E:122b-10: de steng rtse mo brgyad dang mtshan pa'i ri rab brtse mor gser gyi rdo rje dang ni gzhal yas khang //
T02TD1538E:122b-11: gcig tu me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes sna tshogs mang po'i ras chen bzang pos gcig tu mdzes //
T02TD1538E:122b-12: dril bu 'phan dang yang dag ldan pa'i sgra yis phyogs su grags shing dril chung snyan pa'i sgra //
T02TD1538E:122b-13: 'khor lo'i rnam pa'i rang dbus kha sbyor gsum mchog me tog phreng bas mdzes //
T02TD1538E:122b-14: phyi rol sgo bzhir rta babs chen po nyid kyis mchog tu mdzes //
T02TD1538E:122b-15: dbus su sna tshogs padma la gnas srid pa las byung rdo rje sngon po chen po'o //
T02TD1538E:122b-16: de'i mthar bde mchog ces grags yul dang yang dag ldan pa 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin can //
T02TD1538E:122b-17: sngon po lta bu'i 'od bzang ldan zhing lte bar byas pa yid ni h'um las byung ba mtha' yas mgon po'o //
T02TD1538E:122b-18: spros pa'i shes rab yan lag sbyor ba phyogs su phyir bzlog gyur nas bsdus te rdo rje mgon po'o //
T02TD1538E:122b-19: sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin srid pa kun dang mnyam pa padma'i dbus su bsgom //
T02TD1538E:122b-20: du ba lta bu'i 'od zer bzang po thog mar gtso bo'i zhal ni zla tshes lta bu yi //
T02TD1538E:122b-21: mche ba ldan zhing g-yon pa'i zhal bzang ljang gu rgyab zhal rnam par 'gyur ba bzang po'i spyan //
T02TD1538E:122b-22: g-yas par ha har dgod bcas hi hi zhes zhi gser 'dra shin tu 'jigs //
T02TD1538E:122b-23: g-yas pa brkyang bas dus mtshan dang ldan 'jigs byed mnan cing dri med mkha' 'gro dra bas rol //
T02TD1538E:122b-24: mgo bo lnga bcu'i phreng bas brgyud pa'i do shal mdzes par 'phyang bas brla nas phrag pa'i bar //
T02TD1538E:122b-25: lus ni phyag rgya drug brgyan mi mog sna tshogs bcings shing dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes //
T02TD1538E:122b-26: cod pan zla ba phreng bas mtshan pa sa steng mun pa sel ba spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan //
T02TD1538E:123a-0: sbyangs par gyur pa'i phyag chen po ni mchog gyur mang po zad byed 'phro ba'i dril bu dag pa'i rdo @123a * //
T02TD1538E:123a-2: gang gi glang po'i pags pa khrag gis brlan pa gyen du 'phyar ba bsnams pas mdzes par bstan //
T02TD1538E:123a-3: g-yas na rno ba'i mdung dang zhags pa mchog ldan da ma ru dang gri gug go //
T02TD1538E:123a-4: g-yon na kha tv'am ga dang padma sa gsum las rgyal zhags pa mgo bo bzang pos mdzes //
T02TD1538E:123a-5: rnam kun rang bzhin srid pa kun mnyam de yi gzugs su rab tu byed //
T02TD1538E:123a-6: phyag na rdo rje ldan zhing gdug pa kun la sdigs mdzub skra grol legs par dmar //
T02TD1538E:123a-7: rab tu chags pas mgrin par 'khyud cing zhal ni khrag gis gang zhing phyag g-yon padma bsnams //
T02TD1538E:123a-8: thabs dang shes rab gcig tu sbyor bas lhan cig skyes bde rtag tu dga' sems rang bzhin can //
T02TD1538E:123a-9: sprin ltar snang ba lha mo'i tshogs ni mtha' yas spro ba lha mo phag mo ste //
T02TD1538E:123a-10: zhal gyi grva yi phyogs nas khrag 'dzag pas //
T02TD1538E:123a-11: yan lag kun la byugs pas mdzes pa dang //
T02TD1538E:123a-12: mgo bo thod dang mgo yi phreng ba dang //
T02TD1538E:123a-13: gcer bu mi yi rus pas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1538E:123a-14: g-yas pa'i byin pas bdag po yi //
T02TD1538E:123a-15: g-yon pa'i brla ni yongs su 'khyud //
T02TD1538E:123a-16: 'khor lo kun bdag sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1538E:123a-17: rnal 'byor pa rnam sems dga' ma //
T02TD1538E:123a-18: rtag tu khros pa phag gdong du //
T02TD1538E:123a-19: bdag gis brtags nas bshad pa'o //
T02TD1538E:123a-20: yang na bud med lta bu'i zhal //
T02TD1538E:123a-21: 'khor lo'i gtso mo bsgom par bya //
T02TD1538E:123a-22: yang na de ni du ba'i mdog / dga' kun mtshan nyid gcig pa yi //
T02TD1538E:123a-23: yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yi //
T02TD1538E:123a-24: rdo rje phag mo bsgom par bya //
T02TD1538E:123a-25: 'khor lo'i dbus rtag lha mo ni //
T02TD1538E:123a-26: gang zhig bskyod pa'i sbyor bas gnas //
T02TD1538E:123a-27: rdo rje phag gdong gtso mo ni //
T02TD1538E:123a-28: skyes pa lta bur byed par gsungs //
T02TD1538E:123a-29: rdo rje pag mo lha mo che //
T02TD1538E:123a-30: lha mo kun dang mnyam ldan pa //
T02TD1538E:123a-31: gtso bo'i gzugs kyis bsgom bya ba //
T02TD1538E:123a-32: bde mchog don du rnam par shes //
T02TD1538E:123a-33: stag gi pags pa'i gos dang ldan //
T02TD1538E:123a-34: spyan gsum rtag tu bsgom par bya //
T02TD1538E:123a-35: sil sil zer ba'i sgra yis ni ;
T02TD1538E:123a-36: / brla gnyis mnyam par khyab pa'o //
T02TD1538E:123a-39: lhan cig skyes rol dur khrod de //
T02TD1538E:123a-40: lhan cig skyes dga' he ru ka / chags bcas 'khyud pa yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:123a-41: 'o byed pas ni rtag tu gnas //
T02TD1538E:123b-0: bskyod pa chen @123b po'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1538E:123b-1: 'khor lo'i gtso bo bsgom par bya //
T02TD1538E:123b-2: zla ba'i kha dog lta bu'i khros pa ste //
T02TD1538E:123b-3: spyan gsum zhal ni lha ru gzigs //
T02TD1538E:123b-4: mche ba bzhi yi myu gus brgyan //
T02TD1538E:123b-5: dam pa'i don du rab tu grags //
T02TD1538E:123b-6: g-yas pa'i phyag na sa gsum las rgyal sna tshogs rdo rje gsor bas 'jigs//
T02TD1538E:123b-7: g-yon na dngos grub zla ba ltar dkar snod ni khrag gis bkang ba bsnams //
T02TD1538E:123b-8: phyag gnyis gtso la 'khyud pas lhan cig skyes pa'i bse ldan rdo rje dril bu 'dzin //
T02TD1538E:123b-9: ban du ltar dmar 'od tshogs mang po ldan pa'i rdo rje lha mo bsam //
T02TD1538E:123b-10: mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang //
T02TD1538E:123b-11: dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma //
T02TD1538E:123b-12: dga' dang bde bas mgu ba yi //
T02TD1538E:123b-13: rdo rje sbyor bas bsgom par bya //
T02TD1538E:123b-14: sngon po ljang gu dmar po'i sku //
T02TD1538E:123b-17: lhan cig skyes dga' shin tu mdzes //
T02TD1538E:123b-18: grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi po //
T02TD1538E:123b-19: phyi dang nang na yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:123b-20: chu dang rlung dang me chen po //
T02TD1538E:123b-21: sa yi rnam pa'i dngos por byung //
T02TD1538E:123b-22: byams pa smon lam m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1538E:123b-23: btang snyoms ye shes sgrol ma ste //
T02TD1538E:123b-24: gos dkar mo ni stobs su gsungs //
T02TD1538E:123b-25: phyag rgya mngon 'byung byed pa mo //
T02TD1538E:123b-26: btang snyoms spyan mar grags pa ste //
T02TD1538E:123b-27: snying rje dang ni mnyam ldan na //
T02TD1538E:123b-28: mkha' 'gro ma sogs rnam dag pa //
T02TD1538E:123b-29: bla ma'i rim las 'ongs pas bstan //
T02TD1538E:123b-30: mkha' 'gro ma sogs gzags bzang ro yis stan byas phyag na padma kha tv'am ga / g-yas pa'i phyag na gri gug dang na da ma ru ldan bsnams shing skra grol spyan gsum pa'o //
T02TD1538E:123b-31: phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan cing mi mgo mchog gi thod 'chang gcer bu'i gzugs can shin tu 'jigs //
T02TD1538E:123b-32: stan la g-yas brkyang bzhugs shing rnam 'gyur zhal mdzad h'um sgrogs dga' ba'i snying po'o //
T02TD1538E:123b-33: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' dang //
T02TD1538E:123b-34: mi ro'i steng na legs par bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:123b-35: dngos grub kun ster bsam par bya //
T02TD1538E:123b-36: lho dang shar dang rgyab dang ni //
T02TD1538E:123b-37: nub kyi phyogs kyi cha ru ni //
T02TD1538E:123b-38: zhal bzhi zhal rnams nyid kyis ni //
T02TD1538E:123b-39: 'o byed par ni rnam par bsam //
T02TD1538E:123b-40: rgyal po dang ni rgyal rigs nyid //
T02TD1538E:123b-41: ma dang pha dang mnyam ldan pa //
T02TD1538E:123b-42: rgyal rigs sogs gzhan blangs nas ni //
T02TD1538E:124a-2: mchod pa bzhi po legs gsungs pa //
T02TD1538E:124a-3: gti mug chen po rnam dag pa //
T02TD1538E:124a-4: mchod pa'i don gyis 'khor lo yi //
T02TD1538E:124a-5: 'khor lo bde mchog dpal las gsungs //
T02TD1538E:124a-6: rab gtum thod pa'i dum bu ni //
T02TD1538E:124a-7: lho yi rtsibs la rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:124a-8: gtum mig ma dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:124a-9: keng rus chen po shar phyogs su //
T02TD1538E:124a-10: 'od ldan ma dang legs sbyor ba //
T02TD1538E:124a-11: keng rus byang gi cha ru'o //
T02TD1538E:124a-12: sna chen ma dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:124a-13: mche ba rnam gtsigs byang du'o //
T02TD1538E:124a-14: dpa' bo blo ma yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:124a-15: chang la dpa' ba bden bral du //
T02TD1538E:124a-16: 'od dpag med dang mi thung nyid //
T02TD1538E:124a-17: rlung gi phyogs su rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:124a-18: rdo rje 'od ldan lha mo ni //
T02TD1538E:124a-19: langka'i dbang phyug ma rtag tu //
T02TD1538E:124a-20: dbang ldan phyogs su legs par bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:124a-21: 'di dag sems can kun don mdzad //
T02TD1538E:124a-22: me phyogs rdo rje lus dang ni //
T02TD1538E:124a-23: ljon grib ma dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:124a-24: thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' spyod du //
T02TD1538E:124a-25: bde mchog las ni 'di dag gsungs //
T02TD1538E:124a-26: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i phyi rol du //
T02TD1538E:124a-27: rdo rje sngon po'i phreng bas bskor //
T02TD1538E:124a-28: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug sngo //
T02TD1538E:124a-29: sangs rgyas tshogs 'phro yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:124a-30: sa srung ma dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:124a-31: myu gu can ni lho ru dgod //
T02TD1538E:124a-32: 'jigs byed chen po dang lhan cig / rdo rje ral can shar du bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:124a-33: byang du 'jigs byed chen po dang //
T02TD1538E:124a-34: rlung gi shugs ma legs par bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:124a-35: nub tu rdo rje h'um mdzad dang //
T02TD1538E:124a-36: chang 'thung ma dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:124a-37: sngo bsangs lha mo legs sbyar ba //
T02TD1538E:124a-38: shin tu bzang po bden bral phyogs //
T02TD1538E:124a-39: rdo rje bzang dang shin tu bzang //
T02TD1538E:124a-40: lhan cig rlung gi phyogs su brten //
T02TD1538E:124a-41: dbang ldan phyogs kyi gnas su ni //
T02TD1538E:124a-42: rta dang shin tu 'jigs byed mdzes //
T02TD1538E:124a-43: me phyogs bya gdong ma dang ni //
T02TD1538E:124a-44: mig mi bzang dang yang dag lhan //
T02TD1538E:124a-45: sa spyod gsung gi 'khor lo ste //
T02TD1538E:124a-46: padma'i phreng dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:124a-47: spro zhing bsdu bar byed pa po //
T02TD1538E:124a-48: rtag tu kha dog dmar por bsgom //
T02TD1538E:124a-49: lhor ni rtag tu stobs chen dang //
T02TD1538E:124a-51: dum skyes ma dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:124a-52: rin chen rdo rje shar du dgod //
T02TD1538E:124a-53: shoondi ni'i sbyor yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:124b-0: rta mgrin byang gi phyogs @124b nyid na'o //
T02TD1538E:124b-1: nam mkha'i 'khor lo'i go cha ma //
T02TD1538E:124b-2: chu yi phyogs su dgod par bya //
T02TD1538E:124b-3: he ru ka dpal su b'i ra //
T02TD1538E:124b-4: rtag tu bden bral du bsgom bya //
T02TD1538E:124b-5: padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang //
T02TD1538E:124b-6: stobs chen po ni rlung gi phyogs //
T02TD1538E:124b-7: 'khor los sgyur dang gti mug che //
T02TD1538E:124b-8: rtag tu dbang ldan du bsgom bya //
T02TD1538E:124b-9: rdo rje sems dang brtson chen mo //
T02TD1538E:124b-10: sku yi 'khor lor bsam par bya //
T02TD1538E:124b-12: kha dog dkar por rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1538E:124b-14: sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid gyur pa'o //
T02TD1538E:124b-15: dpa' bo thams cad phyag bzhi ste //
T02TD1538E:124b-17: da ma ru ni g-yas na 'dzin //
T02TD1538E:124b-18: ral pa bcings pas rnam par mdzes //
T02TD1538E:124b-19: spro zhing sdud pa'i gzugs can te //
T02TD1538E:124b-20: ro yi gdan la legs par bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:124b-21: g-yas brkyang ba dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:124b-22: rus pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1538E:124b-23: phyag na rdo rje dril bu dang //
T02TD1538E:124b-24: lha mo 'khyud la mchog tu brtson //
T02TD1538E:124b-25: gcer bu'i gzugs can h'um zhes sgrogs //
T02TD1538E:124b-26: mgo yi phreng bas nye bar mdzes //
T02TD1538E:124b-27: lhan cig skyes dga' 'khor lor bcas //
T02TD1538E:124b-28: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya //
T02TD1538E:124b-29: dpa' bo kun dang mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1538E:124b-30: bde mchog ces bya rnam par 'byung //
T02TD1538E:124b-31: rab gtum mo sogs lha mo de //
T02TD1538E:124b-32: zhal gcig gis ni mdzes pa'o //
T02TD1538E:124b-33: phyag gnyis dbu skra grol ba ste //
T02TD1538E:124b-34: gcer bu mi rus sogs pas brgyan //
T02TD1538E:124b-35: g-yon na khrag gi thod pa ste //
T02TD1538E:124b-36: g-yas na sdigs mdzub gri gug go //
T02TD1538E:124b-37: thams cad spyan gsum h'um sgrogs pa //
T02TD1538E:124b-38: mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs su byung //
T02TD1538E:124b-39: rig ma'i sked par ske rags te //
T02TD1538E:124b-40: rab tu 'bad nas bsgom par bya //
T02TD1538E:124b-41: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD1538E:124b-42: gdug pa'i khrag gsol ba la dgyes //
T02TD1538E:124b-43: mkha' 'gro ma sogs lha mo bzhi //
T02TD1538E:124b-44: sngon du g-yon du bskor ba can //
T02TD1538E:124b-45: gang phyir 'gro kun g-yon las byung //
T02TD1538E:124b-46: de nas bde mchog las ni gsungs //
T02TD1538E:124b-47: dkar po sngon po mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1538E:124b-48: nges par du ba lta bur gyur //
T02TD1538E:124b-49: mkha' 'gro ma ni sngon por stan //
T02TD1538E:124b-50: de nas mdun du legs par bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:124b-51: khva dang 'ug pa khyi yi gdong //
T02TD1538E:124b-52: phag gi gdong rnams de bzhin du //
T02TD1538E:124b-53: sngon po ljang gu de bzhin dmar //
T02TD1538E:125a-2: rtag tu bden bral mtshams su ni //
T02TD1538E:125a-3: gshin rje brtan ma mchog tu 'jigs //
T02TD1538E:125a-4: rlung phyogs rnam par dag bsgom pa //
T02TD1538E:125a-5: gshin rje pho nya mdzes pa'i shal //
T02TD1538E:125a-6: dbang ldan gshin rje mche ba ma //
T02TD1538E:125a-7: g-yon pa'i sbyor bar gcig tu 'gro //
T02TD1538E:125a-8: shin tu rnam dag gshin rje 'joms //
T02TD1538E:125a-9: me yi gnas su rtag tu bsam //
T02TD1538E:125a-10: rim pa min dang rim pa yis //
T02TD1538E:125a-12: rnal 'byor rgyud la rim min pa //
T02TD1538E:125a-13: rnal 'byor ma las rim pa gsungs //
T02TD1538E:125a-14: lha mo'i gzugs ni gzi brjid chen //
T02TD1538E:125a-15: kha dog gnyis sang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:125a-16: mtshams kyi lha mo mchog 'di dag //
T02TD1538E:125a-18: g-yon na kha tv'am padma ste //
T02TD1538E:125a-19: g-yas na cang te'u gri gug go //
T02TD1538E:125a-20: 'di dag sgo la sogs par bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:125a-21: he ru ka 'khyud legs par bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:125a-22: pu dz'a ao aa go r'a de m'a k'a ao tri ko ka la k'a hi pre kri soo su na si ma ku /
T02TD1538E:125a-23: mkhas pas mgo dang spyi gtsug sogs //
T02TD1538E:125a-24: pu la sogs pa bsam byas te //
T02TD1538E:125a-25: lhan cig skyes dags mdzes pa yis //
T02TD1538E:125a-26: 'khor lo phyi nas spyan drang ste //
T02TD1538E:125a-27: rkang pa mnan cing gyen du blta //
T02TD1538E:125a-28: gyen du pem gi sgra bsgrags shing //
T02TD1538E:125a-29: phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1538E:125a-30: dpa' bo rnam 'byor ma rnams dgug / mdzub mo mdud pa byas pa dang //
T02TD1538E:125a-31: gung mo sbyar bar byas nas kyang //
T02TD1538E:125a-32: mthe bo mnyam par ldan pa ni //
T02TD1538E:125a-33: dpral ba'i phyogs su bzung byas te //
T02TD1538E:125a-34: de ltar phyogs bskor rnal 'byor bas //
T02TD1538E:125a-35: mgu ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bya //
T02TD1538E:125a-36: lhag gnas rang gi 'khor lor bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:125a-37: rdo rje padma mchog dag pa //
T02TD1538E:125a-38: yi ge dya yis lte ba bskyed //
T02TD1538E:125a-39: yi ge by'a las rdo rjer byung //
T02TD1538E:125a-40: sngon du yan lag bzhi bkod nas //
T02TD1538E:125a-41: phyis ni bde ba legs par spyad //
T02TD1538E:125a-42: dang po'i dga' ba dpa' bo ste //
T02TD1538E:125a-43: chog tu dga' pa rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1538E:125a-44: thams cad lhan cig skyes dga' ste //
T02TD1538E:125a-45: legs par bde ba'i thabs su sbyor //
T02TD1538E:125a-46: mtho ris sa steng sogs 'jigs rten //
T02TD1538E:125a-47: skad cig gis ni sku gcig gyur //
T02TD1538E:125a-48: 'khor lo sdom las dka' kun gsungs //
T02TD1538E:125a-49: dpa'o mo gnyis med yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:125a-50: lha rnams sems kyi rnam par snang //
T02TD1538E:125a-51: lhan cig skyes nas 'khor lo'i dbus //
T02TD1538E:125b-0: snying rje che ldan rnal 'byor @125b pas //
T02TD1538E:125b-1: phyi nang bdag nyid mchod pa yis //
T02TD1538E:125b-2: dkyil 'khor khyad bdag legs par mchod //
T02TD1538E:125b-3: sbyin bdag la sogs mi dmigs pas //
T02TD1538E:125b-4: mtha' gsum sbyor bas legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:125b-5: gang du mchod cing stod pa der //
T02TD1538E:125b-6: rgyud rnam las ni mthong ba'o //
T02TD1538E:125b-7: 'di don legs par dpyad nas ni //
T02TD1538E:125b-8: mnyam par bzhag nas dpa' bo mchod //
T02TD1538E:125b-9: dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro mchog gi rnal 'byor ma yis mgul nas 'khyud //
T02TD1538E:125b-10: dku la dpa' bo'i phreng bal legs par byas shing rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs //
T02TD1538E:125b-11: 'khor lo la gnas bde mchog snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis brlab /
T02TD1538E:125b-12: khyab bdag khyod kyi zhabs kyi padmar rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1538E:125b-13: ral pa la ni mi skyod pas mdzes 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1538E:125b-14: sangs rgyas kyi gzhi ru gyur cing dam pa'i don du gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1538E:125b-15: bdag gi bla ma'o blos gsungs pa //
T02TD1538E:125b-16: sna tshogs rdo rje ral ba'i steng //
T02TD1538E:125b-17: de ni dbang bskur bar gsungs pa //
T02TD1538E:125b-18: brtul zhugs spyod pa'i rim las 'ong //
T02TD1538E:125b-19: zur bzhi 'khor lo chen po ni //
T02TD1538E:125b-22: ral gri don yongs grub pa'o //
T02TD1538E:125b-23: khva sogs mchog gi lha mo rnams //
T02TD1538E:125b-24: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bsnams //
T02TD1538E:125b-25: lugs gzhan bsgom par bya ba'am //
T02TD1538E:125b-26: brgyad po ro yi steng na bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:125b-27: khva la sogs pa'i lha mo rnam //
T02TD1538E:125b-28: gsungs pa ji bzhin de yi zhal //
T02TD1538E:125b-29: bdag gi bla ma'i rim las 'ongs //
T02TD1538E:125b-30: rgyu de yis ni bris pa yis //
T02TD1538E:125b-31: gzhan dag lha mo rnams kyi zhal //
T02TD1538E:125b-32: bud med gdong lta bu yin zer //
T02TD1538E:125b-33: rtag tu rnal 'byor ba yis ni //
T02TD1538E:125b-34: lugs gnyis gang 'dod blang bar bya //
T02TD1538E:125b-35: keng rus chen po dang keng rus //
T02TD1538E:125b-36: rta mgrin dang ni glang sna ma //
T02TD1538E:125b-37: bya gsong ma dang rta rnam sogs //
T02TD1538E:125b-38: gsungs pa ji bzhin 'di dag bsgom //
T02TD1538E:125b-39: sna tshogs sprul pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02TD1538E:125b-40: dpa' bo la sogs rab tu grags //
T02TD1538E:125b-41: gsungs pa ji bzhin rnam rol par //
T02TD1538E:125b-42: dpal dan bde mchog 'di dag bsgom //
T02TD1538E:125b-43: sngon du phung po byin brlabs nas //
T02TD1538E:125b-44: ji srid mchod dang bstod 'gyur ba //
T02TD1538E:125b-45: bskyed pa'i dang po'i sbyor ba ste //
T02TD1538E:125b-46: chung ngu'i sbyor bar mngon par brjod //
T02TD1538E:125b-47: ri rab la gnas sa bon rdzogs //
T02TD1538E:126a-2: blo yi dbye bas byas pa ni //
T02TD1538E:126a-3: shin tu sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1538E:126a-4: skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
T02TD1538E:126a-5: ye shes rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD1538E:126a-7: chen po zhes ni rab tu grags //
T02TD1538E:126a-8: rnal 'byor lhag pa'i sbyor dbus su //
T02TD1538E:126a-9: rnal 'byor chen po rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:126a-10: chen po'i yang ni chen po ru //
T02TD1538E:126a-11: rtag tu rnal 'byor kun shes bya //
T02TD1538E:126a-12: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing //
T02TD1538E:126a-13: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas gang //
T02TD1538E:126a-14: dpal ldan dpa' bo kun gyi gzhi //
T02TD1538E:126a-15: rang byung rnal 'byor thams cad rig / dpal ldan smad 'tshong zhabs kyis ni //
T02TD1538E:126a-16: byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs //
T02TD1538E:126a-17: de bas bla ma mnyes byas nas //
T02TD1538E:126a-18: rnal 'byor thams cad legs par brtsam //
T02TD1538E:126a-19: dgod pa dang ni du ba nyid //
T02TD1538E:126a-20: shin tu yid 'phrog pa yi gar //
T02TD1538E:126a-21: sna tshogs kun byed thams cad mkhyen //
T02TD1538E:126a-22: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyis mdzes //
T02TD1538E:126a-23: 'di nyid las ni gang gsungs pa //
T02TD1538E:126a-24: mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang //
T02TD1538E:126a-25: gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi //
T02TD1538E:126a-26: byang chub phyogs dang go char bcas //
T02TD1538E:126a-27: go cha chen por yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:126a-28: thog mar 'di rnams rab tu bya //
T02TD1538E:126a-29: grub na yongs su spang ba dang //
T02TD1538E:126a-30: yi ge gsum gyi cho ga yis //
T02TD1538E:126a-31: grub na de la bkod bya ste //
T02TD1538E:126a-32: 'khor lo gsum gyi rang bzhin du //
T02TD1538E:126a-33: sku gsung sbyor bas dag pa bya //
T02TD1538E:126a-34: aom ni sku yi 'khor lo ste //
T02TD1538E:126a-35: yi ge a'a: ni ngag tu gnas //
T02TD1538E:126a-36: h'um ni sems la rnam dgod pa //
T02TD1538E:126a-37: byas nas cho ga spang bar bya //
T02TD1538E:126a-38: rtog pa'i dbang gis legs byung ba //
T02TD1538E:126a-39: sems can gzung ba'i rgyu yin no //
T02TD1538E:126a-40: yi ge gsum gyi dgod pa 'di //
T02TD1538E:126a-41: de nyid kyi ni gzugs su sbyor //
T02TD1538E:126a-42: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa dang //
T02TD1538E:126a-43: sku yi yi ge skye ba med //
T02TD1538E:126a-44: gsung dang thugs kyang yi ge med //
T02TD1538E:126a-45: nam mkha'i rdo rje rtogs las byung //
T02TD1538E:126a-46: log par gzung bas zin pa'o //
T02TD1538E:126a-47: aom ni thams cad gsal byed do //
T02TD1538E:126a-48: h'um h'um phat dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:126a-49: dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rgyu ru ni //
T02TD1538E:126a-50: ming bzlas pa ni legs par brtsam //
T02TD1538E:126a-51: stong pa nyid kyi sngags brjod cing //
T02TD1538E:126a-52: gnod mdzes rgyal po de bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:126a-53: rab dra ba bsam byas shing //
T02TD1538E:126a-54: rdo rje sa gzhi de bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:126b-0: rlung dang me ni yang @126b dag rdzogs //
T02TD1538E:126b-1: chu dang sa yi dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1538E:126b-2: ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje dang //
T02TD1538E:126b-3: sna tshogs padma yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:126b-4: dpe byad brgyad cu las byung ba //
T02TD1538E:126b-5: de steng zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD1538E:126b-6: zla ba la gnas h'um las byung //
T02TD1538E:126b-7: he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1538E:126b-8: phag mo la sogs yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:126b-9: kha dog sna tshogs sogs kyis brgyan //
T02TD1538E:126b-10: 'jigs byed chen po g-yon brkyang ba //
T02TD1538E:126b-11: sgo skyong rnams dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:126b-12: dpa' drug rnal 'byor ma go cha //
T02TD1538E:126b-13: go cha chen po yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:126b-14: dngos grub kun mdzad dpa' bo ste //
T02TD1538E:126b-15: bde mchog mdzes pa bsgom par bya //
T02TD1538E:126b-16: sngon du yi ge gsum bkod de //
T02TD1538E:126b-17: bzlas pa legs par brtsam par bya //
T02TD1538E:126b-18: 'di ltar dpal ldan bde mchog ni //
T02TD1538E:126b-19: bsgom pa rnal 'byor gzhan dag zer //
T02TD1538E:126b-20: dngos po gang dang gang gis ni //
T02TD1538E:126b-21: mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor //
T02TD1538E:126b-22: des ni de yi rang bzhin 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:126b-23: sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:126b-24: aom na mo bha ga ba te b'i re sh'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-25: aom ma h'a ka lp'a gni sa nan bh'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-26: aom dza t'a ma ku to tka t'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-27: aom dam shtr'a ka r'a lo gra bh'i sha na mu l'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-28: aom sa ha sra bhu dza bh'a su r'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-29: aom pa ra shu p'a sho dya ta sh'u la kha tv'am ga dh'a ri ne h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-30: aom by'a ghr' dzi na aamba ra dha r'a ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-31: aom ma h'a dhu mr'a ndha k'a ra wa pu sh'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-32: aom ka ra ka ra h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-33: aom ku ru ku ru h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-34: aom ku ru ku ru h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-35: aom bandha bandha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-36: aom tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-37: aom ksho bha ya ksho bha ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-38: aom hroom hroom h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-39: aom hra: hra: h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-40: aom phem phem h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-41: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rtsa ba'i sngags so /
T02TD1538E:126b-43: // / aom da ha da ha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-44: aom pa tsa pa tsa h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-45: aom bha ksha bha ksha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-46: aom ba sha ru dhi ra aantra m'a l'a ba la mbi ne grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-47: aom sa pta p'a t'a l'a ga ta bhu dzam ga sa rpam p'a ta rdza ya ta rdza ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-48: aom a'a ka ddhya a'a ka ddhya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-49: aom hrim hrim h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-50: aom kshm'am kshm'am h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-51: gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo'i rtsa ba'i sngags so /
T02TD1538E:126b-53: // / aom ham ham h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-54: aom him him h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-55: aom h'um h'um h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-56: aom ki li ki li h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-57: aom si li si li h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-58: aom tsi li tsi li h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-59: aom dhi li dhi li h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:126b-60: aom hi li hi li h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:127a-1: 'khor lo'i dpa' bo'i rtsa ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1538E:127a-2: ka ra la sogs dpa' mo yi //
T02TD1538E:127a-3: dbang phyug gir grags gzhan dag zer //
T02TD1538E:127a-4: bdag gi bla ma'i lugs nyid kyis //
T02TD1538E:127a-5: dpa' bo rnams kyi sngags su bshad /
T02TD1538E:127a-7: // / aom na mo bha ga ba ti badzra b'a r'a h'i aa pa ra dzi te tree lo kya m'a te bi dye shva ri sarba bh'u ta bha y'a ba he ma h'a badzre badzr'a sa ne aa dzi ti aa pa r'a dzi te wa shyam ka ri ne tra bhr'a ma ni /
T02TD1538E:127a-8: bi sha ro sha kro dha ka r'a li tri te tr'i k'a ma n'i pra bhe da n'i aa pa r'a dza ya bi dza ya dza mbha ni stva mbha ni mo ha ni /
T02TD1538E:127a-9: badzra b'a r'a h'i ma h'a yo gi n'i /
T02TD1538E:127a-10: ka' me shva ri kha ge / ta dya th'a /
T02TD1538E:127a-11: pro tam ge pro tam ge / ha na ha na pr'a n'am /
T02TD1538E:127a-12: kim ki ni khim khi ni dhu na dhu na /
T02TD1538E:127a-14: sho sha ya sho sha ya /
T02TD1538E:127a-15: badzra kha tv'am ga ka p'a la dh'a ri ni ma h'a pi shi ta m'am s'a sa ni /
T02TD1538E:127a-16: ma nu sh'a ntra pr'a bri te sanani dhyam na ra shi ro m'a l'a granthi ta dha ri ni su mbha ni su mphe /
T02TD1538E:127a-17: ha na ha na pr'a n'am sarba p'a pa stva n'am /
T02TD1538E:127a-18: sarba pa shu nam ma h'a m'am sa tstshe da ni kro dha m'u rti /
T02TD1538E:127a-19: dam shtr'a ka r'a li ni ma h'a ma dre shr'i he ru ka / de ba sy'a gra ma hi shi /
T02TD1538E:127a-20: sa ha sra shi re sa ha sra b'a h'a be /
T02TD1538E:127a-21: sha ta sa ha sr'a na ne dzva li ta /
T02TD1538E:127a-22: te dza sya dzva la mu khi ping+ga la lo tsa ne /
T02TD1538E:127a-23: badzra sha r'i re badzr'a sa ni /
T02TD1538E:127a-24: mi li ta tsi li ta /
T02TD1538E:127a-25: he he h'um h'um kha kha dhu dhu ru ru dhu ru dhu ru mu ru mu ru /
T02TD1538E:127a-26: aa dve te ma h'a yo gi pa thi ta siddhe /
T02TD1538E:127a-34: ha ha ho ho h'um h'um tree lo kya bi n'a sa ni /
T02TD1538E:127a-35: sha ta sa ha sra ko t'i ta th'a ga ta pa ri b'a re h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:127a-36: sim ha r'u pe kha: ga dza r'u pe ga:/
T02TD1538E:127a-37: tree lo kye da re sa mu dra me kha le /
T02TD1538E:127a-38: gra sa gra sa h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:127a-39: b'i ra dve te h'um h'um h'a h'a ma h'a pa shu mo ha ni yo ge shva ri tvam d'a ki ni /
T02TD1538E:127a-40: lo ki ni lo ki k'a n'am bandha ni sdyam bi dye h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:127a-41: bh'u ta tr'a sa ni ma h'a b'i re pa ra ma siddhye mi dye shva ri phat h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1538E:127a-44: 'dod pa'i don kun legs par ster //
T02TD1538E:127a-45: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bor ldan //
T02TD1538E:127a-46: gzhan bde mchog las byung ba'o //
T02TD1538E:127a-47: aindra bh'u ti'i rim nyid dang //
T02TD1538E:127a-49: dpa' bo dang ni lha rnams ni //
T02TD1538E:127a-50: phyag gnyis zhal gcig nyid du bstan //
T02TD1538E:127a-51: dza landha ra dpal zhabs dang //
T02TD1538E:127a-52: katstsha pa da'i lugs kyis kyang //
T02TD1538E:127a-53: dpa' bo rnams dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1538E:127a-54: zhal gcig phyag gnyis rab tu grags //
T02TD1538E:127b-0: mkha' @127b 'gro ma sogs dpa' bor bcas //
T02TD1538E:127b-1: sgo skyong rnams dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:127b-2: zhal gcig phyag bzhi rab tu grags //
T02TD1538E:127b-3: khro bo'i gzugs can h'um dang bcas //
T02TD1538E:127b-4: rab gtum ma sogs lha mo rnams //
T02TD1538E:127b-5: kha dog sna tshogs bye brag dang //
T02TD1538E:127b-6: phyag gnyis pa dang zhal gcig pa //
T02TD1538E:127b-7: tsarya pa yi gzhung yin no //
T02TD1538E:127b-8: yang na sems kyi rnam dag pas //
T02TD1538E:127b-9: gcig tu kha dog sngon por gnas //
T02TD1538E:127b-10: dpa' bo lha mo rnams dang ldan //
T02TD1538E:127b-11: gzhung 'di legs zhes kha cig gsungs //
T02TD1538E:127b-12: sku gsum dag pa'i dbye ba yis //
T02TD1538E:127b-13: kha dog gsum du rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:127b-14: gang phyir 'khor lo gsum gsungs pa ;
T02TD1538E:127b-15: / de phyir kha dog gsum du dbye //
T02TD1538E:127b-17: rnal 'byor rigs pas de bsten bya //
T02TD1538E:127b-18: phyag gnyis thog ma nas brtsams nas //
T02TD1538E:127b-19: ji srid 'bum gyi phyag dang zhal //
T02TD1538E:127b-20: phyag zhal mtha' yas dngos grub phyir //
T02TD1538E:127b-21: bsam mi khyab sbyor gyis bsam bya //
T02TD1538E:127b-22: de ltar blo bzang gis shes bya //
T02TD1538E:127b-23: spyod dang bral bas sbyar ba min //
T02TD1538E:127b-24: 'di kun mchog tu dga' ba ste //
T02TD1538E:127b-25: gang zhig bsgom bya de 'bras bzang //
T02TD1538E:127b-26: sngon du gus pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1538E:127b-27: bla mas gsungs pa blang bar bya //
T02TD1538E:127b-28: 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bde mchog las //
T02TD1538E:127b-29: slob dpon kha cig gis gsungs pa ;
T02TD1538E:127b-30: / he ru ka 'byung rgyud las gsungs //
T02TD1538E:127b-31: bde mchog la ni gnas pa min //
T02TD1538E:127b-32: bdag gis ma bris pa des na //
T02TD1538E:127b-33: dpa' bo rdo rje bzod pa mdzod //
T02TD1538E:127b-34: man ngag gis ni phag mo ni //
T02TD1538E:127b-35: 'bar ba'i phyag rgya zhes su grags //
T02TD1538E:127b-36: bde mchog gtor ma'i las dang ni //
T02TD1538E:127b-37: dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i don gyis so //
T02TD1538E:127b-38: he ru ka 'byung rgyud du ni //
T02TD1538E:127b-39: he ru ka yi phyag na gnas //
T02TD1538E:127b-40: dpa' bo'i bdag po'i sngags gsungs gos kyi don gyis stag gi pags pa rnams //
T02TD1538E:127b-41: bdag gi bla ma yis bstan lhan cig skyes pa gos med rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gzugs //
T02TD1538E:127b-42: rtag tu drag po'i dud mdog dkar zhing dmar ba'i sku ni rigs drug bsdus pa'i don gyis so //
T02TD1538E:127b-43: kha dog thog ma 'dra ba'i gzugs te thog ma'i nyi ma lta bu'i zhal te lha mo skra grol ba'o //
T02TD1538E:127b-44: lugs gnyis gyur pa dpyad nas sems la gang 'dod de dag bya //
T02TD1538E:127b-45: g-yas na rtsa gzhan khrag ste myur du 'bab pa me tog ldan pa'o //
T02TD1538E:128a-0: @128a * // g-yon na khu ba ster ba rgya mtsho lta bu de ni dpa' bo'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:128a-1: rkang dang rus pa rtsa dang chu dang lnga pa khu bar ldan pa 'di ni pha ru gyur //
T02TD1538E:128a-2: ma ni pags pa sha dang khrag dang snying dang me dang lhan cig pa ste gang 'di gnyis po dngos grub po //
T02TD1538E:128a-3: mgon po dpal ldan he ru ka 'di bskyed pas bskyed pa gang zhig pha dang bye brag med //
T02TD1538E:128a-4: 'dir ni dpal ldan bde mchog ces bya yon tan kun gyi gzhi ste dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:128a-5: de ltar shes nas de yi gzugs ni sa gsum bde ba ster ba'i de nyid rnal 'byor ba yis bsgom //
T02TD1538E:128a-6: 'byung gnas sgra yi gzugs las ni ;
T02TD1538E:128a-7: / rnam par byung sogs gang shes pa //
T02TD1538E:128a-8: de yi don ni bdag gis bstan //
T02TD1538E:128a-9: rab tu 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD1538E:128a-11: phyi rol rnam pa'i mtshan nyid gcig / dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin te //
T02TD1538E:128a-12: sangs rgyas kun gyis de dag gsungs //
T02TD1538E:128a-13: gang zhig ldog par rtag gsung ba //
T02TD1538E:128a-14: 'khor lo bde mchog la legs gnas //
T02TD1538E:128a-15: de ni lhan cig skyes 'dri dngos //
T02TD1538E:128a-16: rtag tu snying la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1538E:128a-17: phyi nang bdag nyid mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sems la rnam dgod bstan //
T02TD1538E:128a-18: dpal ldan he ru ka rol lus la gnas par da lta bstan //
T02TD1538E:128a-19: rnam dag he ru ka yi yan lag lhan cig skyes gnas mnyam par gzhag / phyis ni rnal 'byor pa yi rim gyis lus skyes rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1538E:128a-20: lhan cig skyes mnyam ma lus phur bu bags pa bcings par rab tu sbyar //
T02TD1538E:128a-21: brtan zhing mkhregs pas bcings pa'i rus pa'i phred ba dra ba'o //
T02TD1538E:128a-22: sna tshogs kyis mdzes sna tshogs phyag rgyas brgyan pa'i sku //
T02TD1538E:128a-23: go cha mkhregs pas dag pa de ni go cha chen por ldan //
T02TD1538E:128a-24: gang zhig dmigs dang bral ba'i rtsa ni sems can kun phan 'dod //
T02TD1538E:128a-25: lha dang lha min mi dang bcas pa 'di kun de yis khyab //
T02TD1538E:128a-26: bhe ram pa yi rlung ni rkang pa'i mthil du shin tu legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:128a-27: lte bar song ba'i 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po'i gzi brjid can //
T02TD1538E:128a-28: lto bar dkar ba'i chu yi gzhi ni yid 'ong gzugs te snying gar dbang pos rnam mdzes ser po'o //
T02TD1538E:128a-29: mgrin pa'i steng na ri bo'i mchog ni brgyad pa dang ldan ri rab ste //
T02TD1538E:128b-0: bdun @128b bskor zla ba nyi ma dbus na 'char zhing nub pa'o //
T02TD1538E:128b-1: padma'i 'dab ma sum cu rtsa drug ldan par gyur pa'i rdo rje'i dbus //
T02TD1538E:128b-2: grub pa'i a'a li k'a li las byung h'um sgrogs mdzes pa'i mgo / der gnas gser gyi gdan ni sna tshogs dbus //
T02TD1538E:128b-3: ming ni dang po zhes bya las ni lhan cig skyes pa dri med zla ba'i 'od //
T02TD1538E:128b-4: yan lag kun gyi mtshams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i rim pa yis //
T02TD1538E:128b-5: bskyed pa'i padma'i sna yis dbus phyogs su //
T02TD1538E:128b-6: legs par bskul bas mgo bo thog ma med par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas skyes //
T02TD1538E:128b-7: sum cu rtsa drug ro dang ldan pa mdzes pa legs par gyur pa'i rtsa rnams kyis //
T02TD1538E:128b-8: mi mthun phyogs ni bzhad par gyur nas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i khams //
T02TD1538E:128b-9: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba zhes pa'i sgra yi don ni de lta bu'o //
T02TD1538E:128b-10: rgya mtsho'i chu ni shin tu rnam par sna tshogs 'gram na ri yi dbang por ldan //
T02TD1538E:128b-11: zab cing mdzes pa'i snying po thog mar grub pa'i dur khrod do //
T02TD1538E:128b-12: rgyal mtshan sna tshogs 'phan dang dril bu'i do shal mdzes //
T02TD1538E:128b-13: gsum du byung ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor de ni lus yin no //
T02TD1538E:128b-14: mchog tu mdzes shid legs pa'i skud pa dang ni rda yab kyis mtshan pa //
T02TD1538E:128b-15: dri ma med pa'i mtshon ni rol pas rnam par dag / bum pa la sogs gnas pa de yi dngos dang ldan pas khengs //
T02TD1538E:128b-16: lhan cig skyes gnas sems las skyes pas bris pa thal ba'o //
T02TD1538E:128b-17: padma la gnas khro spangs shing //
T02TD1538E:128b-18: gtsang zhing brtson pa mnyam gzhag pa'i //
T02TD1538E:128b-19: rnal 'byor ye shes mnyam ldan pa'i //
T02TD1538E:128b-20: sems ni he ru ka ru gsungs //
T02TD1538E:128b-21: rgyud lnga dag gi 'bras dag ni //
T02TD1538E:128b-22: rdo rje zhes su mngon par brjod //
T02TD1538E:128b-23: der gnas sa bon rdzogs pa ni //
T02TD1538E:128b-24: de dpal he ru ka ru brjod //
T02TD1538E:128b-25: shr'i yi sgra ni gnyis med don //
T02TD1538E:128b-26: he ni rgyu dang bral ba nyid //
T02TD1538E:128b-27: ru ni gzugs dang bral ba'i don //
T02TD1538E:128b-28: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o //
T02TD1538E:128b-29: a'a li k'a li mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1538E:128b-30: dkar po dmar bo'i rang bzhin no ;
T02TD1538E:128b-31: / shri yig tu ni legs gnas pa //
T02TD1538E:128b-32: shin tu thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu //
T02TD1538E:128b-33: shr'i yi brda yis brjod pa ni //
T02TD1538E:128b-34: bha ga'i don du mngon par brjod //
T02TD1538E:128b-35: sems ni he ru ka nyid de //
T02TD1538E:128b-36: dpal ldan he ru ka zhes gsungs //
T02TD1538E:128b-37: b'a ni dag lam 'das pa'i sgra //
T02TD1538E:128b-38: r'a ni rdul dang bral ba nyid //
T02TD1538E:129a-0: @129a * // h'i ni rgyu rnams mi dmigs pa //
T02TD1538E:129a-1: phag mo'i sgra ru rab tu grags //
T02TD1538E:129a-2: ral pa'i rtsa ba zhes grags pa //
T02TD1538E:129a-3: bde ba skyed par byed pa'o //
T02TD1538E:129a-4: sna tshogs sems can don mdzad phyir //
T02TD1538E:129a-5: sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:129a-6: byang chub sems ni zla bar gsungs //
T02TD1538E:129a-7: dpal ni bde chen 'khor los sgyur //
T02TD1538E:129a-8: der gnas rtag tu 'dzag pa ni //
T02TD1538E:129a-9: rdo rje padma'i mthar gnas pa'o //
T02TD1538E:129a-10: dus kun yongs su rdzogs pa rgya mtsho'i lam du 'bab pa lta bu yi //
T02TD1538E:129a-11: lte ba'i 'gram du gnas gyur nyi ma bcu drug bsten pa bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1538E:129a-12: stong pa lta bu'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1538E:129a-13: lha dang lha min mir bcas rnams //
T02TD1538E:129a-14: gcig gi rang bzhin legs dag pa //
T02TD1538E:129a-15: sdig mdzub legs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1538E:129a-16: byang chub sems las byung gyur cing //
T02TD1538E:129a-17: yan lag kun la rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:129a-18: de phyir rtag tu dag pa nyid //
T02TD1538E:129a-19: phyi dang nang du gnas par bstan //
T02TD1538E:129a-20: yan lag bcu gnyis las byung phyir//
T02TD1538E:129a-21: phyag ni bcu gnyis rnams dang ldan //
T02TD1538E:129a-22: zhal bzhi rnams su legs bstan pa //
T02TD1538E:129a-23: rnam thar bzhi po dag pa nyid //
T02TD1538E:129a-24: lha mo'i gzugs can mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD1538E:129a-25: dum skyes ma dang l'a ma ste //
T02TD1538E:129a-26: grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi po //
T02TD1538E:129a-27: g-yo dang mi g-yo ba rnams skyong //
T02TD1538E:129a-28: gnyis med rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1538E:129a-29: dbang po la sogs gang 'thung ba //
T02TD1538E:129a-30: de ni gsol ba zhes su bstan //
T02TD1538E:129a-31: phyag rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD1538E:129a-32: sku gsung dag phyir mdung thung ste //
T02TD1538E:129a-33: glang po gti mug rnam par spangs //
T02TD1538E:129a-34: dgra ste zhe sdang gcod pa ste //
T02TD1538E:129a-35: lus dang ngag sems las byung ba'o //
T02TD1538E:129a-36: sems can don gyi gri gug rno //
T02TD1538E:129a-38: rtag tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1538E:129a-39: da ma ru yi sgra ru brtag / rdo rje stong nyid mi tshig pa'i //
T02TD1538E:129a-40: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid //
T02TD1538E:129a-41: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin phyir //
T02TD1538E:129a-42: kha tv'am yan lag la bsnams gnas //
T02TD1538E:129a-43: bde ba bskyang phyir thod pa dang //
T02TD1538E:129a-44: zhags pa yul gyi yon tan te //
T02TD1538E:129a-45: mgo bo tshangs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:129a-46: dril bu shes rab rang bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:129a-47: yi ge lnga bcu rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1538E:129a-48: mgo bo mdzes pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
T02TD1538E:129a-49: yan lag brgyan pa'i mgo yi phreng //
T02TD1538E:129a-50: dngos grub kun gzhi bdag nyid can //
T02TD1538E:129b-0: mche ba bzhi @129b dang mnyam ldan pa //
T02TD1538E:129b-1: bdud bzhi rnam par 'joms pa po //
T02TD1538E:129b-2: zab bar 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i //
T02TD1538E:129b-3: rtag tu so yi phreng ba gnyis //
T02TD1538E:129b-4: pha rol phyin drug rnam dag pa'i //
T02TD1538E:129b-5: phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1538E:129b-6: phyogs kyi gos kyi rang bzhin gyi //
T02TD1538E:129b-7: gzugs su byung ba'i gos dang bral //
T02TD1538E:129b-8: a'a ni kun nas 'gro ba kun //
T02TD1538E:129b-9: li la stod par sbyor bar nyid //
T02TD1538E:129b-10: de nas g-yas brkyang zhabs su grags //
T02TD1538E:129b-11: he ru ka yi bye brag go //
T02TD1538E:129b-12: yan lag g-yon pa bskum pa zhes pa yi //
T02TD1538E:129b-13: tshig tu gsungs pa'i legs par thob pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD1538E:129b-14: g-yas brkyang ba yis kun nas 'khor lo'i tshogs ni dpal he ru ka 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1538E:129b-15: slob dpon gzhan gyi lugs kyis zhabs g-yas bskum par 'dod //
T02TD1538E:129b-16: blo bzang gang zhig kyang ni gzhan du gar gyi rkyang pa zer te bdag ni g-yon par 'dod //
T02TD1538E:129b-17: g-yon pas g-yon pa'i skye bo'i rgyan byas don kun ster bar nus //
T02TD1538E:129b-18: rgyal byed g-yon pas 'tshe ba kun spangs legs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1538E:129b-19: de phyir cho ga'i thams cad dge ba'i g-yon pas gzung //
T02TD1538E:129b-20: gang phyir bde mchog 'dren pas thams cad g-yon pa las byung brtsam //
T02TD1538E:129b-21: sems dang sems med 'gog pa dge ba'i lam du gang zhig brtags pa'i padma la //
T02TD1538E:129b-22: rdo rje'i mtha' las byung ba mnyam zhing ro gcig pa dang mtha' yas pa'o //
T02TD1538E:129b-23: phag mo mchog tu sbyor ba las byung skyes pa gang phyir gtso bor gnas //
T02TD1538E:129b-24: de phyir g-yon ba'i gzhi yis brgyan pa mchog gi lha mo'i bde mchog go //
T02TD1538E:129b-25: zla ba nyi ma rnam dag srid par skyes pa'i rang bzhin ro dang bcas //
T02TD1538E:129b-26: padma mchog tu byung ba ri bo las byung shin tu mnyam par ldan byung khu ba'o //
T02TD1538E:129b-27: de ni nam mkhar 'gro ma zhes //
T02TD1538E:129b-28: sangs rgyas kham su rnam par brtag / nam mkha' kun du spyod grub pas //
T02TD1538E:129b-29: mkha' 'gro ma zhes mngon par brjod //
T02TD1538E:129b-30: des bskyed pa yi gzugs gang yin //
T02TD1538E:129b-31: gzugs can ma zhes mngon par brjod //
T02TD1538E:129b-32: gzugs su skye ba'i rim ba nyid //
T02TD1538E:129b-33: rtogs par gyur pa dum skyes ma //
T02TD1538E:129b-34: gang zhig mdzes par legs brjod pa //
T02TD1538E:129b-35: mi dang bud med sogs par byung //
T02TD1538E:129b-36: mtshan nyid thams cad kun rdzogs pa //
T02TD1538E:129b-37: des na l'a mar rab tu grags //
T02TD1538E:129b-38: bdud kun la sogs rnam par bral //
T02TD1538E:130a-2: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1538E:130a-4: rtag tu 'dod chags dang bral zhing //
T02TD1538E:130a-5: gang du mtshan nyid bzhi sbyor ba //
T02TD1538E:130a-6: rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan //
T02TD1538E:130a-7: de ni dpa' bo zhes su gsungs //
T02TD1538E:130a-8: stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1538E:130a-9: der ni dbang phyug legs par thob //
T02TD1538E:130a-10: lhan cig skyes pa dga' ba'i dngos //
T02TD1538E:130a-11: de ni dpa' bo'i dbang phyug gyur //
T02TD1538E:130a-12: gzhom med dpag tu med pa dga' ba bde mchog 'khor lo de ni sde tshan mtha' //
T02TD1538E:130a-13: rtag tu thur du phyogs pa 'di ni yan lag kun la yid du 'ong ba 'dzag /'dod chags la sogs rtsva dang 'dra ba 'bigs pa'i ye shes kyis zos so //
T02TD1538E:130a-14: rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1538E:130a-15: de ni kun rdzob myong ba'o //
T02TD1538E:130a-16: nam mkha'i padmar nam mkha'i dbus su mkha' spyod 'khor lo rol pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:130a-17: der gnas shing tu rnam par brtags pa mkha' spyod 'khor lor legs par grags //
T02TD1538E:130a-18: bhu zhes pa ni sa'i dbus gnas skyes pa //
T02TD1538E:130a-19: lte ba'i padma der gnas shin tu rnam par brtags pa sa spyod 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1538E:130a-20: sa 'og ces par gang bstan padmar byang chub ltung ba'o //
T02TD1538E:130a-21: phyir rol des pa'i yid ni sa 'og gnas pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02TD1538E:130a-22: chos dang longs spyod sprul rnams kyis //
T02TD1538E:130a-23: he ru ka gzugs legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:130a-24: a'a li k'a li yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:130a-25: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas mdzes //
T02TD1538E:130a-26: aa yig sprul pa'i 'khor lo ru //
T02TD1538E:130a-27: padmo'i nang du legs pang gnas //
T02TD1538E:130a-28: lhan cig skyes pas rol pa yis //
T02TD1538E:130a-29: 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyan du grags //
T02TD1538E:130a-30: aom tr'am hr'i: kham 'dab mar l'am m'am p'am t'am mtshams kyi cha ru'o //
T02TD1538E:130a-31: dbus su he ru ka yi sa bon mchog gi sems ni padmar shin tu legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:130a-32: chos sems padma chen po la //
T02TD1538E:130a-33: stong pa'i rdo rje rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:130a-34: der gnas rtag tu 'dzag pa ni //
T02TD1538E:130a-36: de yi steng du longs spyod la ni phyag 'tshal 'og tu lta ba rtag tu blta //
T02TD1538E:130a-37: a'a a'i lhan cig ao aoo mchog gi rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bor ldan //
T02TD1538E:130a-38: der gnas mgrin pa'i phyogs su ni //
T02TD1538E:130a-39: gang du mkha' 'gro ma rnams rol //
T02TD1538E:130a-40: der ni rtag pa'i dus mchod pa //
T02TD1538E:130b-0: @130b mchog tu dga' bar legs par shes //
T02TD1538E:130b-1: ham ni bde chen 'khor lo ru //
T02TD1538E:130b-2: zla ba lta bu legs pa 'dzag / bgrod dang bgrod pa ma yin pa //
T02TD1538E:130b-3: der ni mig gis mthong ba min //
T02TD1538E:130b-4: tva ri ti na gyen du grags //
T02TD1538E:130b-5: b'a shpa phyogs su rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:130b-6: bi bidho ni dbus su gnas //
T02TD1538E:130b-7: bi shva shtha ni thur du grags //
T02TD1538E:130b-8: rgyu mthun pa dang rnam par smin //
T02TD1538E:130b-9: skyes thu de bzhin dri ma bral //
T02TD1538E:130b-11: dga' ba rnams su rab tu grags //
T02TD1538E:130b-12: chung du 'bring po chen po dang //
T02TD1538E:130b-13: chen po yi yang chen po ste //
T02TD1538E:130b-14: sems kyi dbye bas bzhi rnams su //
T02TD1538E:130b-15: mi la sogs pa rnams su rol //
T02TD1538E:130b-16: padmar sprul pa'i 'khor lo thams cad sems kyi skad cig nges par 'byung //
T02TD1538E:130b-17: sems kyi chos kyi rang bzhin 'dren cing rtag tu sdug bsngal sel ba rnam par smin //
T02TD1538E:130b-18: mgrin par gnas pa'i he ru ka mgon mang po rtog pa thams cad dpyod pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:130b-19: shes dang mi shes spyi bor gnas pa nga rgyal dang bral de ni rnam pa'i mtshan nyid rang bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:130b-20: skad cig bzhi po gang 'di skad cig gcig gis bskyed //
T02TD1538E:130b-21: 'khor lor skad cig de ni gtso bo yin te gzhan ni mtha' yas dngos por 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:130b-22: me tog phreng dang tsandan bud med sogs //
T02TD1538E:130b-23: ji srid bltas pas bde bar gyur //
T02TD1538E:130b-24: de srid dga' bar legs par grags //
T02TD1538E:130b-25: sems can kun la legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:130b-26: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1538E:130b-27: gang zhig sems ni rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:130b-28: de yi sems kyi mtshan nyid gang //
T02TD1538E:130b-29: dga' ba chen po zhes su brjod //
T02TD1538E:130b-30: legs par sbyor las bral ba'i sems //
T02TD1538E:130b-31: bde ba'i mtha' ru legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:130b-32: de bral zhes pa'i ming du gsungs //
T02TD1538E:130b-33: rnam par sel ba bskyed par grags //
T02TD1538E:130b-34: dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang //
T02TD1538E:130b-35: dga' dang bral ba gsum pa ste //
T02TD1538E:130b-36: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin 'di //
T02TD1538E:130b-37: brtan g-yo kun gyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:130b-38: gang de lhan cig skyes de kun //
T02TD1538E:130b-39: bsam gyis mi khyab ces gsungs so //
T02TD1538E:130b-40: tshig med kun song zhi ba ste //
T02TD1538E:130b-41: ye shes he ru ka ru brjod //
T02TD1538E:130b-42: gzhan gdan zhes pa shes rab bstan //
T02TD1538E:130b-43: bdag gi gdan ni thabs yin te //
T02TD1538E:130b-44: 'di dag gnyis med rang bzhin ni //
T02TD1538E:131a-0: sbyor ba'i gdan du rnam par @131a * //
T02TD1538E:131a-2: de nyid bdag ni des bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1538E:131a-3: de spangs pa yi dngos po ni //
T02TD1538E:131a-4: lhan cig skyes zhes yang dag gsungs //
T02TD1538E:131a-5: tshig lam spyod yul las 'das pa'o //
T02TD1538E:131a-6: bdag gi de nyid rtag tu bsngags //
T02TD1538E:131a-7: dkyil 'khor de nyid yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:131a-8: chos dang longs spyod sprul ba ni //
T02TD1538E:131a-9: lus dang rnam par gnas pa'o //
T02TD1538E:131a-10: dmigs pa'i dngos po sangs rgyas te //
T02TD1538E:131a-11: mi dmigs pa ni rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1538E:131a-12: gnas gnyis mnyam par dmigs nas ni //
T02TD1538E:131a-13: shes rab gnyis ni bstan pa'o //
T02TD1538E:131a-14: brtan sogs bcu ni sa rnams dang //
T02TD1538E:131a-15: pha rol phyin pa bcu mchog go //
T02TD1538E:131a-16: nyi shu rtsa bzhi dbye ba yis //
T02TD1538E:131a-17: lus kun la ni rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:131a-18: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'di dag ste /
T02TD1538E:131a-41: pus mo rnams su bdag po la sogs pa skye ba dang gnas pa dang /
T02TD1538E:131a-42: rab tu thim pa zhes so //
T02TD1538E:131a-43: pulli ru ni bdag po ste //
T02TD1538E:131a-44: dz'a landha rang spyod pas gnas //
T02TD1538E:131a-45: ao dya na du ni thim pas gnas //
T02TD1538E:131a-46: stan la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su //
T02TD1538E:131a-47: yan lag kun du thim gyur pa //
T02TD1538E:131a-48: bde mchog gi ni mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1538E:131a-49: sprul pa ru ni skyes pa ste //
T02TD1538E:131a-50: longs spyod pa ru gnas pa'o //
T02TD1538E:131a-51: chos kyi sku yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1538E:131a-52: thim par gyur par som nyi med //
T02TD1538E:131a-53: de ltar sku rnams cha shas kyis //
T02TD1538E:131a-54: bdag po longs spyod thim pa'o //
T02TD1538E:131a-55: gnas su ji ltar de bzhin du //
T02TD1538E:131a-56: skye ba dang ni gnas pa nyid //
T02TD1538E:131a-57: thim par gyur pa'i rim pa yis //
T02TD1538E:131a-58: rtag tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:131a-59: gnas byed pa yi sgo nas ni //
T02TD1538E:131a-61: dpal ldan dz'a landha rar ni //
T02TD1538E:131a-62: skad cig de la bde bar 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:131a-63: bde bar bskyed pa'i bsdus pa ni //
T02TD1538E:131a-64: brtan g-yo kun gyi bdag nyid do //
T02TD1538E:131a-65: de ltar he ru ka phag mo //
T02TD1538E:131a-66: dang po'i sangs rgyas dpa' bor ldan //
T02TD1538E:131b-0: @131b de yi phyag sogs sangs rgyas te //
T02TD1538E:131b-2: lhan cig skyes pa rnam gnyis te //
T02TD1538E:131b-3: bud med skyes pa la sogs brtag / thams cad yul du rab tu bstan //
T02TD1538E:131b-4: nam mkha' bdud rtsi'i ngo bo'o //
T02TD1538E:131b-5: de la spyod pa gang yin te //
T02TD1538E:131b-6: thams cad nam mkha' spyod par de shes //
T02TD1538E:131b-7: thams cad mkha' 'gro dra ba yi //
T02TD1538E:131b-8: snying po bde mchog mchog yin te //
T02TD1538E:131b-9: 'dir ni phreng med bzlas pa med //
T02TD1538E:131b-10: lhan cig skyes par kun du gnas //
T02TD1538E:131b-11: de bas shin tu rtog bral bas //
T02TD1538E:131b-12: gus pa bskyed cing 'bad pa yis //
T02TD1538E:131b-13: 'jigs dang mdzem [?] pa rtag spangs nas //
T02TD1538E:131b-14: rnal 'byor rol bas gnas par bya //
T02TD1538E:131b-15: 'dir ni mya ngan 'das dang sbyin sreg rnal 'byor bsam bya dkyil 'khor la sogs pa //
T02TD1538E:131b-16: bum pa rdul tshon thig skud cho ga lus la lhan cig skyes nas rig par bya //
T02TD1538E:131b-17: gtsub shing gtsubs pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1538E:131b-18: ye shes me ni shin tu 'bar //
T02TD1538E:131b-19: rlung gis bskyod par gyur pa las //
T02TD1538E:131b-20: lte ba'i padma rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:131b-21: du ba rtag tu lha mo ste //
T02TD1538E:131b-22: legs 'bar lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1538E:131b-23: ye shes 'khor lo'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD1538E:131b-24: longs spyod 'khor lor gyur bsregs nas //
T02TD1538E:131b-25: thabs ni rab tu mchod byas nas //
T02TD1538E:131b-26: smin mtshams mdzod pur song gyur nas //
T02TD1538E:131b-27: ao dya na zhes ni bya ba yi //
T02TD1538E:131b-28: gnas kyi sgo nas 'phros nas ni //
T02TD1538E:131b-29: dz'a landha rar rab tu zhugs //
T02TD1538E:131b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsreg / yid kyi shugs ldan lha mo ni //
T02TD1538E:131b-31: mig gis mthong ba ma yin no //
T02TD1538E:131b-32: sangs rgyas snying ga na bzhugs khyab //
T02TD1538E:131b-33: bdud rtsi'i tshogs ni blang byas te //
T02TD1538E:131b-34: 'o ma yi ni rgyun lta bur //
T02TD1538E:131b-35: gser gyi sgo ru rab tu zhugs //
T02TD1538E:131b-36: rkan gyi dbus nas 'dzag pa ni //
T02TD1538E:131b-37: longs spyod 'khor lor legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:131b-39: sngon du sems ni rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:131b-40: tha ma med par legs par bsreg / legs par sangs rgyas mnyes pa ste //
T02TD1538E:131b-41: yang ni 'dod dang ldan gyur nas //
T02TD1538E:131b-42: lte ba'i 'khor lor legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:131b-44: 'ong bar gyur ba de bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:131b-45: kun spyod mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi //
T02TD1538E:131b-46: 'khor lo bde mchog las gsungs so //
T02TD1538E:131b-47: ldog pa yi ni mtshan nyid do//
T02TD1538E:132a-0: @132a * // 'di dag thams cad bdag gis bshad //
T02TD1538E:132a-1: gang gzhan bde ba'i dngos grub ni //
T02TD1538E:132a-2: bla ma la gus de shes bya //
T02TD1538E:132a-3: sna tshogs sngags bzlas rnal 'byor mkhas pas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis legs mchod //
T02TD1538E:132a-4: 'khor lo la gnas bla ma rdo rje dpa' bo'i tshogs dang legs pa'i rnal 'byor ma yi zhabs //
T02TD1538E:132a-5: nga rgyal bcas pas rgyud rnams kun gyi snying po'i gnas ni legs par brtags //
T02TD1538E:132a-6: phyi nas blo dang ldan pas sems can don 'dod rtsom pas dkyil 'khor brtsam //
T02TD1538E:132a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi lha rnams ni //
T02TD1538E:132a-8: bri ba smad 'tshong gzhung yin no //
T02TD1538E:132a-9: he ru ka 'byung sogs las kyang //
T02TD1538E:132a-10: dz'a landha ra sogs pa gsungs //
T02TD1538E:132a-11: 'dus pa la sogs rgyud rnams kyi //
T02TD1538E:132a-12: ming de ci yi phyir na 'gal //
T02TD1538E:132a-14: bde mchog don du bri bar bya //
T02TD1538E:132a-15: slob dpon gyi ni mtshan nyid bstan //
T02TD1538E:132a-16: rgyud las ji ltar bstan par 'dod //
T02TD1538E:132a-17: g-yon pa'i lag na kha tv'am ga gzhan na cang te'u h'um sgrogs pa //
T02TD1538E:132a-18: yang dag ye shes rgyud shes shing //
T02TD1538E:132a-19: he ru ka dpal gsang sngags shes //
T02TD1538E:132a-20: khro med gtsang la mkhas pa dang //
T02TD1538E:132a-21: sbyor shes ye shes pha rol son //
T02TD1538E:132a-22: spyi bo las skyes thod pas brgyan //
T02TD1538E:132a-23: yan lag thal bas rjes su byug / bla ma chen pos slob ma la //
T02TD1538E:132a-24: mchod pa la sogs de dag dri //
T02TD1538E:132a-25: dga' bas de ni smra bar bya //
T02TD1538E:132a-26: bdag gis thams cad tshogs par gyur //
T02TD1538E:132a-27: bza' dang btung pa la sogs pa //
T02TD1538E:132a-28: ras dang lha bshos thams cad ldan //
T02TD1538E:132a-29: dpa' bo lha mo mchod pa'i don //
T02TD1538E:132a-30: bdag gis cho ga byed par nus //
T02TD1538E:132a-31: dpa' bo chen pos de nas 'dir //
T02TD1538E:132a-32: shes rab yan lag gnyis med 'dus //
T02TD1538E:132a-33: he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che //
T02TD1538E:132a-34: 'khor lo kun la rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:132a-35: mdun du gnas pa'i slob ma ni //
T02TD1538E:132a-36: bsod nams ldan zhing blo dang ldan //
T02TD1538E:132a-37: thog mar srung ba byas nas ne //
T02TD1538E:132a-38: de nas sa ni rnam par brtag / rgyud las bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor gnas //
T02TD1538E:132a-39: khro bo'i sbyor bas mnan nas kyang //
T02TD1538E:132a-40: gnod mdzes gsang sngags bzlas nas ni //
