T02TD1538E:132a-41: 'bad pas bgegs ni bskrad par bya //
T02TD1538E:132a-42: slob ma mkhas pa legs par gzung //
T02TD1538E:132a-43: bde ba'i mchog ni mnyes nus pa //
T02TD1538E:132a-44: bde mchog las gsungs bya ba ldan //
T02TD1538E:132a-45: sngon du phag mo la gus pa //
T02TD1538E:132b-0: bsod @132b nams 'dod cing gtsang la mkhas //
T02TD1538E:132b-2: dga' zhing sdug pa yang yin te //
T02TD1538E:132b-3: de dang lhan cig legs par brtsam //
T02TD1538E:132b-4: gtor ma sbyin sogs byin nas ni //
T02TD1538E:132b-5: he ru ka dang gnyis med gnas //
T02TD1538E:132b-6: bla ma dpa' bo legs mchod nas //
T02TD1538E:132b-7: sa bzhi dag pa legs bar brtsam //
T02TD1538E:132b-8: ri phug nags kyis mkhregs pa dang //
T02TD1538E:132b-10: sngon du grub pa'i dur khrod du //
T02TD1538E:132b-11: der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02TD1538E:132b-12: der ni lci ba ma lhung bas //
T02TD1538E:132b-13: dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byung / dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang //
T02TD1538E:132b-14: bdud rtsi lnga dang mnyam ldan pas ;
T02TD1538E:132b-15: / sa de nye bar byug par bya //
T02TD1538E:132b-16: der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya //
T02TD1538E:132b-17: bar ma mchog dang dbugs dbyung dang //
T02TD1538E:132b-18: dri yi chu dang lhan cig pas //
T02TD1538E:132b-19: 'bad pas mnyam par brdung bar bya //
T02TD1538E:132b-20: sa ni mnyam zhing gtsang bar bya //
T02TD1538E:132b-21: dbus dang thog ma gang bstan pa'i //
T02TD1538E:132b-22: lhag ma'i bshad pa yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:132b-23: bla ma dam pa las shes bya //
T02TD1538E:132b-24: des shes gang de bzhin du min //
T02TD1538E:132b-25: shar dang byang du gzhol ba ni //
T02TD1538E:132b-26: sngags pa rtag tu dngos grub 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:132b-27: dbus su mtho bas rgyal srid dang //
T02TD1538E:132b-30: yang na nor ni zad par 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:132b-31: ji skad bshad pa'i shar mtho bas //
T02TD1538E:132b-32: myur du rigs rnams zad par 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:132b-33: dbus su dma' ba'i sa gzhi gang //
T02TD1538E:132b-35: de ltar mtshan nyid bcas pa yi //
T02TD1538E:132b-36: dpa' bo'i dbang po sogs pas brtag / sa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1538E:132b-37: mgul rgyan dang ni gdu bu nyid //
T02TD1538E:132b-38: rna rgyan spyi bo'i nor bu dang //
T02TD1538E:132b-39: mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba ste //
T02TD1538E:132b-40: phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1538E:132b-41: mkha' 'gro ma tshogs phyogs bzhi ru //
T02TD1538E:132b-42: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma bzhag nas //
T02TD1538E:132b-43: rdo rje dril bu phyag na 'dzin //
T02TD1538E:132b-44: rang gi gtso la gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1538E:132b-45: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02TD1538E:132b-46: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1538E:132b-47: chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog / dkyil 'khor bdag po bshad du gsol //
T02TD1538E:132b-48: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD1538E:132b-49: mtshan min thams cad spangs pa ste //
T02TD1538E:133a-0: kun du bzang po sku yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du @133a * //
T02TD1538E:133a-2: / zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung //
T02TD1538E:133a-3: ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba //
T02TD1538E:133a-4: kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog / dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol //
T02TD1538E:133a-5: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
T02TD1538E:133a-6: rang bzhin dag pa dri med pa //
T02TD1538E:133a-7: kun du bzang po thugs kyi mchog /
T02TD1538E:133a-8: dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol //
T02TD1538E:133a-9: gang zhig lag na thod pa dang //
T02TD1538E:133a-10: chang la dga' bas myos pa rnams //
T02TD1538E:133a-11: spyod pa gzugs can rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1538E:133a-12: lha mo chen mo mnyes pa ste //
T02TD1538E:133a-13: khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam //
T02TD1538E:133a-14: de bzhin srog dang rtsa rang bzhin //
T02TD1538E:133a-15: rang lhag lha la rab phyogs pas //
T02TD1538E:133a-16: grub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bsgyur //
T02TD1538E:133a-17: he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che //
T02TD1538E:133a-18: bsams nas bgegs ni rab tu gzhom //
T02TD1538E:133a-19: bgegs kyi tshogs ni gzhan rnams dang //
T02TD1538E:133a-20: gdug pa'i tshogs ni bskrad par bya //
T02TD1538E:133a-21: rkang pa'i 'og tu dgod bya ba //
T02TD1538E:133a-22: rdo rje 'bar ba h'um las byung //
T02TD1538E:133a-23: aam yig mig gnyis shes nas ni //
T02TD1538E:133a-24: zla ba nyi mar rnam par bsam //
T02TD1538E:133a-25: rdo rje dril bu blangs nas ni //
T02TD1538E:133a-26: g-yas na rdo rje yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:133a-27: blo dang ldan pas phyogs kun blta //
T02TD1538E:133a-28: khros pas sems can don la brtson //
T02TD1538E:133a-29: de ru gnas pa'i gdug pa dang //
T02TD1538E:133a-30: bdud dang bgegs dang log 'dren dang //
T02TD1538E:133a-31: de rnams bskrad pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD1538E:133a-32: tshig 'di dag ni brjod par bya //
T02TD1538E:133a-33: gang zhig sa yi bdag po rnams //
T02TD1538E:133a-34: klu dang gnod sbyin dri za sogs //
T02TD1538E:133a-36: sems can don du bya bar brtson //
T02TD1538E:133a-37: myur du 'gro ba nyid du gyis //
T02TD1538E:133a-38: he ru ka yi bka' thos nas //
T02TD1538E:133a-39: myur ba nyid du bor nas ni //
T02TD1538E:133a-40: khyed rnams 'gro ba nyid du gyis //
T02TD1538E:133a-42: rdo rje 'bar ba kha tv'am gis //
T02TD1538E:133a-43: de yi mgo ni brgyar dags bya //
T02TD1538E:133a-44: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um phat //
T02TD1538E:133a-46: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:133a-47: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'an badzra h'um phat /
T02TD1538E:133a-48: dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni //
T02TD1538E:133a-49: g-yon du bskor ba la brtson pas //
T02TD1538E:133a-50: dpa' bo chen po khros pas bskor //
T02TD1538E:133a-51: bskal pa'i me ltar langs nas ni //
T02TD1538E:133a-52: de las byung ba'i 'od sogs kyis //
T02TD1538E:133a-53: bdud la sogs pa thams cad bsregs //
T02TD1538E:133b-0: 'di ltar sems pa'i rnal 'byor dag / h'um sgra bsgrags @133b par gar byas te //
T02TD1538E:133b-1: mya ngan khro dang 'jigs pa med //
T02TD1538E:133b-2: de bzhin drag dang brtse ba gnyis //
T02TD1538E:133b-3: rjes su chags ldan ro 'di dag / dang po zhal la legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:133b-4: mi sdug pa dang ngo mtshar gang //
T02TD1538E:133b-5: 'jigs dang g-yo dang de bzhin du //
T02TD1538E:133b-6: rjes su chags gnas ro 'di yis //
T02TD1538E:133b-7: g-yon pa'i zhal du gyur par gsungs //
T02TD1538E:133b-8: bzhad dang dga' ba dbang phyug dang //
T02TD1538E:133b-9: bzhad pa dang ni sgeg pa nyid //
T02TD1538E:133b-10: rjes su chags nas ro nyid dang //
T02TD1538E:133b-11: de ni nub kyi zhal yin no //
T02TD1538E:133b-12: smod pa dang ni ngo mtshar nyid //
T02TD1538E:133b-13: brkam par gyur pa gang yin pa //
T02TD1538E:133b-14: dpa' bo 'jigs byed gnas 'di dag / g-yas kyi zhal la de dag gnas //
T02TD1538E:133b-15: padma rdo rje dbus su ni //
T02TD1538E:133b-16: gang zhig sems ni legs gnas shing //
T02TD1538E:133b-17: zhi ba de ni legs dag pa //
T02TD1538E:133b-18: lhan cig skyes pa dga' ba'i gar //
T02TD1538E:133b-19: gar ni chos kyi de nyid du //
T02TD1538E:133b-20: shes pa'i gar du the tshom med //
T02TD1538E:133b-21: 'jig rten la phan rgyu yi phyir //
T02TD1538E:133b-23: glang po che yi pags pa dang //
T02TD1538E:133b-24: mdud dang zhags pa gri gug dang //
T02TD1538E:133b-25: da ma ru dang kha tv'am dang //
T02TD1538E:133b-26: thod pa dang ni zhags pa dang //
T02TD1538E:133b-27: mgo bo rdo rje dril bu dang //
T02TD1538E:133b-28: mgo bo lnga bcu'i phreng ba dang //
T02TD1538E:133b-29: de rnams thogs pa'i snang ba'o //
T02TD1538E:133b-30: mgul rgyan thogs shing g-yon pa dang //
T02TD1538E:133b-31: g-yas na gdu bu de bzhin du //
T02TD1538E:133b-32: rna rgyan rna ba la bkod cing //
T02TD1538E:133b-33: g-yon gyi spyi bo nor bu dang //
T02TD1538E:133b-34: g-yas pa yis ni thal pa dang //
T02TD1538E:133b-35: mchod phyir thogs dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:133b-36: bde byed lta bu bya ba dang //
T02TD1538E:133b-37: ri mo lta bu bya ba'o //
T02TD1538E:133b-38: padmo lta bu'i lag byas te //
T02TD1538E:133b-40: ji srid ri mo lta bu yi //
T02TD1538E:133b-41: gar ni rnal 'byor ma lhan cig / zla ba gnyis po mi 'gyur ba //
T02TD1538E:133b-42: da ma ru ni skyed byed pa'o //
T02TD1538E:133b-43: mtshan nyid bdag gis bstan pa'o //
T02TD1538E:133b-44: yongs su ldan pas blta ba'o //
T02TD1538E:133b-45: bde mchog don ni legs mthong nas //
T02TD1538E:133b-46: rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid dang //
T02TD1538E:133b-47: gzhan yang gar dang dngos grub dang //
T02TD1538E:133b-48: dkyil 'khor don dang cho ga bshad //
T02TD1538E:133b-49: de ltar bstan pa ni samba ra'i sgra zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1538E:133b-50: cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur gyis //
T02TD1538E:133b-51: he ru ka zhal 'o byed cing //
T02TD1538E:133b-52: legs pa'i phag mo gang bya'o //
T02TD1538E:133b-53: kun ta zla ba dri med so //
T02TD1538E:133b-54: dmar 'od lta bu h'um sgrogs pa //
T02TD1538E:133b-55: khros pas bgegs kun rlag par byed //
T02TD1538E:134a-1: cig skyes dga' rol pa yis //
T02TD1538E:134a-2: sems can don ni byed la brtson //
T02TD1538E:134a-3: de dang lhan cig dpa' bo che //
T02TD1538E:134a-4: 'khor lo'i sa yi dbus su gnas //
T02TD1538E:134a-5: za ba'i phyag rgya la sogs pas //
T02TD1538E:134a-6: bgegs rnams kun ni bskrad par bya //
T02TD1538E:134a-7: ji srid gar gyi bstan bcos las //
T02TD1538E:134a-8: snying rje'i phyag rgya la sogs pa //
T02TD1538E:134a-9: he ru ka dpal phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1538E:134a-10: de ni dngos grub kun ster pa'o //
T02TD1538E:134a-11: zhal bzhi la sogs sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1538E:134a-12: phur bu ra ba dra ba dang //
T02TD1538E:134a-13: ji bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02TD1538E:134a-14: cho ga thams cad bya ba'o //
T02TD1538E:134a-15: de ltar go bgos bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1538E:134a-16: 'og tu mtshon cha nges par gzhag /
T02TD1538E:134a-17: 'khor lo lhan cig bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1538E:134a-18: steng du mda' ni bri ba'o //
T02TD1538E:134a-19: bdag nyid mkha' spyod dra ba ni //
T02TD1538E:134a-20: de ltar go bgos go dang ldan //
T02TD1538E:134a-21: sum cu gsum pas kyang mi phig / mtha' yi dbyangs yig las byung ba /
T02TD1538E:134a-23: // sna tshogs rdo rje gzi brjid bzang //
T02TD1538E:134a-24: des na rtag tu mi phig pa //
T02TD1538E:134a-25: 'bar ba'i gzugs su rnam par bsam //
T02TD1538E:134a-27: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dgang bar bya //
T02TD1538E:134a-28: yi ge bdun pa bzlas pa yis //
T02TD1538E:134a-29: rdo rje'i lta ba kun du blta //
T02TD1538E:134a-30: sa gzhi dag par bltas nas ni //
T02TD1538E:134a-31: bgegs rnams kun ni rnam par spangs //
T02TD1538E:134a-32: bdud rtsi lnga sogs legs par byug /
T02TD1538E:134a-33: blo bzang gis ni me tog gtor //
T02TD1538E:134a-34: mkha' 'gro ma rnams yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:134a-35: rdo rje sa dbus legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:134a-36: dpa' bo rdo rje dril bu 'dzin //
T02TD1538E:134a-37: mnga' bdag he ru ka bsgom bya //
T02TD1538E:134a-38: 'byung gnas sgra gzugs la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1538E:134a-40: dpal ldan bde mchog 'khor lo che //
T02TD1538E:134a-41: dngos grub sa la brtsam par bya //
T02TD1538E:134a-42: ya sde brgyad pa'i sa bon ni //
T02TD1538E:134a-43: stong bas steng du brgyan par bya //
T02TD1538E:134a-44: de ni lan gsum brjod byas te //
T02TD1538E:134a-45: sa la reg pas sa reg gnas //
T02TD1538E:134a-46: bkug nas mdun du blta bar bya //
T02TD1538E:134a-47: mdzes ma zhes bya'i ma mo ni //
T02TD1538E:134a-48: legs pa'i gzugs can legs gzugs des //
T02TD1538E:134a-49: he ru ka la dga' bas gsol //
T02TD1538E:134a-50: mgon po bdag gis ci zhig bgyi //
T02TD1538E:134a-51: rdo rje can bdag bka' stsol cig / khyed kyi dkyil 'khor don gyis na //
T02TD1538E:134a-52: bdag gis bum pa gzung bar bya //
T02TD1538E:134a-53: ma la sogs dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:134b-0: blo dang ldan pas @134b thod pa gzhag / cho gas mchod pa byas nas ni //
T02TD1538E:134b-1: aargha byin nas lhag par gnas //
T02TD1538E:134b-2: tvam de b'i sakshi bh'u t'a yi sarba buddh'a n'am t'a yi nam /
T02TD1538E:134b-3: tsary'a na ya bi she she shya bh'u mi p'a ra mi ta su tsa /
T02TD1538E:134b-4: m'a ra see n+yam ya th'a bha ga sh'akya sidhe na t'a yi n'a /
T02TD1538E:134b-5: ta th'a m'a ra ba lam dzi tva mandalam sam li kha ma ham /
T02TD1538E:134b-6: lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1538E:134b-7: mdzes ma dga' nas smras pa ni //
T02TD1538E:134b-8: khye mgon po khyod kyi bsod nams ni //
T02TD1538E:134b-9: dri med bsags pa bdag gis shes //
T02TD1538E:134b-10: da ltar khyod ni de phyir rol //
T02TD1538E:134b-11: thams cad khyod kyis dbang du gnas //
T02TD1538E:134b-12: gang zhig bya ba de bka' stsol //
T02TD1538E:134b-13: bdag ni de dag byed pas spro //
T02TD1538E:134b-14: zhes pa'i tshig ni smras gyur nas //
T02TD1538E:134b-15: sa der thim par gyur bar bsam //
T02TD1538E:134b-16: las kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD1538E:134b-17: sngags pas de nas byas pa'o //
T02TD1538E:134b-18: sa gzhi lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1538E:134b-19: bdud rtsi lnga yi chu nyid kyis //
T02TD1538E:134b-20: sa ni legs par byugs par mdzes //
T02TD1538E:134b-21: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug gnas //
T02TD1538E:134b-22: blo bzang gis ni mandala bya //
T02TD1538E:134b-23: sna tshogs me tog dgram pa dang //
T02TD1538E:134b-24: spos kyi dri yis legs bsgos te //
T02TD1538E:134b-25: mchog tu dga' ba'i sbyor las byung //
T02TD1538E:134b-26: legs pa'i 'khor lo der spyan drangs //
T02TD1538E:134b-27: 'byung gnas sgra tshul la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1538E:134b-28: rnal 'byor sngon du dmigs nas ni //
T02TD1538E:134b-29: 'khor lo'i gzugs bdag sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1538E:134b-30: gnas dang gnas su rnam par bsam //
T02TD1538E:134b-31: dpal ldan he ru ka sogs ldan //
T02TD1538E:134b-32: rnam pa kun gyi mtshan nyid gcig //
T02TD1538E:134b-33: dngos grub kun gyi gzhir sbyor ba //
T02TD1538E:134b-34: bde mchog dngos grub thams cad ster //
T02TD1538E:134b-35: lam la gnas shing 'bras bur gnas //
T02TD1538E:134b-36: dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang phyug mdzes //
T02TD1538E:134b-37: yul la sogs pa gnas stan du //
T02TD1538E:134b-38: gsang ba spyan drang bsgom bya ste //
T02TD1538E:134b-39: ye shes 'khor lo mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1538E:134b-40: dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsam par bya //
T02TD1538E:134b-41: ngo bo gcig pa'i legs dag pa //
T02TD1538E:134b-42: lhan cig skyes dga' shin tu mdzes //
T02TD1538E:134b-43: rkang pa mnan cing gyen du blta //
T02TD1538E:134b-44: gyen du phem gi sgra bsgrags shing //
T02TD1538E:134b-45: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i //
T02TD1538E:134b-46: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug / mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar //
T02TD1538E:134b-47: mthe bong rdo rje brtan bor rab sbyor te //
T02TD1538E:134b-48: dpral ba'i dbus phyogs legs bzhag nas //
T02TD1538E:135a-0: phyag rgya mchog gis ma tshogs @135a * //
T02TD1538E:135a-2: mkha' spyod la sogs mnyam ldan pa'i //
T02TD1538E:135a-3: ye shes 'khor lo shin tu mdzes //
T02TD1538E:135a-4: g-yon du bskor ba'i bye brag gis //
T02TD1538E:135a-5: bskor ba nyid kyis dgug par bya //
T02TD1538E:135a-6: bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD1538E:135a-7: padma blangs par gyur nas ni //
T02TD1538E:135a-8: sngags pas de nas aargha byin //
T02TD1538E:135a-9: zhabs bsil nyid kyi bye brag go //
T02TD1538E:135a-10: dri la sogs pas yongs bkang ba'i //
T02TD1538E:135a-11: padma bzhi pos legs par mchod //
T02TD1538E:135a-12: bdug spos tha dad nyid kyis ni //
T02TD1538E:135a-13: dkyil 'khor mchog ni bdug par bya //
T02TD1538E:135a-14: ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1538E:135a-15: gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs //
T02TD1538E:135a-16: shes rab yan lag phur bu dra //
T02TD1538E:135a-17: a'a li k'a li zhes brjod nas //
T02TD1538E:135a-18: rgyu sogs stong pa sngon 'gro dang //
T02TD1538E:135a-19: 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas //
T02TD1538E:135a-20: ji srid gsungs pa'i sbyor ldan pa'o //
T02TD1538E:135a-21: bdud rtsis tshim byed mya ngan 'das //
T02TD1538E:135a-22: lag pa'i mchod pa dbang bskur dang //
T02TD1538E:135a-23: go cha chen pos legs par bsrung //
T02TD1538E:135a-24: sngags rnams kun gyis mchod pa ste //
T02TD1538E:135a-25: de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni //
T02TD1538E:135a-26: dus kun du ni legs par brtsam //
T02TD1538E:135a-27: bde ba'i stan las 'bad pa yis //
T02TD1538E:135a-28: shes rab yan lag stan gyi steng //
T02TD1538E:135a-29: mgul rgyan gdu bu dpung rgyan dang //
T02TD1538E:135a-30: rna rgyan tshangs pa'i skud pa dang //
T02TD1538E:135a-31: mgrin par brgyan byas mgo bo'i phreng //
T02TD1538E:135a-32: ska rags sil sil sgra sgrogs pa //
T02TD1538E:135a-33: ral pa cod pan dar dang ni //
T02TD1538E:135a-34: bcos pa'i skra yis rgyan du byas //
T02TD1538E:135a-35: rdo rje padma kha tv'am bcas //
T02TD1538E:135a-36: da ma ru sgra sgrogs pa dang //
T02TD1538E:135a-37: dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1538E:135a-38: go cha gsum gyis brgyan byas shing //
T02TD1538E:135a-39: he ru ka dpal rgyal po che //
T02TD1538E:135a-40: rnal 'byor dbang phyug nges par byas //
T02TD1538E:135a-41: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1538E:135a-42: bum pa lhag par gnas par bya //
T02TD1538E:135a-43: mgrin pa ring la lte ba che //
T02TD1538E:135a-44: mchu 'phyang rtsa ba rnam par spangs //
T02TD1538E:135a-45: kha dog gnag sogs spangs pa yi //
T02TD1538E:135a-46: bum pa bcu ni bya ba'o //
T02TD1538E:135a-47: de rnams nang nas mchog gcig ni //
T02TD1538E:135a-48: phag mo ru ni rab tu brtag / dgra sta zhags pa de bzhin mdung //
T02TD1538E:135a-49: kha tv'am ga yang legs par bri //
T02TD1538E:135a-50: de ltar khro bo'i rdo rje dang //
T02TD1538E:135a-51: padma'i lo ma sogs pas brgyan //
T02TD1538E:135a-52: bdud rtsi lnga yi chu nyid kyis //
T02TD1538E:135a-53: bkang zhing dri yis legs par byug /'bru dang rin chen sman rnams ni //
T02TD1538E:135a-54: so sor lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1538E:135b-0: @135b lha mo'i sngags kyis bsngags pa yi //
T02TD1538E:135b-1: me tog phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1538E:135b-2: ras bzang po yis mgul pa dkri //
T02TD1538E:135b-3: rnal 'byor ma tshogs gtso bo yis //
T02TD1538E:135b-4: rdo rje phag mo'i bum pa che //
T02TD1538E:135b-5: sngags pas sems can don gyi rgyur //
T02TD1538E:135b-6: lho yi sgo yi g-yon du ni //
T02TD1538E:135b-7: 'khor lo'i ri mo dang nye bar //
T02TD1538E:135b-8: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa gzhag / mkha' 'gro ma tshogs bum pa bzhi //
T02TD1538E:135b-9: de yi mtshan mas mdzes par bya //
T02TD1538E:135b-10: ji lta'i gnas su bzhag nas ni //
T02TD1538E:135b-11: dri drug sogs pas legs par dgang //
T02TD1538E:135b-12: bdud rtsi lnga yis legs bkang ba'i //
T02TD1538E:135b-13: thod pa'i mtshan ma legs par brtag / bum pa bzhi po gzhan rnams ni //
T02TD1538E:135b-14: 'bad pas mtshams su gzhag par bya //
T02TD1538E:135b-15: las kun byed pa'i bum pa ni //
T02TD1538E:135b-16: he ru ka yi mtshan mas mtshan //
T02TD1538E:135b-17: bi mu m'a ra bde legs bkang //
T02TD1538E:135b-18: bgegs kun rnams par sel bar byed //
T02TD1538E:135b-19: mchod nas gus pas gsol btab ste //
T02TD1538E:135b-20: lho yi sgo ru legs par gzhag rtag tu rdo rjes gdug pa kun //
T02TD1538E:135b-21: myur ba nyid du sel bar byed //
T02TD1538E:135b-22: phyi rol bum pa'i mtshan ma gang //
T02TD1538E:135b-23: thams cad ji ltar gsungs bzhin bstan //
T02TD1538E:135b-24: lus kyi dkyil 'khor bum pa yi //
T02TD1538E:135b-25: mtshan nyid lus las byung ba'o //
T02TD1538E:135b-26: bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1538E:135b-27: lho ru mngon phyogs sngags pa ni //
T02TD1538E:135b-28: lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:135b-29: he ru ka ma dang sbyor la //
T02TD1538E:135b-30: legs chags 'dzum bcas dga' zhing spro //
T02TD1538E:135b-31: bar ma mchog dang dbus dbyung dang //
T02TD1538E:135b-32: me tog spos la sogs pa yis //
T02TD1538E:135b-33: g-yon pa'i spyod pa rtag spyod pas //
T02TD1538E:135b-34: bde mchog dpa' bo mchod par bya //
T02TD1538E:135b-35: g-yon pas blangs pa'i spos dang ni //
T02TD1538E:135b-36: mi yi sha dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1538E:135b-37: bdugs par gyur nas sngags pa yis //
T02TD1538E:135b-38: sangs rgyas rnams dang dpal ldan he ru ka sogs nam mkha'i dkyil gyur mkha' spyod sa spyod dang //
T02TD1538E:135b-39: sa 'og gnas bzhugs lhan cig skyes pa'i bde dang ldan ba stan dang tshando ha lha mo //
T02TD1538E:135b-40: dkyil 'khor gnas pa de kun dus mtha'i me ltar spyod la dngos grub rgyur ni gsol ba btab //
T02TD1538E:135b-41: he ru ka dpal phag mor bcas //
T02TD1538E:135b-42: rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul che //
T02TD1538E:135b-43: phyogs kun bzhugs pa dpa' bo dang //
T02TD1538E:135b-44: byang chub sems dpa' bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1538E:135b-45: rdzu 'phrul chen po kun brnyes shing //
T02TD1538E:136a-1: rnams bzhugs par gyur pa rnams //
T02TD1538E:136a-2: che ge mo bdag rdo rje che //
T02TD1538E:136a-3: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02TD1538E:136a-4: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD1538E:136a-6: brtse bas bskyed par gyur nas ni //
T02TD1538E:136a-7: nye ba nyid du mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1538E:136a-8: dri zhim me tog legs par bsregs //
T02TD1538E:136a-9: bdud rtsi lnga yi thod pa ni //
T02TD1538E:136a-10: blangs nas spos bdug 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1538E:136a-11: skye bo dam pa kun 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1538E:136a-12: lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1538E:136a-13: dpa' bo lha mo dkyil 'khor bzang //
T02TD1538E:136a-14: mchod cing gsol btab de nas ni //
T02TD1538E:136a-15: phyi rol song nas slob ma bzang //
T02TD1538E:136a-16: stobs chen me tog lag na thogs //
T02TD1538E:136a-17: brtson 'grus che ldan shes rab che //
T02TD1538E:136a-18: rigs dang ldan zhing nga rgyal med //
T02TD1538E:136a-19: bde mchog mnyes byed mkhas pa dang //
T02TD1538E:136a-20: phag mo la gus snying du sdug / phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:136a-21: thal ba yis ni byugs pa dang //
T02TD1538E:136a-22: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi cho ga shes //
T02TD1538E:136a-23: rnal 'byor ma rgyud la dad pa'o //
T02TD1538E:136a-24: gang gang gus dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD1538E:136a-25: sngags dang rgyud la legs par bslabs //
T02TD1538E:136a-26: gzugs bzang shin tu mdzes brtson dang //
T02TD1538E:136a-27: chang la dga' bas myos pa la //
T02TD1538E:136a-28: slob ma'i dbang bskur don gyis ni //
T02TD1538E:136a-29: kun nas de la gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1538E:136a-30: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang shes na //
T02TD1538E:136a-31: 'byung gnas la sogs rnam par bsam //
T02TD1538E:136a-32: mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang //
T02TD1538E:136a-33: gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi //
T02TD1538E:136a-34: skyes pa'am bud med 'di don du //
T02TD1538E:136a-35: dpal ldan bde mchog las rab bstan //
T02TD1538E:136a-36: bde mchog lta bur rdzogs nas ni //
T02TD1538E:136a-37: gsol ba 'debs par rnam par bsam //
T02TD1538E:136a-38: dpa' bo khyod bdag rdo rje che //
T02TD1538E:136a-39: phag mo lhan cig yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:136a-40: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1538E:136a-41: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD1538E:136a-42: dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol //
T02TD1538E:136a-43: byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol //
T02TD1538E:136a-44: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug rnams //
T02TD1538E:136a-45: phag mo dang ni he ru ka'i //
T02TD1538E:136a-46: gsang ba'i stan sogs legs par dag / gnas pa'i lugs ni bstan du gsol //
T02TD1538E:136a-47: slob ma'i gtso bo mdun byas te //
T02TD1538E:136a-48: me tog phreng 'dzin dag sems la //
T02TD1538E:136a-49: g-yon pas kun nas blta byas te //
T02TD1538E:136a-50: rab tu rgyas pa'i bzhin gyis smra //
T02TD1538E:136a-51: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02TD1538E:136b-0: khyod ni tshul chen @136b snod yin pas //
T02TD1538E:136b-1: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //
T02TD1538E:136b-2: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD1538E:136b-3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02TD1538E:136b-4: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02TD1538E:136b-5: da ltar byung ba'i dpa' bo ni //
T02TD1538E:136b-6: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams //
T02TD1538E:136b-7: de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD1538E:136b-8: cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas //
T02TD1538E:136b-9: shes rab yan lag gnyis med chub //
T02TD1538E:136b-10: dpa' bos thams cad mkhyen pa thob //
T02TD1538E:136b-11: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de //
T02TD1538E:136b-12: he ru ka dpal sogs mchog gis //
T02TD1538E:136b-13: bdud sde 'jigs pa chen po yi //
T02TD1538E:136b-14: stobs chen po ni gang gis bcom //
T02TD1538E:136b-15: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD1538E:136b-16: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig //
T02TD1538E:136b-17: byang chub bsgrub pa'i don gyi rgyud //
T02TD1538E:136b-18: cho ga thams cad khyod la sbyin //
T02TD1538E:136b-19: de nas slob ma ser sna bral //
T02TD1538E:136b-20: dpa' bo chen po rnam dag pa'i //
T02TD1538E:136b-21: bla ma la gsol dga' ba des //
T02TD1538E:136b-22: sdom pa mchog ni bdag la gsol //
T02TD1538E:136b-23: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02TD1538E:136b-24: 'khor lo gsum gyi rnam gzugs can //
T02TD1538E:136b-25: mkha' 'gro ma rnams bye brag gis //
T02TD1538E:136b-26: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug gang //
T02TD1538E:136b-27: rgyal ba'i sras 'di thams cad la //
T02TD1538E:136b-28: kun la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1538E:136b-29: dngos po kun gyi de nyid kyis //
T02TD1538E:136b-30: bla ma la ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1538E:136b-31: 'dir ni dngos grub kun mdzad cing //
T02TD1538E:136b-32: snying rje'i ro yis khengs gyur pa //
T02TD1538E:136b-33: dpal ldan he ru ka sogs dang //
T02TD1538E:136b-34: lha mo kun gyis bdag bsrung mdzod //
T02TD1538E:136b-35: che ge mo bdag dpa' bo che //
T02TD1538E:136b-36: sems can kun la phan par dga' //
T02TD1538E:136b-37: ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar //
T02TD1538E:136b-38: dngos grub sbyin bdag bdag gyur cig / blo ldan ston pa'i khrag gis ni //
T02TD1538E:136b-39: de dag rnams la thig le bya //
T02TD1538E:136b-40: snying rje sems can don la brtson //
T02TD1538E:136b-41: de dag thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:136b-42: zhal gyis spyan ras gzigs blangs te //
T02TD1538E:136b-43: mgo yi steng du blugs par bya //
T02TD1538E:136b-44: slob ma 'di dag thams cad ni //
T02TD1538E:136b-45: bsrung bar gyur par the tshom med //
T02TD1538E:136b-46: lhag par gnas pa'i slob ma ni //
T02TD1538E:136b-47: 'bad bas btang ste mnyam par gzhag / dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang dgyes la //
T02TD1538E:136b-48: mchod pa kun gyis mchod byas nas //
T02TD1538E:136b-49: bud med bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:136b-50: phag mo'i nu ma 'chir ba dang //
T02TD1538E:136b-51: bza' dang bca' ba la sogs pas //
T02TD1538E:136b-52: kun gyis 'khor lo bde mchog mchod //
T02TD1538E:137a-3: // / nang par dpa' bo chen po ni //
T02TD1538E:137a-4: lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan pas //
T02TD1538E:137a-5: phag mor sbyor bar legs gnas pa'i //
T02TD1538E:137a-7: khro med gtsang ma mkhas pa dang //
T02TD1538E:137a-8: sbyor shes ye shes pha rol song //
T02TD1538E:137a-9: thod pas spyi bo rab brgyan cing //
T02TD1538E:137a-10: yan lag thal bas byugs pa dang //
T02TD1538E:137a-11: sku la phyag rgya drug la sogs //
T02TD1538E:137a-12: rus pa'i phred bas brgyan pa dang //
T02TD1538E:137a-13: kha tv'am ga ni lag na thogs //
T02TD1538E:137a-14: phreng ba brgya yi phyed kyis brgyan //
T02TD1538E:137a-15: he ru ka yi bdag nyid byas //
T02TD1538E:137a-16: 'khor lo snying gar bsam byas te //
T02TD1538E:137a-17: de ltar bdag nyid go bgos shing //
T02TD1538E:137a-18: sngags dang phyag rgyas brgyan byas nas //
T02TD1538E:137a-19: dngos grub chen po rab ster ba'i //
T02TD1538E:137a-21: de nas ro yi skud pa ni //
T02TD1538E:137a-22: khrag chen po yis brlan byas te //
T02TD1538E:137a-23: he ru ka dpal go 'phang mchog / dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab pa'o //
T02TD1538E:137a-24: khru gang pa'am khru gnyis pa //
T02TD1538E:137a-25: yang na bzhi pa dag kyang rung //
T02TD1538E:137a-26: bcu gnyis pa'am bcu drug las //
T02TD1538E:137a-27: lhag pa yongs su mi brtag go //
T02TD1538E:137a-28: de las gzhan du brtags na ni //
T02TD1538E:137a-29: slob dpon ye shes dman gyur pa //
T02TD1538E:137a-30: gang du sdig can mi 'gro ba'i //
T02TD1538E:137a-32: mkha' 'gro ma sogs rang gzugs su //
T02TD1538E:137a-33: skad cig tsam gyis legs par byung //
T02TD1538E:137a-34: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis //
T02TD1538E:137a-35: ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i thig / de bzhin du yang gang gsungs pa //
T02TD1538E:137a-36: sangs rgyas lnga yi ye shes che //
T02TD1538E:137a-37: thig gi dbus su gyur par dgod //
T02TD1538E:137a-38: 'di dag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1538E:137a-39: gsang chen dam pa rmad du byung //
T02TD1538E:137a-40: mig tu dza: las nyi zla bsam //
T02TD1538E:137a-41: he ru ka dpal bdag nyid gnas //
T02TD1538E:137a-42: 'bar ba'i blta ba legs bkug nas //
T02TD1538E:137a-43: rang rang thig la gzhug par bya //
T02TD1538E:137a-44: he ru ka sogs 'khor lo bzang //
T02TD1538E:137a-45: shes rab thabs dang mnyam ldan pas //
T02TD1538E:137a-46: phyi rol stan gnas bkug nas ni //
T02TD1538E:137a-47: thig gi dbus su rnam par bsam //
T02TD1538E:137a-48: rtsa sogs pa yi gsang sngags dang //
T02TD1538E:137a-49: snying po nye ba'i snying po yis //
T02TD1538E:137a-50: me tog ldan pa'i khrag gis byug / rnal 'byor rig pas thod par gzhag / thig skud legs par mngon par bsngags //
T02TD1538E:137a-51: mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags kyis bsrung //
T02TD1538E:137b-0: bdud rtsi @137b lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:137b-1: kha dog lnga pa cho ga ldan //
T02TD1538E:137b-2: thig skud de ni gcig tu bsgril //
T02TD1538E:137b-3: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1538E:137b-4: dpal lha dngos grub kun byed cing //
T02TD1538E:137b-5: chos kyi gnas te dri ma med //
T02TD1538E:137b-6: bla ma phreng ldan gyis blangs nas //
T02TD1538E:137b-7: g-yon pas slob ma la byin bya //
T02TD1538E:137b-8: gnyis med rnam pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1538E:137b-9: 'khor lo'i gtso bo bsgril bar bya //
T02TD1538E:137b-10: legs bsgril slob ma la btang nas //
T02TD1538E:137b-11: dza dza zhes pas bdun du gnas //
T02TD1538E:137b-12: de nas slob mas kyang brjod pa //
T02TD1538E:137b-13: rang gis kyang ni dza dza brjod //
T02TD1538E:137b-14: bla ma slob mas blangs nas ni /
T02TD1538E:137b-15: phag mo'i sbyor bas legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:137b-16: dang po'i las can sngags pa yis //
T02TD1538E:137b-17: dpa' bo'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab po //
T02TD1538E:137b-18: ye shes cung zad thob pa yis //
T02TD1538E:137b-19: khye'u bzang dang bu mo la //
T02TD1538E:137b-20: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma phab nas //
T02TD1538E:137b-21: thig gdab phyir na gsol ba btab //
T02TD1538E:137b-22: de yis 'khor lo bde mchog bzang //
T02TD1538E:137b-23: stan sogs pa yi lha mo kun //
T02TD1538E:137b-24: lhan cig skyes dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:137b-25: mdzes par gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:137b-26: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1538E:137b-27: rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang //
T02TD1538E:137b-28: tshon rtsi dag ni dgye ba dang //
T02TD1538E:137b-29: sngags kyi sems pas mi bya ste //
T02TD1538E:137b-30: byas na byang chub rnyed par dka' //
T02TD1538E:137b-31: de bas dam tshig cho ga shes //
T02TD1538E:137b-32: sngags kyi lha rnams bcug nas ni //
T02TD1538E:137b-33: byin rlabs go gor bsams byas nas //
T02TD1538E:137b-34: dkyil 'khor rnams ni rab tu brtags //
T02TD1538E:137b-35: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po //
T02TD1538E:137b-36: m'a ma k'i ni dbab par bya //
T02TD1538E:137b-37: de nyid sngags rnams thams cad kyi //
T02TD1538E:137b-38: gsang ba mchog ste rmad du byung //
T02TD1538E:137b-39: rang nyid mkhas par gyur pa yis //
T02TD1538E:137b-40: de ltar byas na nye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:137b-41: byon par gyur nas gsang ba'i mchog / mnyes par ldan pas 'di dag bri //
T02TD1538E:137b-42: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1538E:137b-43: ji bzhin 'khor lo'i ji bzhin gnas //
T02TD1538E:137b-44: ji bzhin bkod pa 'gro ji bzhin //
T02TD1538E:137b-45: 'khor rnams bsdu bar gyur nas ni //
T02TD1538E:137b-46: de ltar 'khor lo mchog rnams spro //
T02TD1538E:137b-47: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i lha //
T02TD1538E:137b-48: 'khor lo mngon sum mthong gyur ba //
T02TD1538E:137b-49: phyi nas bris par gyur pa yang //
T02TD1538E:137b-50: ji bzhin bsod nams brtag pa'o //
T02TD1538E:137b-51: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa //
T02TD1538E:137b-52: rdo rje sgra chen de dang des //
T02TD1538E:137b-53: thig gis thig gdab legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:138a-2: 'dir ni sems can don gyi dus la bab //
T02TD1538E:138a-3: thog mar sngags pa yi dags blta //
T02TD1538E:138a-4: 'khor lo sa yi byang du gnas //
T02TD1538E:138a-5: nam mkha'i sa la gdab bya ste //
T02TD1538E:138a-6: blo ldan thig ni g-yon pas bskor //
T02TD1538E:138a-7: aom badzra sa ma ya su tra m'a ti kra ma h'um //
T02TD1538E:138a-8: phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa //
T02TD1538E:138a-9: sems can don phyir de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1538E:138a-10: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma'i //
T02TD1538E:138a-11: lha mo'i thig gi sgra yis bskul //
T02TD1538E:138a-12: shar du gnas nas nub bltas te //
T02TD1538E:138a-13: tshangs thig gnyis pa yang gdab po //
T02TD1538E:138a-14: me ru gnas nas nub tu zhal //
T02TD1538E:138a-15: lho yi phyogs su thig gdab po //
T02TD1538E:138a-16: nub phyogs gnas nas shar du blta //
T02TD1538E:138a-17: byang gi phyogs kyi thig gdab po //
T02TD1538E:138a-18: bskor nas slob dpon rlung gnas te //
T02TD1538E:138a-19: lho ru mngon par phyogs gyur nas //
T02TD1538E:138a-20: nub kyi cha ru legs par gdab //
T02TD1538E:138a-21: byang du mngon phyogs sngags pa ni //
T02TD1538E:138a-22: me yi gnas su rnam gnas te //
T02TD1538E:138a-23: shar gyi cha yi thig brtsam mo //
T02TD1538E:138a-24: dbang ldan mer gnas rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1538E:138a-25: mtshams kyi thig ni gdab par bya //
T02TD1538E:138a-26: phyogs la sogs pa'i dbye shes nas //
T02TD1538E:138a-27: thig gdab pa ni legs par brtsam //
T02TD1538E:138a-28: tshangs thig dang po dbus su ni //
T02TD1538E:138a-29: thig bzhi rnams ni gdab par bya //
T02TD1538E:138a-30: thugs dang gsung dang sku 'khor lo //
T02TD1538E:138a-31: rdo rje phreng ba la sogs bya //
T02TD1538E:138a-32: kha sbyor dbus su ri mo lnga //
T02TD1538E:138a-33: blo dang ldan pas zlum por bya //
T02TD1538E:138a-34: ri mo bzhi po gzhan rnams ni //
T02TD1538E:138a-35: rdo rje phreng ba la sogs bya //
T02TD1538E:138a-36: dma' bas nad de chad pas zad //
T02TD1538E:138a-37: yo bas dngos grub med par 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:138a-38: g-yas su bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1538E:138a-39: slob ma rnams ni brlag par 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:138a-41: sgo yi nyi shu'i char gyur pa //
T02TD1538E:138a-42: he ru kar bdag 'dug nas ni //
T02TD1538E:138a-43: thig skud kyis ni thig gdab po //
T02TD1538E:138a-44: zur bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1538E:138a-45: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1538E:138a-46: sa 'og gnas pa'i ha mo rnams //
T02TD1538E:138a-47: 'khor lo'i phreng ba sogs pas bskor //
T02TD1538E:138a-48: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:138a-49: 'phan dang me tog phreng bas bskor //
T02TD1538E:138a-50: mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang //
T02TD1538E:138a-51: sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su //
T02TD1538E:138a-52: rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan par //
T02TD1538E:138a-53: phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab po //
T02TD1538E:138a-54: de yi dbus su padma ni //
T02TD1538E:138b-0: 'dab ma brgyad @138b pa lte bar bcas //
T02TD1538E:138b-1: phyi rol rdo rje phreng bas bskor //
T02TD1538E:138b-2: 'phro ba'i rdo rje'i tshogs sprul ba'o //
T02TD1538E:138b-3: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad legs par bri //
T02TD1538E:138b-4: dngos grub kun dang yon tan gzhi //
T02TD1538E:138b-5: phyi rol du ni nag pos bskor //
T02TD1538E:138b-6: ming ni mkha' spyod ces bya'o //
T02TD1538E:138b-7: rtsibs brgyad la sogs 'khor lo ste //
T02TD1538E:138b-8: padma'i ka ba'i phreng gis bskor //
T02TD1538E:138b-9: sa 'og gnas pa'i lha mo ni //
T02TD1538E:138b-10: 'khor lo'i phreng bas dang por bskor //
T02TD1538E:138b-11: rtsibs kyi mtshams su rdo rje ni //
T02TD1538E:138b-12: mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pa yis bri //
T02TD1538E:138b-13: 'khor lo phreng ba'i mthar thug par //
T02TD1538E:138b-14: 'bar ba'i ri mo de bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:138b-15: he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che //
T02TD1538E:138b-16: 'khor lo'i dbus su legs gnas nas //
T02TD1538E:138b-17: hi sgrogs khro bo'i lta ba yis //
T02TD1538E:138b-18: de nas sgo ni dbye bar bya //
T02TD1538E:138b-19: sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste //
T02TD1538E:138b-20: kha khyer dag ni yangs pa'o //
T02TD1538E:138b-21: sgo khyud dang ni sgo yi tshad //
T02TD1538E:138b-22: lha yi snam bu'ang de bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:138b-23: kha khyer kun nas sgo yis phyed //
T02TD1538E:138b-24: 'gram dang logs dang de bzhin no ;
T02TD1538E:138b-25: / dra ba dra phyed nyi zla dang //
T02TD1538E:138b-26: 'phan dang me tog phred bas spras //
T02TD1538E:138b-27: tshon gyi sa ni de yi phyed //
T02TD1538E:138b-28: rtsa ba'i thug gi sa yi rgyab //
T02TD1538E:138b-29: rdo rje la sogs ka ba yi //
T02TD1538E:138b-30: sa ni tshon gyi sa dang mnyam //
T02TD1538E:138b-31: rta babs sgo las sum 'gyur te //
T02TD1538E:138b-32: 'phan dang dril bu dang ldan pa //
T02TD1538E:138b-33: dril bu rlung gis bskyod pa yi //
T02TD1538E:138b-35: dang por nam mkha'i thig yin no //
T02TD1538E:138b-36: de yi 'og tu ye shes thig / phyogs kun mnyam par bgrod nas ni //
T02TD1538E:138b-37: rnal 'byor pa yi cho gas gdab //
T02TD1538E:138b-38: lugs byung lugs bzlog pa 'dis ni //
T02TD1538E:138b-39: phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig yin no //
T02TD1538E:138b-40: de bzhin nang gi bdag nyid lus //
T02TD1538E:138b-41: tshogs pa las byung mgon po yis //
T02TD1538E:138b-42: lus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab po //
T02TD1538E:138b-43: lhan cig skyes shing rang bzhin dag / dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ldan //
T02TD1538E:138b-44: phyi dang nang gi thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD1538E:138b-46: // / dur khrod rus pa legs par blang //
T02TD1538E:138b-47: thal ba lo ma la so phag dang //
T02TD1538E:138b-48: ba bla dag dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1538E:138b-49: legs bris he ru ka 'khor lo //
T02TD1538E:138b-50: thod par rdul tshon bzhag nas ni //
T02TD1538E:138b-51: blo bzang thig gdab cho gas so //
T02TD1538E:138b-52: 'bar ba'i lta bas bkug nas ni //
T02TD1538E:138b-53: ye shes 'khor lo'i snying po gzhug / sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i //
T02TD1538E:139a-2: dpal ldan he ru ka rgyal bdag /'khor lo'i dbus su legs par gzhug / dur khrod las byung thams cad ni //
T02TD1538E:139a-3: dbang phyug mchog gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1538E:139a-4: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbye ba yis //
T02TD1538E:139a-5: rdul tsho na bri ba brtsam par bya //
T02TD1538E:139a-6: lag pa g-yon pas me phyogs nas //
T02TD1538E:139a-7: blo dang ldan pas g-yon du bskor //
T02TD1538E:139a-8: dkar po ser po de bzhin du //
T02TD1538E:139a-9: dmar mo ljang gu de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1538E:139a-10: lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing //
T02TD1538E:139a-11: dpa' bo bzhis ni bskor ba'o //
T02TD1538E:139a-12: dag cing bar du nas kyi tshad //
T02TD1538E:139a-13: ri mo ldan po bri bar bya //
T02TD1538E:139a-14: ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa //
T02TD1538E:139a-15: sgo yi nyi shu cha ru ni //
T02TD1538E:139a-16: mnyam par dgyes pas bri bar bya //
T02TD1538E:139a-18: phra ba yis ni nor zad cing //
T02TD1538E:139a-19: yon po yis ni rnam par sdang //
T02TD1538E:139a-20: chad pas slob dpon slob ma 'chi //
T02TD1538E:139a-21: g-yas su bskor nas bris pa yis //
T02TD1538E:139a-22: rdul tshon rnams ni mthu med 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:139a-23: lho yi sa ni nag po ste //
T02TD1538E:139a-24: shar ljang de bzhin byang du dmar //
T02TD1538E:139a-25: nub phyogs sa ni ser po bri //
T02TD1538E:139a-26: gsang sngags rim pas yid 'ong bar //
T02TD1538E:139a-28: phyogs kyi mdog tu brtag par bya //
T02TD1538E:139a-30: he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor bya //
T02TD1538E:139a-31: sngon po dmar po dkar po che //
T02TD1538E:139a-33: gzhan ma thams cad ci mdzes par //
T02TD1538E:139a-34: phyi rol rta babs bri bar bya //
T02TD1538E:139a-35: lha mo chen mo dang ldan pa'i //
T02TD1538E:139a-36: dpa' bo lte bar dgod par bya //
T02TD1538E:139a-37: mkha' 'gro ma sogs yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:139a-38: he ru ka rdor 'dab ma la'o //
T02TD1538E:139a-39: de bzhin khra sogs lha mo rnams //
T02TD1538E:139a-40: he ru ka sogs yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:139a-41: sgo dang mtshams kyi cha rnams su //
T02TD1538E:139a-42: sngags pas mnyam par bzhag pas bri //
T02TD1538E:139a-43: phyi rol yi dags gnas de bzhin //
T02TD1538E:139a-44: srin mo la sogs yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:139a-46: rdo rje rta babs steng du'o //
T02TD1538E:139a-47: rdul tshon bkye bas rnam mdzes pa'o //
T02TD1538E:139a-48: phyi rol gyi ni dkyil 'khor bstan //
T02TD1538E:139a-49: bla ma mnyes byas blo ldan pas //
T02TD1538E:139a-50: nang gi bdag nyid rnam shes bya //
T02TD1538E:139a-51: bsam gyis mi khyab sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1538E:139a-52: rdul tshon bri ba skyon yin no //
T02TD1538E:139a-53: lhan cig skyes dga' rol pa yis //
T02TD1538E:139a-54: dga' ba'i sems kyis bdag nyid bri //
T02TD1538E:139a-55: dkyil 'khor la sogs rtsom pa yi //
T02TD1538E:139b-0: rlung la sogs @139b pa byung ba na //
T02TD1538E:139b-1: he ru ka dpal bdag sbyor bas //
T02TD1538E:139b-2: gdug pa thams cad bsal bar bya //
T02TD1538E:139b-3: phyi dang nang gi tshon dgye ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD1538E:139b-5: // / bu yi thog ma'i ye shes rnams //
T02TD1538E:139b-6: rtsibs su kha dog bzang po gang //
T02TD1538E:139b-7: bsam gtan de yi 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1538E:139b-8: ye shes 'khor lo mnyam par dgug / lha mo'i tshogs ni du ma dang //
T02TD1538E:139b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che //
T02TD1538E:139b-10: de nyid yang dag rin chen brgyan //
T02TD1538E:139b-11: gzhan pa'i dpa' bo stobs chen rnams //
T02TD1538E:139b-12: rtag tu rgyud las byung cho gas //
T02TD1538E:139b-13: 'khor lo bde mchog blo ldan pas //
T02TD1538E:139b-15: rgyud las mchod pa'i cho gas mnyes //
T02TD1538E:139b-16: dkar po ser po de bzhin dmar //
T02TD1538E:139b-17: ljang gu dang ni nag po nyid //
T02TD1538E:139b-18: gcig tu me tog phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1538E:139b-19: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rang bzhin //
T02TD1538E:139b-20: rgya skyegs pa bla rams mchog dang //
T02TD1538E:139b-21: tshon sna lnga la rjes su bcos //
T02TD1538E:139b-22: dkar po lnga yi rang bzhin rgyas //
T02TD1538E:139b-24: khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang //
T02TD1538E:139b-25: de bzhin srog dang rtsa rang bzhin //
T02TD1538E:139b-26: rnam pa sna tshogs dri dang ldan //
T02TD1538E:139b-28: tsandan gnyis dang ri dags skyes dang ga pur bcas //
T02TD1538E:139b-29: sha la ka dang na ga'i spos ni bu ram ldan //
T02TD1538E:139b-30: las kun rab sgrub spos la sogs //
T02TD1538E:139b-31: gu gul sa rdza ra dang ga bur dang //
T02TD1538E:139b-32: ri dags las skyes spos rnams ni //
T02TD1538E:139b-33: rdzas 'di rnams ni bcos pa yi //
T02TD1538E:139b-34: mar khus spar ba'i snang ba bya //
T02TD1538E:139b-35: tsandan gur kum pri kva dang //
T02TD1538E:139b-36: ga pur ri dags las skyes spos //
T02TD1538E:139b-37: bcos shing gdug par grub pa'i ras //
T02TD1538E:139b-38: phyag rgya bzang po'i ras yin no //
T02TD1538E:139b-39: kakko la dang ae le dang //
T02TD1538E:139b-40: mu sta kam dang ga pur dang //
T02TD1538E:139b-41: ri dags las byung ba yi dri //
T02TD1538E:139b-42: 'di rnams zhib mor btags nas ni //
T02TD1538E:139b-43: seng ldeng ri lur dgod par bya //
T02TD1538E:139b-44: tva ga 'dab ma lo dha dang //
T02TD1538E:139b-45: ma ri tsa dang ga pur rnams //
T02TD1538E:139b-46: rab tu bsten par bya ba'o //
T02TD1538E:139b-47: sa h'a k'a ri'i mar khu ldan //
T02TD1538E:139b-48: kha la bsgos pas zhes su dran //
T02TD1538E:139b-49: de 'og gtor ma'i mchod pa sbyin //
T02TD1538E:139b-50: rnam par bsgyings ma bcos pa'i chang //
T02TD1538E:139b-51: chang dang bdud rtsi de bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:139b-52: dpa' bo gcig dang rgun 'bru dang //
T02TD1538E:139b-53: glad pa dang ni bi ta dang //
T02TD1538E:139b-54: shtse ti rnams ni de bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:139b-55: lan tshva la sogs ro rnams kun //
T02TD1538E:140a-2: thams cad bdag nyid ros dngos grub //
T02TD1538E:140a-3: ma lus lus pa med pa sgrub //
T02TD1538E:140a-4: sna tshogs ston mos dngos grub ni //
T02TD1538E:140a-5: chang dang sha dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:140a-6: 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod dang //
T02TD1538E:140a-7: skal bzang che mchog rab tu 'grub //
T02TD1538E:140a-9: rgun 'bru dang ni na le ka / aa lu ka la sogs pa yi //
T02TD1538E:140a-11: dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bur spro //
T02TD1538E:140a-12: sha ka ra dang sbyar rtsir byug / aa mra'i rus pa rnams la byug / sa ha ka ri'i mar khu sogs //
T02TD1538E:140a-13: mnyam pa'i dri ru rab tu gyur //
T02TD1538E:140a-14: ji ltar rigs par shun pa sogs //
T02TD1538E:140a-15: ba bla rgya skyegs kyis btsos te //
T02TD1538E:140a-16: mchod pa'i dus su dbul bar bya //
T02TD1538E:140a-17: lus skyes pa dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:140a-18: phyi rol mchod pa bdag gis bstan //
T02TD1538E:140a-19: legs par mchod par mnyes byas te //
T02TD1538E:140a-20: phyi rol song ste gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1538E:140a-21: gcer bu skra grol gyur pa dang //
T02TD1538E:140a-22: kha tv'am ga thogs legs gnas te //
T02TD1538E:140a-23: chang dang sha dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:140a-26: blo dang ldan pas spangs byas shing //
T02TD1538E:140a-27: lho ru mngon par phyogs byas te //
T02TD1538E:140a-28: gnas ni mthon por rnam par gnas //
T02TD1538E:140a-29: g-yon pas g-yas pa'i rkang pa mnan //
T02TD1538E:140a-30: gyen du lta bas bltas nas ni //
T02TD1538E:140a-31: 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:140a-32: phem brjod pa yi bdag nyid can //
T02TD1538E:140a-33: aom aa ralli ho dza: h'um bam ho: / aom badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho //
T02TD1538E:140a-34: gcig dang ldnga dang de bdun du //
T02TD1538E:140a-35: sngon du gdang sngags brjod par bya //
T02TD1538E:140a-36: dam tshig rdzas dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:140a-37: thod pa'i nang du rnam par bsam //
T02TD1538E:140a-38: rdo rje thal mo gyen kha dbye //
T02TD1538E:140a-39: phreng ba'i phyag rgyar rab tu grags //
T02TD1538E:140a-40: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug kun //
T02TD1538E:140a-41: lam la gnas rnams mnyes pa'o //
T02TD1538E:140a-42: phyogs skyong yi dags 'byung po la //
T02TD1538E:140a-43: mnyam par bzhag nas gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1538E:140a-44: kha kha la sogs sngags 'di yis //
T02TD1538E:140a-46: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02TD1538E:140a-47: sarba yaksha r'a k'a s'a bh'u ta pre ta pi sh'a tsi aunm'a da aa pa sm'ar badzra d'a ki n-y'a da ya //
T02TD1538E:140a-48: ai mam ba lim grihna ntu sarba siddhi mme par ytstshantu ya thee bam ya the shtam bhu dza tha pi pa tha m'a ti kra ma tha //
T02TD1538E:140a-49: ma ma sarba k'a rta ya stshu kha bi shuddh'a ye sa ha yi k'a bha bantu h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1538E:140b-0: gtor ma @140b byin nas de'i 'og tu //
T02TD1538E:140b-1: sngags pas spyad dang bza' ba brtsam //
T02TD1538E:140b-2: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ldan //
T02TD1538E:140b-3: snying rje'i stobs kyi sbyor ba can //
T02TD1538E:140b-4: rdo rjes mtshan cing khro bo'i gzugs can ro yi kha ni gdangs pa spyi bor zla ba phyed pas bcing //
T02TD1538E:140b-5: yid 'ong dril bu'i sgra yis mdzes shing sna tshogs mang pos 'phyang ba'i rgyal mtshan tshogs //
T02TD1538E:140b-6: brgyan pa'i drag po'i sgra dang sna tshogs mang po'i me tog gis mtshan phreng ba bcings //
T02TD1538E:140b-7: kha tv'am ga ni 'bar ba mchog tu dga' ba bskyed pa rdo rje rnal 'byor bas gzung do //
T02TD1538E:140b-8: dpal ldan rdo rje lha mo de rjes bla ma chog dang he ru ka 'khor mgon po la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1538E:140b-9: slob ma bzang po yon tan mchog ldan dang ni mchod pa kun gyi bye brag blangs nas ni //
T02TD1538E:140b-10: g-yas na 'khrol ba'i legs pa'i da ma ru ni dri med h'um sgrogs dga' ba'i mchog //
T02TD1538E:140b-11: slob dpon rol pa mdzad pas nges par dkyil 'khor khang ba'i dbus su 'jug //
T02TD1538E:140b-12: lho yi sgo ru song nas ni //
T02TD1538E:140b-13: lhag ma rnams su yongs su bskor //
T02TD1538E:140b-14: lha mo rgyud gsungs rim pa'o //
T02TD1538E:140b-15: rnal 'byor rgyud rigs shar sogs nas //
T02TD1538E:140b-16: lho yi sgo ru 'gro ba ni //
T02TD1538E:140b-17: gang bstan bde bar gsungs pa yi //
T02TD1538E:140b-18: dkyil 'khor bri bar brtag pa ni //
T02TD1538E:140b-19: kun rdzob don du rtogs par bya //
T02TD1538E:140b-20: phyogs ni mtha' yas cha shas kyis //
T02TD1538E:140b-21: lho la sogs pa brtags na ni //
T02TD1538E:140b-22: lho yi zhal ni gang yin nyid //
T02TD1538E:140b-23: rnal 'byor pas ni kun rdzob nyid //
T02TD1538E:140b-24: dang por dpa' bo drug dang lha mo'i bkod pa ba srung ba'i 'khor lo bya //
T02TD1538E:140b-25: sngags kyis mngon bsngags chog ldan pas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa de nas bya //
T02TD1538E:140b-26: bde ba'i stan la 'bad pa yis //
T02TD1538E:140b-27: shes rab yan lag stan gyi steng //
T02TD1538E:140b-28: dkyil 'khor sa yi dbus su ni //
T02TD1538E:140b-29: sngon du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid ldan //
T02TD1538E:140b-30: mdzes pa'i gser dang rin chen kun //
T02TD1538E:140b-31: dkyil 'khor la ni gtor bar bya //
T02TD1538E:140b-32: sha chen po dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:140b-33: gnas brgyad du ni legs par bdug / mar khu chen po dang ldan pa'i ;
T02TD1538E:140b-34: / mar me brgyad ni dbul bar bya //
T02TD1538E:140b-35: me tog sna tshogs rnam par dgram //
T02TD1538E:140b-36: sna tshogs dri yis legs par bsgo //
T02TD1538E:140b-37: sgo bzhi ru ni dpa' bo dang //
T02TD1538E:140b-38: rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med gnas //
T02TD1538E:140b-39: lus la phyag rgya lnga sa sogs //
T02TD1538E:140b-40: mgo bo lnga yis mtshan pa dang //
T02TD1538E:141a-2: chang la dga' bas myos pa'o //
T02TD1538E:141a-3: thams cad ral pa'i cod pan bcas //
T02TD1538E:141a-4: spyad dang bza' ba mchog tu brtson //
T02TD1538E:141a-5: mtshams kyi cha ni gzhan rnams su //
T02TD1538E:141a-6: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ldan //
T02TD1538E:141a-7: rdo rje dril bu mnyam 'khyud cing //
T02TD1538E:141a-8: nu ma 'tshir ba la brtson pa'o //
T02TD1538E:141a-9: tshogs kyi gtso bo'i bdag po ni //
T02TD1538E:141a-10: dpal ldan 'khor los sgyur legs gnas //
T02TD1538E:141a-11: lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:141a-12: phag mo'i zhal la'o byed pa'o //
T02TD1538E:141a-13: la la glu yis glu len cing //
T02TD1538E:141a-14: la la gar byed rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1538E:141a-15: la la bzhad pa rab tu byed //
T02TD1538E:141a-16: bza' dang spyod pa la chags pa'o //
T02TD1538E:141a-17: la la rdza yi rnga brdung dang //
T02TD1538E:141a-18: bkra shis glu ni sna tshogs kyis //
T02TD1538E:141a-19: 'khor lo bde mchog bde ba yi //
T02TD1538E:141a-20: dpa' bo chen po la mchod do //
T02TD1538E:141a-21: thams cad dpa' bo drug dang ldan //
T02TD1538E:141a-22: rnal 'byor mas ni rgyan du byas //
T02TD1538E:141a-23: go cha la sogs yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:141a-24: rdo rje dkyil 'khor legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:141a-25: de ltar go bgos bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1538E:141a-26: sum cu gsum pas kyang mi shigs //
T02TD1538E:141a-27: he ru ka la spro byas nas //
T02TD1538E:141a-28: bza' dang ston mo legs par brtsam //
T02TD1538E:141a-29: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang dpa' bo dang dbang phyug ma la mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1538E:141a-30: dam tshig 'khor lo drug pa ni //
T02TD1538E:141a-31: ye shes 'khor lo yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:141a-32: sems kyis kha sbyor byas pa ste //
T02TD1538E:141a-33: gyen du lta bas bltas nas ni //
T02TD1538E:141a-34: sngon du spyan drangs phyag rgyar bcas //
T02TD1538E:141a-35: sngags dang phem sgrogs sbyar ba yis //
T02TD1538E:141a-36: mtha' yas phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD1538E:141a-37: lha rnams mnyes nas dngos grub ster //
T02TD1538E:141a-38: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ldan //
T02TD1538E:141a-39: sngon gyi mtshan ma sogs pas brgyan //
T02TD1538E:141a-40: 'jig rten mgon po snying brtse can //
T02TD1538E:141a-41: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gshegs par 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:141a-42: gnyis su med pa'i dngos grub thob //
T02TD1538E:141a-43: dkyil 'khor he ru ka yi zhing //
T02TD1538E:141a-45: byed pa som nyi med pa'o //
T02TD1538E:141a-46: phyi dang nang gi ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drang pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD1538E:141a-48: // / phyi dang nang gi sems kyis ni //
T02TD1538E:141a-50: rang 'byung gi ni me tog nyid //
T02TD1538E:141a-51: pu sogs gnas na legs par bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:141a-52: de yis gdong ni bskus nas ni //
T02TD1538E:141b-0: gang yang gzhan pa'i 'khor lor @141b gnas //
T02TD1538E:141b-1: gnyis med gnyis su med sngags kyis //
T02TD1538E:141b-2: mngon par bsngags nas byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1538E:141b-3: mkha' 'gro ma yi gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD1538E:141b-4: sgo dang sgo ru byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1538E:141b-5: brgyad brgya mchog tu bzlas pa ni //
T02TD1538E:141b-6: mnyam gzhag sngags pa nyid kyis bya //
T02TD1538E:141b-7: a'a li k'a li bzlas nas ni //
T02TD1538E:141b-8: phyi nas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1538E:141b-9: 'jigs pa'i sgra ni mang po dang //
T02TD1538E:141b-10: 'jigs pa'i lha mo'i lus bzang ba //
T02TD1538E:141b-11: khyim lnga yi ni lha mo mchog / byon par gyur nas mdun du bzhugs //
T02TD1538E:141b-12: sgrub pa po la dngos grub ni //
T02TD1538E:141b-13: rgya chen ster bar the tshom med //
T02TD1538E:141b-14: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1538E:141b-15: rtag tu de ni mchi ma 'byung //
T02TD1538E:141b-16: bdag nyid las byung zas de bzhin //
T02TD1538E:141b-17: rdo rje la ni 'gom mi byed //
T02TD1538E:141b-18: de bzhin gcer bur gyur bas mchod //
T02TD1538E:141b-19: g-yon pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyis //
T02TD1538E:141b-20: 'di de phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi rim //
T02TD1538E:141b-21: bza' dang spyad pas yang dag 'grub //
T02TD1538E:141b-24: rang gnas song nas de mnyes shing //
T02TD1538E:141b-26: rdzu 'phrul che rtogs sngags pa ni //
T02TD1538E:141b-27: he ru ka ni mchog tu skye //
T02TD1538E:141b-28: yang na mkha' spyod 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1538E:141b-29: sa spyod la sogs yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:141b-30: brtse zhing he ru kar gyur nas //
T02TD1538E:141b-32: dpal ldan sangs rgyas zhing bskor nas //
T02TD1538E:141b-33: sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod par 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:141b-34: yang na bsod nams zhan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1538E:141b-35: dkyil 'khor gnas pa ma grub na //
T02TD1538E:141b-36: sems can don la gcig tu brtson //
T02TD1538E:141b-37: bza' dang spyad pa brtsam pa'o //
T02TD1538E:141b-38: bzhad dang sgeg pa la sogs ldan //
T02TD1538E:141b-39: glu dang gar gyis dga' ba'o //
T02TD1538E:141b-40: sna tshogs sten mos dpa' bo dang //
T02TD1538E:141b-42: gar gyi bstan bcos thams cad ni //
T02TD1538E:141b-43: byed pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa //
T02TD1538E:141b-44: de ni he ru ka dpal rgya //
T02TD1538E:141b-45: dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba //
T02TD1538E:141b-46: nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg gis //
T02TD1538E:141b-47: dpa' bo lha mo legs par mchod //
T02TD1538E:141b-48: dpal ldan bde mchog yang dag langs //
T02TD1538E:141b-49: dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster //
T02TD1538E:141b-50: zhi ba'i btung bar gyur pa'i sems //
T02TD1538E:141b-51: rtag pa mchog gi go 'phang ngo //
T02TD1538E:141b-52: zhi ba'i btung ba gzhan ma ni //
T02TD1538E:141b-53: chang dang sha sogs yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:142a-1: buddha d'a ki n'i sarba bhaksham sho dha ya gu hya badzri ni h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1538E:142a-2: mngon par bsngags nas byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1538E:142a-3: yang na lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1538E:142a-4: bza' ba kun sogs rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1538E:142a-5: shes nas kha zas bza' ba blo ldan rnal 'byor pa mos pas //
T02TD1538E:142a-6: lhan cig skyes pa'i lto ba thab khung lte ba'i padma 'dab brgyad ni //
T02TD1538E:142a-7: lte bar dga' bar 'byung ba shin tu 'jigs pa'i he ru ka yi zhal //
T02TD1538E:142a-8: nges par 'dab mas dkris pa chen po lha mo'i padma thod par ni //
T02TD1538E:142a-9: de yi rjes su 'khor lo gsum dang sgo skyod rnams dang ldan //
T02TD1538E:142a-10: sna tshogs mad pa'i ro ster ba gyes pa dpal gyi bdud rtsi sogs //
T02TD1538E:142a-11: sna tshogs mchog gi sreg rdzas kyis ni phung po'i bud shing rab 'bar ba //
T02TD1538E:142a-12: skad cig gyur pa kun mkhyen me yi rang bzhin la //
T02TD1538E:142a-13: sngags pa bzang pos rtag tu 'di dag de ra ni sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1538E:142a-14: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa //
T02TD1538E:142a-15: rdo rje nang gi bdag nyid nyon //
T02TD1538E:142a-16: ji ltar sbyin sreg rab 'grub pa //
T02TD1538E:142a-17: 'bar ba chen po gzi brjid che //
T02TD1538E:142a-18: rnam par mi rtog pa ru bsreg / bza' ba btung ba gang cung zad //
T02TD1538E:142a-19: de dag thams cad mkhas pas bsreg / ji ltar bstan pa'i yam shing ni //
T02TD1538E:142a-20: gzugs phud la sogs rang bzhin dag / rnam par mi rtog pa yis bsreg / gang zhig sems ni rang bzhin kun //
T02TD1538E:142a-21: khu ba khrag dang de bzhin sha //
T02TD1538E:142a-22: bshad dang gci ba lnga pa ste //
T02TD1538E:142a-23: rnam par mi rtog pa yis bza' //
T02TD1538E:142a-24: rang bzhin med pa'i blo ldan pas //
T02TD1538E:142a-25: de bzhin nga rgyal gti mug che //
T02TD1538E:142a-26: zhe sdang 'dod chags de bzhin du //
T02TD1538E:142a-27: phrag dog ser sna phra ma ste //
T02TD1538E:142a-28: dam tshig bsten pa dri ma med //
T02TD1538E:142a-29: de nyid bzang por mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1538E:142a-30: lus kyi dkyil 'khor lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1538E:142a-31: gtor ma la sogs gang cung zad //
T02TD1538E:142a-32: lus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lor sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1538E:142a-33: mtshan mo skra grol gyur pa dang //
T02TD1538E:142a-34: gcer bus phyi rol gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1538E:142a-35: sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD1538E:142a-36: lam la gnas shing gzi brjid che //
T02TD1538E:142a-37: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bor ldan //
T02TD1538E:142a-38: gtor ma byin pas mnyes par 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:142a-39: sems can bsam pa dang mthun par //
T02TD1538E:142a-40: phyi rol gyi ni sbyin sreg bshad //
T02TD1538E:142a-41: rnal 'byor rgyud dpal las bstan pa //
T02TD1538E:142b-0: lus kyi 'khor lor sbyin sreg @142b bya ;
T02TD1538E:142b-1: / gang phyir lus kyi sangs rgyas ni //
T02TD1538E:142b-2: dam tshig des na de bsreg bya //
T02TD1538E:142b-4: dbus su sbyin sreg bya ba'o //
T02TD1538E:142b-5: sha dang bdud rtsi bza' ba ste //
T02TD1538E:142b-6: chang ni btung bar yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:142b-7: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1538E:142b-8: phung po'i bud shing sgrib pas brlan zhing g-yogs pa yang //
T02TD1538E:142b-9: ye shes me ni byed pa'i rlung gis bskul bas de //
T02TD1538E:142b-10: du ba 'byung zhing me lce 'bar ba nyid kyis bsreg / khyab cing rgyal ba de ni chos kyi dbyings su mthong //
T02TD1538E:142b-11: lus kyi sbyin sreg yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:142b-12: phyi rol sbyin sreg gis mnyes te //
T02TD1538E:142b-13: rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs bsten //
T02TD1538E:142b-14: phyi rol sbyin sreg yang dag brtsam //
T02TD1538E:142b-15: khru gang tsam gyi thab khung gyur //
T02TD1538E:142b-16: thod pa lta bus mdzes pa'o //
T02TD1538E:142b-17: lho ru kha bltas cho ga yis //
T02TD1538E:142b-18: de la kha bltas bskor bas 'grub //
T02TD1538E:142b-20: ri yi steng na legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:142b-21: padmar dgra ste de bzhin zhags //
T02TD1538E:142b-22: mdud dang kha tv'am yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:142b-23: khro bo lta bu shin tu 'jigs //
T02TD1538E:142b-24: rdo rje lte bar dgod pa dang //
T02TD1538E:142b-25: phyi rol rdo rje phreng ba bya //
T02TD1538E:142b-26: padma lta bu'i kha khyer bzang //
T02TD1538E:142b-27: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi dgang gzar dang //
T02TD1538E:142b-28: blugs gzar nyid kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:142b-29: cung zad kha la thod pa 'dra //
T02TD1538E:142b-30: dbus su khro bo'i rdo rje bri //
T02TD1538E:142b-31: a'a li k'a li legs par brjod //
T02TD1538E:142b-32: 'byung gnas la sogs rnal 'byor rig / g-yon du sbyin sreg la sogs rdzas //
T02TD1538E:142b-33: g-yon pa'i spyod pas sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1538E:142b-34: gnyis med la sogs rgyud chen las //
T02TD1538E:142b-35: mchod pa bya ba'i cho ga yis //
T02TD1538E:142b-36: me dang he ru ka dpal sogs //
T02TD1538E:142b-37: sbyin sreg byas nas yon blang ngo //
T02TD1538E:142b-38: mi dang ba lang rnga mo dang //
T02TD1538E:142b-39: ce spyang rta dang glang po yi //
T02TD1538E:142b-40: sha ni dngos grub 'dod pa des //
T02TD1538E:142b-41: rnal 'byor rig pas sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1538E:142b-42: gsang bar skra grol gcer bu dang //
T02TD1538E:142b-43: sngon du spyad cing bza' ba yis //
T02TD1538E:142b-44: dpal ldan bde mchog rnal 'byor ches //
T02TD1538E:142b-45: gtor ma'i las ni legs par brtsam //
T02TD1538E:142b-46: phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o /
T02TD1538E:142b-48: // / sngags pa rnal 'byor ma lhan cig / lho ru bltas shing lho ru ni //
T02TD1538E:142b-49: dkyil 'khor la gnas slob ma la //
T02TD1538E:142b-50: cho ga yis ni 'di skad smra //
T02TD1538E:142b-51: bu yis nges par rab 'bad pas //
T02TD1538E:142b-52: sdom pa'i mchog rnams srung bar gyis //
T02TD1538E:142b-53: dpal ldan bde mchog las mchog med //
T02TD1538E:143a-2: dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun byas te //
T02TD1538E:143a-3: yang na gsungs par gyur pa ste //
T02TD1538E:143a-4: ma la sogs pa thod par gnas //
T02TD1538E:143a-5: slob ma'i sdig pa sel ba ste //
T02TD1538E:143a-6: g-yon pa'i lag pas legs par blangs //
T02TD1538E:143a-7: yi ge bdun pa rjes su dran //
T02TD1538E:143a-8: he ru ka yi sbyor dmigs te //
T02TD1538E:143a-9: nga rgyal bcas pas legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:143a-10: phag mo dang ni 'o byed pa //
T02TD1538E:143a-11: slob ma kun gyi kha ru ni //
T02TD1538E:143a-12: nus pa 'phrog cing bdud med pa //
T02TD1538E:143a-13: blo bzang kyis [*gi] ni rim par gtor //
T02TD1538E:143a-14: dpa' bo drug sogs sngags kyis las //
T02TD1538E:143a-15: byas nas slob ma shin tu bsrung /
T02TD1538E:143a-16: mkha' 'gro'i sngags kyis bsngags pa yi //
T02TD1538E:143a-17: dar dbyangs bcing bar bya ba'o //
T02TD1538E:143a-18: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi //
T02TD1538E:143a-19: slob mas lho nas gsol ba btab //
T02TD1538E:143a-20: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa yi //
T02TD1538E:143a-21: skye bo la ni dngos grub ste //
T02TD1538E:143a-22: de nas bla ma'i lag g-yon gyis //
T02TD1538E:143a-23: rtag tu slob ma bzung nas kyang //
T02TD1538E:143a-24: lho yi sgo ru bzhag nas ni //
T02TD1538E:143a-25: po tang gi yi tshig gis dri //
T02TD1538E:143a-26: slob mas kyang ni de nas tshig / pra ti po tang gi kye khyab bdag / he ru ka yis k'a ya dri //
T02TD1538E:143a-27: de nas dpa' bos brjod par bya //
T02TD1538E:143a-28: aom shr'i he ru k'a ya bid ma he bidya r'a dza ya dh'i ma he sv'a h'a /
T02TD1538E:143a-31: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i gtso //
T02TD1538E:143a-32: bde mchog gi ni gzhir gyur pa //
T02TD1538E:143a-33: bu khyod kyis ni blang bar gyis //
T02TD1538E:143a-34: lho sgor slob mas 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1538E:143a-37: na mo na ma h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1538E:143a-39: mkha' spyod la sogs rab dbye bas //
T02TD1538E:143a-40: phyag gsum dag ni bya ba'o //
T02TD1538E:143a-41: thal mo spyi bor byas nas ni //
T02TD1538E:143a-42: yan lag kun gyis phyag bya'o //
T02TD1538E:143a-43: aom sarba b'a ri yo gi n'i bhya: p'u dzo ba stha n'a ya /
T02TD1538E:143a-44: a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi n+ya t'am d'a ki n+yee aa dhi tashthi sva m'am /
T02TD1538E:143a-45: g-yon pas thal mo sbyar nas ni //
T02TD1538E:143a-46: snying ga ru ni byas nas ni //
T02TD1538E:143a-47: yon tan kun gyi gzhir gyur pa //
T02TD1538E:143a-48: slob mas sgo kun la phyag bya //
T02TD1538E:143a-49: aom sarba b'i ra yo gi n'am p'u dza aa bhi she k'a ya a'atm'a n'am ni ry'i ta y'a mi /
T02TD1538E:143a-50: sarba ta th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi n+y'a tma l'a m'a yi aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD1538E:143a-51: g-yon pa'i thal mo 'phral ba du //
T02TD1538E:143a-52: byas par gyur nas de nas yang //
T02TD1538E:143a-53: byang gi sgo ru brten nas ni //
T02TD1538E:143a-55: aom sarba b'i ra yo gi n'i /
T02TD1538E:143b-0: @143b bhya: p'u dza pra brta n'a y'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD1538E:143b-1: sarba ta th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi n+y'a tmam khanda ro h'a yee pra brt'a ya m'am /
T02TD1538E:143b-2: sngags pas de nas phyi nas sgor //
T02TD1538E:143b-3: spyi bor thal mo byas nas ni //
T02TD1538E:143b-4: sngon du gsang sngags brjod pa yis //
T02TD1538E:143b-5: dpa' bo he ru kar phyag bya //
T02TD1538E:143b-6: aom sarba b'i ra yo gi n'i nam p'u dza karma ni a'atm'a n'am ni ry'a ta y'a me /
T02TD1538E:143b-7: sarba ta th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi n+y'a tmam r'u pi n+yee karma ku ru m'am /
T02TD1538E:143b-9: lho yi sgo ru song nas ni //
T02TD1538E:143b-10: lho ru bltas nas legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:143b-11: g-yon pas slob ma bzung nas ni //
T02TD1538E:143b-12: sdom pa'i mchog ni sbyin par bya //
T02TD1538E:143b-13: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD1538E:143b-14: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02TD1538E:143b-16: sdom pa brtan por gyur pa'o //
T02TD1538E:143b-17: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD1538E:143b-18: blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
T02TD1538E:143b-19: byang chub sems gang rdo rje ste //
T02TD1538E:143b-20: shes rab dril bu zhes bya'o //
T02TD1538E:143b-21: slob dpon khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
T02TD1538E:143b-22: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02TD1538E:143b-23: 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'o //
T02TD1538E:143b-24: sdom pa dam tshig ces su brjod //
T02TD1538E:143b-25: rin chen rigs la rtag tu ni //
T02TD1538E:143b-26: nyi ma re re dus drug tu //
T02TD1538E:143b-27: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
T02TD1538E:143b-28: sbyin pa rnam bzhi sbyin par bya //
T02TD1538E:143b-29: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02TD1538E:143b-30: dam pa'i chos ni khyod kyis gzung //
T02TD1538E:143b-32: sdom pa mchog gi go 'phang ngo //
T02TD1538E:143b-33: sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:143b-34: bdag gis brtan por so sor gzung //
T02TD1538E:143b-35: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02TD1538E:143b-36: las kyi rigs chen rtag pa'o //
T02TD1538E:143b-39: // / bu skyes so sor gnas par gyis //
T02TD1538E:143b-40: rigs kyi de nyid kun du blta //
T02TD1538E:143b-41: dpa' bo lha mo legs par byung //
T02TD1538E:143b-42: he ru ka ltar shin tu mdzes //
T02TD1538E:143b-43: gang gis bskyed pa mkha' ltar stong //
T02TD1538E:143b-45: he ru ka dpal ye shes de //
T02TD1538E:143b-46: nga yis mchog ni khyod la sbyin //
T02TD1538E:143b-47: dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la //
T02TD1538E:143b-48: khyod kyis kyang ni smra mi bya //
T02TD1538E:143b-49: gal te smras na bu khyod kyi //
T02TD1538E:143b-50: dam tshig nyams par gyur ta te //
T02TD1538E:143b-51: dpal ldan phag mo khyod nyid kyi //
T02TD1538E:143b-52: snying la yang dag zhugs pa 'di //
T02TD1538E:143b-53: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD1538E:143b-54: de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs //
T02TD1538E:144a-0: bdud rtsi lnga yi chu yi @144a * //
T02TD1538E:144a-2: / slob ma mchog la sbyin par bya //
T02TD1538E:144a-3: mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags bzlas shing //
T02TD1538E:144a-4: tshig 'di dag ni brjod par bya //
T02TD1538E:144a-5: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD1538E:144a-6: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD1538E:144a-7: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'ong //
T02TD1538E:144a-8: bdud rtsi lnga yi chu 'thung shig / aom panytsa aamri tod ka tha h'um /
T02TD1538E:144a-9: ded phan chod khyod kyi dpal phag mo nga yin gyis /
T02TD1538E:144a-10: gang nga yis smras pa de 'bad pas bya dgos so //
T02TD1538E:144a-11: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig / khyod yang nga ba ma spangs par dus byas nas //
T02TD1538E:144a-12: dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re //
T02TD1538E:144a-13: bu yis 'di dag smra bar gyis //
T02TD1538E:144a-14: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag la byin gyis rlob la /
T02TD1538E:144a-15: dpal he ru ka la sogs pa bdag la dbab tu gsol //
T02TD1538E:144a-16: gos ngan khrag ni blangs nas ni //
T02TD1538E:144a-17: bdud rtsi lnga dang gu gul dang //
T02TD1538E:144a-18: byi la'i rtug pa yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:144a-19: bdug pa byas nas bsngags nas ni //
T02TD1538E:144a-20: thod pa'i nang du gzhag par bya //
T02TD1538E:144a-21: ro bsregs me yis legs par bdug / khros shing bsgyings bcas sems dang ni //
T02TD1538E:144a-22: gnyis su med pas bsngags par bya //
T02TD1538E:144a-23: sngon du bstan pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
T02TD1538E:144a-24: go cha yan lag de bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:144a-25: slob ma'i lus la blo ldan pas //
T02TD1538E:144a-26: yang ni 'khor lo thams cad gzhug / lte ba'i pad gnas 'khor lo bzang //
T02TD1538E:144a-28: rkang pa'i 'og tu rlung gis bskyod //
T02TD1538E:144a-29: slob ma la ni dbab par blta //
T02TD1538E:144a-30: gnyis su med pa'i gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD1538E:144a-31: g-yas brkyang stan la yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:144a-32: mkhas pas sngon du bstan pa yi //
T02TD1538E:144a-33: bdug pa rnams kyis bdug par bya //
T02TD1538E:144a-34: aom tishtha ma h'a kro dha a'a be sha h'um /
T02TD1538E:144a-35: aom shr'i he ru k'a ya bid ma he ba by'ir'a dza ya dhi ma he sv'ah'a /
T02TD1538E:144a-36: zhes bya bas dpa' bo rab tu bskul la /
T02TD1538E:144a-37: de yi lag nas lag pas bzung //
T02TD1538E:144a-38: mig phye nas ni bstan par bya //
T02TD1538E:144a-39: dpal ldan phag mo da khyod kyis //
T02TD1538E:144a-40: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02TD1538E:144a-41: thams cad mig ni 'byed gyur pa //
T02TD1538E:144a-42: rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
T02TD1538E:144a-43: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra barna n'i ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1538E:144a-44: dad pa'i shugs kyis da lta ni //
T02TD1538E:144a-46: khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rigs skyes //
T02TD1538E:144a-47: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1538E:144b-0: me tog gtor ba la @144b bltas te //
T02TD1538E:144b-1: stan sogs gnas na legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:144b-2: gang du me tog ltung ba de //
T02TD1538E:144b-4: phyi rol dbab pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1538E:144b-6: bdag gi bla ma'i dbab pa'i lugs //
T02TD1538E:144b-7: bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par gyur //
T02TD1538E:144b-8: dkyil 'khor bya ba'i cho ga ni //
T02TD1538E:144b-9: cung zad bsgoms pa'i brtul zhugs can //
T02TD1538E:144b-10: byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa nyid //
T02TD1538E:144b-11: rnal 'byor ma yi lus kyis gsungs //
T02TD1538E:144b-12: lus kyi rin chen bskyod pa ni //
T02TD1538E:144b-13: skad cig gis ni rang bzhin 'phar //
T02TD1538E:144b-18: // / he ru ka dang gnyis med gnas //
T02TD1538E:144b-19: dpa' bo che la bu yis ltos //
T02TD1538E:144b-21: mchod pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:144b-22: 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid can //
T02TD1538E:144b-23: sgo skyod la sogs rnams kyis srung //
T02TD1538E:144b-24: blo gros chen po dbus gnas pa'i //
T02TD1538E:144b-25: 'khor lo bde mchog bde ba'i mchog / bla ma'i zhabs la phyag byas te //
T02TD1538E:144b-26: slob ma gus shing yid 'ong bzad //
T02TD1538E:144b-27: g-yon pa thal sbyar snying gar gzhag //
T02TD1538E:144b-28: dbang skur don du gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1538E:144b-29: he ru ka dpal dbang skur ba //
T02TD1538E:144b-30: 'gro ba skyod phyir gzi brjod can //
T02TD1538E:144b-31: rdo rje sems dpas ji ltar byin //
T02TD1538E:144b-32: de bzhin bdag la deng gsol cig / lho yi sgo ru rab zhugs nas //
T02TD1538E:144b-33: he ru ka sogs bdag sems la //
T02TD1538E:144b-34: seng ge'i stan la gnas pa yi //
T02TD1538E:144b-36: slob ma phyag rgya lnga dang ldan //
T02TD1538E:144b-37: kha tv'am ga brten legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:144b-38: steng du gdugs bzang lha mos gzung //
T02TD1538E:144b-39: da ma ru ni lag na thogs //
T02TD1538E:144b-40: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' tshogs kyis //
T02TD1538E:144b-41: bskor nas dbus su bsgyur nas ni //
T02TD1538E:144b-42: glu la sogs pa'i bkra shis kyis //
T02TD1538E:144b-43: 'bad nas mchod pa byas nas ni //
T02TD1538E:144b-44: thog mar gnas pa'i dngos grub don //
T02TD1538E:144b-45: blangs nas sngags dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:144b-46: gsang sngags rig pas dpa' bo dang //
T02TD1538E:144b-48: de nas dgyes pas langs nas ni //
T02TD1538E:144b-49: dpa' bo he ru ka dpal sogs //
T02TD1538E:144b-50: dbang bskur rin chen chen po yi //
T02TD1538E:144b-51: gnyis med chu ni ster bar byed //
T02TD1538E:144b-52: he ru ka yi bka' thob nas //
T02TD1538E:145a-2: dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya //
T02TD1538E:145a-3: gzhan dag tu ni bzhad gad 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:145a-4: nus pa med gyur rnal 'byor ma'i //
T02TD1538E:145a-6: slob ma'i lus la bkang nas ni //
T02TD1538E:145a-7: dbang bskur sbyin pa bsam par bya //
T02TD1538E:145a-8: dbang bskur ba ni bcu bzhi ni //
T02TD1538E:145a-9: sngon gyi rnal 'byor pas gang bstan //
T02TD1538E:145a-10: rgyas pa dgos pa med pa'i phyir //
T02TD1538E:145a-11: thams cad bdag gis ma bris so //
T02TD1538E:145a-13: rdzogs pa rnal 'byor ma yi rim //
T02TD1538E:145a-14: bdag gis de bgros rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD1538E:145a-15: rim pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD1538E:145a-16: yungs kar 'od zer du ni bstan //
T02TD1538E:145a-17: gang phyir des ni legs bskul ba'o //
T02TD1538E:145a-18: sangs rgyas rol pa 'di lta bu //
T02TD1538E:145a-19: bdag nyid chen po phab nas ni //
T02TD1538E:145a-20: sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin te //
T02TD1538E:145a-21: brtan g-yo kun gyi bdag nyid do //
T02TD1538E:145a-22: des na thog mar dbang bskur lnga //
T02TD1538E:145a-23: bde zhing 'byor pa sbyin par bya //
T02TD1538E:145a-24: 'gro ba rgyu dang mi rgyu ba //
T02TD1538E:145a-25: dbang bskur skad cig gis rdzogs so //
T02TD1538E:145a-26: gang phyir 'gro dbang ngo bo ste //
T02TD1538E:145a-27: de phyir dbang bskur sbyin mi bya //
T02TD1538E:145a-28: mi shes de nyid mi rig ste //
T02TD1538E:145a-29: de yang de nyid rang bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:145a-30: rdzogs pa'i ye shes bskyed pa ni //
T02TD1538E:145a-31: yang ni smra bar bya ba'o //
T02TD1538E:145a-32: thog mar chu ni sbyin par bya //
T02TD1538E:145a-33: mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags kyis bsngags //
T02TD1538E:145a-34: phyi nas dbu rgyan sbyin par bya //
T02TD1538E:145a-35: sangs rgyas kun gyi rim pas so //
T02TD1538E:145a-36: ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa //
T02TD1538E:145a-37: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nam //
T02TD1538E:145a-38: de bzhin srog dang rtsa rang bzhin //
T02TD1538E:145a-39: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan te //
T02TD1538E:145a-40: rdo rje gtsug gi nor bu thod //
T02TD1538E:145a-41: sna tshogs kun gyi bla ma dang //
T02TD1538E:145a-42: thams cad kun gyi slob dpon phyir //
T02TD1538E:145a-43: ma lus lus pa med 'grub cing //
T02TD1538E:145a-44: rgyal srid thams cad rab tu 'grub //
T02TD1538E:145a-45: sna tshogs rang bzhin padma gcig / sna tshogs kyis mdzes de bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:145a-46: sangs rgyas padma'i dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1538E:145a-47: slob ma thams cad dbang bskur te //
T02TD1538E:145a-48: gsang sngags 'di nyid brjod par bya //
T02TD1538E:145a-49: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra barna n'i ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1538E:145a-50: snying gar gnas pa'i thugs rdo rje //
T02TD1538E:145a-51: de rjes kyang ni dbang bskur te //
T02TD1538E:145a-52: bdag nyid he ru ka rdor che //
T02TD1538E:145a-54: dpa' bo rdo rje dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1538E:145a-55: de ring khyod la dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1538E:145b-0: dpa' @145b bo kun du rab 'grub phyir //
T02TD1538E:145b-1: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02TD1538E:145b-2: rdo rje dril bu'i lag pa yis //
T02TD1538E:145b-3: he ru ka yi sbyor bas 'khyud //
T02TD1538E:145b-4: de yi g-yas pa'i brla steng du //
T02TD1538E:145b-5: g-yon pa'i byin pas mnan pa'o //
T02TD1538E:145b-6: aom he ru ka aa dhi pa ti tv'am aa bhi shinyts'a mi tishtha b'i ra sa ma ya stam /
T02TD1538E:145b-8: aom shr'i he ru ka aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi shr'i he ri ka n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02TD1538E:145b-9: yang na rnal 'byor ma yi gtso //
T02TD1538E:145b-10: lha mo rgyud las thams cad du //
T02TD1538E:145b-11: de ming rnal 'byor ma lung bstan //
T02TD1538E:145b-12: de nyid rig pas sbyin par bya //
T02TD1538E:145b-13: aom shr'i he ru ka aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shnyts'i mi shr'i he ru ka n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02TD1538E:145b-14: gdod nas chos la ming med de //
T02TD1538E:145b-15: kun rdzob tu ni ming du grags //
T02TD1538E:145b-16: dam pa'i don gyi rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1538E:145b-17: ming med ming dang ldan pa'ang med //
T02TD1538E:145b-18: shin tu rnam dag chu yin te //
T02TD1538E:145b-19: mnyam pa nyid ni dbu rgyan gyur //
T02TD1538E:145b-20: rdo rje rtag tu so sor rtog / bdag po dam tshig las byung ba'o //
T02TD1538E:145b-21: brtul zhugs lung bstan dbugs dbyung ba //
T02TD1538E:145b-22: dpal ldan rnam snang gtso bo'o //
T02TD1538E:145b-23: dbang bskur 'di dag yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:145b-24: bum pa'i dbang du rnam par bstan //
T02TD1538E:145b-25: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1538E:145b-26: he ru ka yi phyag na gnas //
T02TD1538E:145b-27: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD1538E:145b-28: he ru ka yi brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD1538E:145b-29: aom sarba b'i ra tvam siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha stvam dha ra y'a mi hi hi hi hi h'um /
T02TD1538E:145b-30: rdo rje brtul zhugs de byin te //
T02TD1538E:145b-31: de yi rdo rje sbyor bas bzung //
T02TD1538E:145b-32: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1538E:145b-33: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD1538E:145b-34: mkha' 'gro dra ba kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1538E:145b-35: rdo rje bsnyems pa bdag po'i bdag / dril bu de nyid gzugs kyis ni //
T02TD1538E:145b-36: rnam par mkhas pas de la sbyin //
T02TD1538E:145b-38: shes rab dbyangs ni rjes su dran //
T02TD1538E:145b-39: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD1538E:145b-40: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba zhes //
T02TD1538E:145b-41: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis dngos byas pa //
T02TD1538E:145b-42: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis //
T02TD1538E:145b-43: dam pa'i srid pa byed pa'o //
T02TD1538E:145b-44: dpa' bo chen po chen po sbyin //
T02TD1538E:145b-45: kha tv'am ga mchog gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1538E:145b-46: he ru ka dpal sku yan lag / brtan g-yo'i bdag nyid kun yan lag / bu yis rtag tu dam du ni //
T02TD1538E:145b-47: rab tu 'bad pas gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1538E:146a-2: dbu rgyan mchog tu gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1538E:146a-3: gar dang glu dang de bzhin phreng //
T02TD1538E:146a-4: dri dang bdug pa de bzhin te //
T02TD1538E:146a-5: 'di dag lhan cig skyes par grags //
T02TD1538E:146a-7: me long ye shes me long dang //
T02TD1538E:146a-8: dung ni de bzhin bde ba'o //
T02TD1538E:146a-9: mig sman bde ba ces byar gsungs //
T02TD1538E:146a-10: sems can kun la rab tu bskur //
T02TD1538E:146a-11: phyi rol gyi ni bum pa 'di //
T02TD1538E:146a-12: slob dpon thams cad bzhed pa'o //
T02TD1538E:146a-13: bum pa gzhan ni lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1538E:146a-14: lus la rtag tu gnas pa'o //
T02TD1538E:146a-15: ka ni byang chub ces su gsungs //
T02TD1538E:146a-16: 'bar ba ldan par gang zhig gyur //
T02TD1538E:146a-17: de ni bum pa zhes su bstan //
T02TD1538E:146a-18: sems can kun la legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:146a-19: bum pas legs par dbang bskur bar //
T02TD1538E:146a-20: sems can thams cad som nyi med //
T02TD1538E:146a-21: bla ma'i man ngag rim med pas //
T02TD1538E:146a-22: bum pa shes par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1538E:146a-23: de bar nus pa 'khor lo dbus su kun gyi snying po ni //
T02TD1538E:146a-24: bla ma dang ni rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i 'khor lo la gus kyis //
T02TD1538E:146a-25: skye bo ngan pa'i tshogs dang gdug pa'i sems sogs spongs //
T02TD1538E:146a-26: lhan cig skyes par 'byung ba'i sems dang he ru ka yi rdo rje khyod nyid do //
T02TD1538E:146a-27: bum pas dbang bskur slob ma yis //
T02TD1538E:146a-28: nam mkha' lding gi tshul gnas la //
T02TD1538E:146a-29: snyan pa'i tshig gis smra bar bya //
T02TD1538E:146a-30: bgrod dang mi bgrod sogs mtshan nyid //
T02TD1538E:146a-31: zhi dang rgyas sogs gang cung zad //
T02TD1538E:146a-32: ral gri mig sman rkang mgyogs dang //
T02TD1538E:146a-33: rnal 'byor ma yi sgrub pa gang //
T02TD1538E:146a-34: las de thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1538E:146a-35: nang par sngar langs sems dag nyid //
T02TD1538E:146a-36: thams cad lus la byas nas ni //
T02TD1538E:146a-37: bgrod dang mi bgrod gang cung zad //
T02TD1538E:146a-38: kun la sbyar bas bya ba'o //
T02TD1538E:146a-39: lus kyi sdug bsngal yongs spangs nas //
T02TD1538E:146a-40: dam tshig dang ni sdom pa bzung //
T02TD1538E:146a-41: bde mchog gis ni byin pa bzhin //
T02TD1538E:146a-42: bu yis rtag tu sbyin par bya //
T02TD1538E:146a-43: rgyal dang stong dang de bzhin gang //
T02TD1538E:146a-44: phyogs ni gnyi ga la de bzhin //
T02TD1538E:146a-45: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo mchod //
T02TD1538E:146a-46: rang nyid kyis ni 'bad nas mchod //
T02TD1538E:146a-47: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug tshogs //
T02TD1538E:146a-48: chad la dga' bas rol bar bya //
T02TD1538E:146a-50: bu khyod kyis ni rtag tu rol //
T02TD1538E:146a-51: dpa' bo phyogs la rab 'bad pas //
T02TD1538E:146a-52: lag pa'i brda ni sbyin par bya //
T02TD1538E:146b-0: @146b dpa' bo dam tshig shes nas ni //
T02TD1538E:146b-1: de dang lhan cig bza' zhing spyad //
T02TD1538E:146b-2: theg pa dman la dga' ba ni //
T02TD1538E:146b-3: bzang pos nam yang mi bya'o //
T02TD1538E:146b-4: 'khor ba dag kyang mi gtong zhing //
T02TD1538E:146b-5: mya ngan 'das rtag dga' mi bya //
T02TD1538E:146b-6: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i tshogs //
T02TD1538E:146b-7: gnod pa'i bsam pa mi bya'o //
T02TD1538E:146b-8: dpa' bo spyod pa'i brtul zhugs blta //
T02TD1538E:146b-9: rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu bzlas //
T02TD1538E:146b-10: bde mchog mnyes pas dngos grub tu //
T02TD1538E:146b-12: de nas 'bad pas skyong ba ni //
T02TD1538E:146b-13: dam tshig grub pa the tshom med //
