T02TD1538E:146b-14: gsang ba'i dam tshig bskyang ba yis //
T02TD1538E:146b-16: bskal pa mtha' yas brgya yis kyang //
T02TD1538E:146b-17: nyams par gyur pas mi 'grub po //
T02TD1538E:146b-18: bla ma'i zhabs kyi padma la //
T02TD1538E:146b-19: dngos po kun gyis phyag byas nas //
T02TD1538E:146b-20: khyab bdag khyod kyis ji ltar bstan //
T02TD1538E:146b-21: kun mkhyen bdag ni bgyi bar 'tshal //
T02TD1538E:146b-22: sdom pa bskyang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1538E:146b-23: lhan cig skyes pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1538E:146b-24: mi bya ba ni ci yang med //
T02TD1538E:146b-25: tshangs par spyod pas brtags nas ni //
T02TD1538E:146b-26: 'dod pa lnga la spyad par bya //
T02TD1538E:146b-27: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas //
T02TD1538E:146b-28: ji ltar 'dod pa yid kyis bsten //
T02TD1538E:146b-29: he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che //
T02TD1538E:146b-30: bsams nas thams cad rab tu brtag / bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02TD1538E:146b-31: yan lag thams cad mkha' 'gro'i gnas //
T02TD1538E:146b-32: de bas kun nas rab 'bad bya //
T02TD1538E:146b-33: bdag nyid he ru ka mchod do //
T02TD1538E:146b-34: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02TD1538E:146b-35: khams gsum na ni sdig gzhan med //
T02TD1538E:146b-36: de bas chags dang chags bral bar //
T02TD1538E:146b-37: khyod kyis gzung bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1538E:146b-38: dam tshig bsrung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1538E:146b-39: g-yas pas chos gos bzung nas ni //
T02TD1538E:146b-40: g-yon pas mchog sbyin legs gnas dpa' bo yis //
T02TD1538E:146b-41: nam mkha' lding ltang gnas pa'i slob ma dngos po kun byas te //
T02TD1538E:146b-42: 'di ltar nga yis lung bstan khyod //
T02TD1538E:146b-43: he ru ka dpal de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1538E:146b-44: srid pa mchog tu dag pa'i phyir //
T02TD1538E:146b-46: shr'i he ru ka ni rma nata th'a ga ta siddhi sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva /
T02TD1538E:146b-47: don yong grub pa'i phyag rgya chen por rnam par gnas pa'i thabs 'dis /
T02TD1538E:146b-48: mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas rgyal ba rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu lung bstan pa ste de he ru kar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1538E:147a-2: khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid che //
T02TD1538E:147a-3: rgyal po'i bdag por brtan pa dang //
T02TD1538E:147a-4: di ring bdung las rnam rgyal zhing //
T02TD1538E:147a-5: grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin //
T02TD1538E:147a-6: dbang 'di bskur ba tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1538E:147a-7: deng ni sangs rgyas nyid du ni //
T02TD1538E:147a-8: thob par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02TD1538E:147a-9: chu dang dbu rgyan rgyu mthun te //
T02TD1538E:147a-10: rdo rje bdag pos mtshon pa smin //
T02TD1538E:147a-11: rdzogs sangs rgyas dbang skyes bu ste //
T02TD1538E:147a-12: gsang bar sbyor ba dri ma med //
T02TD1538E:147a-13: ma dang bu mo sring mo dang //
T02TD1538E:147a-14: tsha mo nyid de pho nya mo //
T02TD1538E:147a-15: gtum mo dang ni gar mkhan nam //
T02TD1538E:147a-16: gzhan ma la yang sems sbyin te //
T02TD1538E:147a-17: de rnams nang nas me tog ldan //
T02TD1538E:147a-18: sngags pa bzang pos gzung byas te //
T02TD1538E:147a-19: dbang skur ba la spro ba che //
T02TD1538E:147a-20: rgyud kyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:147a-21: dpal ldan me tog sha lnga dang //
T02TD1538E:147a-22: padmar gnas byas blo bzang bas //
T02TD1538E:147a-24: rgyud bsrungs bsrung bar the tshom med //
T02TD1538E:147a-25: phyag rgya drug dang thal bar ldan zhing gos dang bral ba skra grol phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1538E:147a-26: phyag rgya g-yon na kha tv'am ga ste g-yas na da ma ru ni dri med dkrol ba yi //
T02TD1538E:147a-27: mdun gyi phyogs su blangs nas brla g-yon dbus su slob ma mkha' lding kha byas te //
T02TD1538E:147a-28: bza' ba legs gnas rab mchog bla ma mchog gis zla ba'i 'dod pa bya //
T02TD1538E:147a-29: rnal 'byor ba yis spros par gyur pa gang zhig dri med de ni lce yis rab blangs nas //
T02TD1538E:147a-30: de nas de yi thod par rab tu rgyas pa'i zhal gyis slob ma la ni gsang ba sbyin //
T02TD1538E:147a-31: padma la gnas mchog tu dga' bar 'byung zhing snying por gyur pa khyod kyis lce yis long //
T02TD1538E:147a-32: de nas lag nas bzung ste cho ga bzhin du skyon med rnal 'byor ma ni de la sbyin //
T02TD1538E:147a-33: lha mo 'di ni dngos grub ster //
T02TD1538E:147a-34: khams lnga bcud kyi bdag nyid can //
T02TD1538E:147a-35: he ru ka bdag sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1538E:147a-36: bde la legs par myang bar gyis //
T02TD1538E:147a-37: bu kye mdun du dga' bas mtsho skyes mchog ni dga' bas brtan par 'khyud //
T02TD1538E:147a-38: tshig med brjod du med pa gang zhig legs pa'i mthu ni bde mchog rang bzhin snying po'o //
T02TD1538E:147a-39: gzhan pa thams cad ji ltar bstan pa bde ba skyes pas dga' ba'i ngo bo la sogs de //
T02TD1538E:147a-40: shes par byas nas phyis ni ji ltar 'dod pa bya zhing nyin dang mtshan du de nyid rin chen bsgom //
T02TD1538E:147b-0: lha mo'i mtshan @147b nyid mngon du bstan pas rdo rje'i dbyangs kyis smra bar bya //
T02TD1538E:147b-1: dpa' bo khyod ni ci la spro //
T02TD1538E:147b-2: padma las byung bza' ba dang //
T02TD1538E:147b-3: dga' ba bzhi po gang yin dang //
T02TD1538E:147b-4: de yang mi phyed legs pa'i blo //
T02TD1538E:147b-5: nus sam he ru ka yis smros //
T02TD1538E:147b-6: slob mas kyang ni de nas smra //
T02TD1538E:147b-7: rtag tu bdag gis byed par nus //
T02TD1538E:147b-8: padma rgyas pa mgu ba yis //
T02TD1538E:147b-9: dag pa'i sems la smra bar bya //
T02TD1538E:147b-10: padma rji ltar bya bar gyis //
T02TD1538E:147b-11: bde mchog mnyes pa la sogs pa //
T02TD1538E:147b-12: 'jigs dang ngo tsha rtag tu thong //
T02TD1538E:147b-13: bde ba'i mchog la rol bar gyis //
T02TD1538E:147b-14: slob dpon gyis ni ji ltar bstan //
T02TD1538E:147b-15: blo bzang gis ni de kun ni //
T02TD1538E:147b-16: sangs rgyas bzhi yi stan la gnas //
T02TD1538E:147b-17: rdo rje padma legs par gnas //
T02TD1538E:147b-18: dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD1538E:147b-19: rim pa nyid kyis rjes su spyad //
T02TD1538E:147b-21: bla ma rnal 'byor ma phyag bya //
T02TD1538E:147b-22: rdo rje snying po dben par mnyam pa'i ro la rab tu dga' bas he ru ka yis bya //
T02TD1538E:147b-23: lha mo'i tshogs ni dpa' bo dang bcas mang po'i ro dang bcud ni khro dang sgyur las rnam par grol //
T02TD1538E:147b-24: padma la gnas sbyong ba'i sems ni mchog tu dga' bar 'byung ba zla ba'i 'od rang bzhin //
T02TD1538E:147b-25: gcig tu rol ba la chags snying po lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02TD1538E:147b-26: dga' ba dang bcas dpa' bo mgon pos nges par bzhi ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs //
T02TD1538E:147b-27: de ni kun mkhyen rang bzhin sa gsum dang bcas bde mchog snying po'o //
T02TD1538E:147b-28: lhag ma'i brtul zhugs la sogs sbyin zhing bde mchog tu spas gang yin sems ni bde bar bya //
T02TD1538E:147b-29: rnal 'byor ma yis gsang ba'i mtshan nyid nges par rgyud kyi snying pos nges par brdar bstan bya //
T02TD1538E:147b-30: rnal 'byor sems kyi mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD1538E:147b-31: bde mchog gzhi las ma shes na //
T02TD1538E:147b-32: rnal 'byor ma tshogs ci yi don //
T02TD1538E:147b-33: sems can la bstan ci yi don //
T02TD1538E:147b-34: don 'di dag dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:147b-35: dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD1538E:147b-36: dpal ldan bde mchog rgyud las ni //
T02TD1538E:147b-37: ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin gsungs //
T02TD1538E:147b-38: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa //
T02TD1538E:147b-39: bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste //
T02TD1538E:147b-40: gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang yin no //
T02TD1538E:147b-41: shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste //
T02TD1538E:147b-42: bzhi pa de nas yang de bzhin //
T02TD1538E:148a-1: ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud las mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid gcig pa'i rang bzhin ni //
T02TD1538E:148a-2: legs par bsngags pa'i dngos grub gsungs pa lhan cig skyes mi gnas //
T02TD1538E:148a-3: dpal ldan bde mchog rgyud du thog mar lhan cig skyes pa'i sems ni rnam par bkod //
T02TD1538E:148a-4: blo dang ldan pas mngon du brda yis bstan pas go bar bya //
T02TD1538E:148a-5: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bar 'khor bar thams cad rnal 'byor ba ni rtag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:148a-6: de nyid du ni sngags dang phyag rgya lhan cig skyes par chog tha dad gsungs //
T02TD1538E:148a-7: lhan cig skyes pa he ru kar brjod pa'i //
T02TD1538E:148a-8: dga' ba bstan pa mi shes ni //
T02TD1538E:148a-9: de ni bde mchog phyi rol 'khor //
T02TD1538E:148a-10: de ni dngos grub shin tu ring //
T02TD1538E:148a-11: rtag pa'i dus su bde mchog gang //
T02TD1538E:148a-12: 'dus pa zhes byar des gsungs so //
T02TD1538E:148a-13: 'dus pa dang ni bde mchog dag / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar gnas //
T02TD1538E:148a-15: 'khor lo bde mchog de las byung //
T02TD1538E:148a-16: 'dus pa bde mchog ces bya ste //
T02TD1538E:148a-17: de kun he ru ka ru brjod //
T02TD1538E:148a-18: gang zhig bde mchog lhan cig skyes pa thog med sangs rgyas te //
T02TD1538E:148a-19: rang rig chogs rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs gzugs //
T02TD1538E:148a-20: rdo rje padmar 'byor ba rgyu las ma skyes dpal ldan 'di ni he ru ka bcas mgon par gyur ;
T02TD1538E:148a-21: / yon tan kun gnas rgyud las ni //
T02TD1538E:148a-22: 'di yi don ni legs par gsungs //
T02TD1538E:148a-23: he ru ka dpal legs sbyor ba //
T02TD1538E:148a-24: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa po //
T02TD1538E:148a-25: pha rol yan lag ces grags pa //
T02TD1538E:148a-26: gang yin slob ma dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1538E:148a-27: de nyid lhan cig skyes yan lag / ces pa rnal 'byor ma lus grags //
T02TD1538E:148a-28: lhan cig skyes ma gzugs can ma //
T02TD1538E:148a-29: yan lag phyag rgya 'di spangs nas //
T02TD1538E:148a-30: gang zhig yang dag rig 'dod pa //
T02TD1538E:148a-31: gzhan du sdug bsngal skal ba can //
T02TD1538E:148a-32: ji ltar chags pa'i cho ga yin //
T02TD1538E:148a-33: bde mchog las ni sems can 'dzin //
T02TD1538E:148a-34: lhan cig skyes dga' stong pa nyid//
T02TD1538E:148a-35: 'khor ba na ni mchog yin no //
T02TD1538E:148a-37: rdo rje bdag po thams cad kyis //
T02TD1538E:148a-38: 'dod chags de nyid don bsam zhing //
T02TD1538E:148a-39: 'dod chags las skyes byang chub bya //
T02TD1538E:148a-40: sems can kun la phan pa yi //
T02TD1538E:148a-41: sngags pas khong du chud don 'di //
T02TD1538E:148a-42: sku dang gsung dang thugs su 'dod //
T02TD1538E:148b-0: de kun rtogs @148b pa'i blo yis ni //
T02TD1538E:148b-1: cho ga yis ni las bya'o //
T02TD1538E:148b-2: grub pa'i dam tshig sdom pa ni //
T02TD1538E:148b-3: 'di ni rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1538E:148b-4: sangs rgyas kun gyis legs par gsungs //
T02TD1538E:148b-7: 'bras bu 'byung ba mang po rgyas pa ni //
T02TD1538E:148b-8: gsang sngags smra bas bstan pa ni //
T02TD1538E:148b-9: sems kyi sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis //
T02TD1538E:148b-10: sems las rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byung //
T02TD1538E:148b-12: byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu gang //
T02TD1538E:148b-13: de ni sangs rgyas ye shes mchog / rdo rje he ru ka 'di mngon du 'gyur //
T02TD1538E:148b-14: chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yi //
T02TD1538E:148b-15: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams gzugs //
T02TD1538E:148b-16: rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gis sems //
T02TD1538E:148b-17: lhan cig skyes byas mnyes nas ni //
T02TD1538E:148b-18: gsang sngags zlos la mchog tu brtson //
T02TD1538E:148b-19: rdul tshon lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1538E:148b-20: legs mchod nas ni gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1538E:148b-21: rdul chon bag tsam don byin nas //
T02TD1538E:148b-22: chu bo chen po sogs par 'dor //
T02TD1538E:148b-23: de nas dpa' bo lha mo rnams //
T02TD1538E:148b-24: mtshan mo phyed nas mkhas pa yis //
T02TD1538E:148b-25: spyad dang bza' ba sngon byas te //
T02TD1538E:148b-26: rgyud nyid kyis ni mchod pa bya //
T02TD1538E:148b-27: dkyil 'khor sa yi gnas su ni //
T02TD1538E:148b-28: 'ongs par gyur nas bla ma mchod //
T02TD1538E:148b-29: phyi dang nang du yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:148b-30: 'dod pa lnga la nye bar spyod //
T02TD1538E:148b-31: he ru ji bzhin lha mo bzhin //
T02TD1538E:148b-32: bla ma yang ni de bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:148b-33: he ru lha mo bla ma la //
T02TD1538E:148b-35: de nas bla ma la dbul ba //
T02TD1538E:148b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa gsungs pa'i yon //
T02TD1538E:148b-37: gser ni brgya stong dbul ba dang //
T02TD1538E:148b-38: rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
T02TD1538E:148b-39: ras ni zung gyur brgya nyid dang //
T02TD1538E:148b-41: rna rgyan dang ni lag rgyan dang //
T02TD1538E:148b-42: mgul rgyan sor gdub dam pa dang //
T02TD1538E:148b-43: gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs //
T02TD1538E:148b-44: rang gi chung ma bu mo dang //
T02TD1538E:148b-45: bran dang bran mo sring mo rnams //
T02TD1538E:148b-46: phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya //
T02TD1538E:148b-47: dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD1538E:148b-48: blo dang ldan pas bla mar rab dbul bya //
T02TD1538E:148b-49: deng nas brtsams te bdag bran du //
T02TD1538E:148b-50: khyod la bdag ni phul ba lags //
T02TD1538E:148b-51: de ltar cho ga de byas nas //
T02TD1538E:148b-52: sgrub pa po yis shin tu nges //
T02TD1538E:148b-53: de nas de dang de yi ni //
T02TD1538E:148b-55: d'a ki n'i dang l'a ma dang //
T02TD1538E:149a-0: @149a * // khanda ro h'a r'u pi ni //
T02TD1538E:149a-2: mkha' 'gro ma dang sgrub por bcas //
T02TD1538E:149a-3: thams cad de yi bran bzhin du //
T02TD1538E:149a-4: sgrub pa po ni so ma nyi med //
T02TD1538E:149a-5: sbyor ba grub par gyur pa de'i //
T02TD1538E:149a-6: 'jig rten gsum gyis mi bzlogs so //
T02TD1538E:149a-7: slob dpon lus su gnas nas ni ;
T02TD1538E:149a-8: /'bad pa yis ni mchod pa len //
T02TD1538E:149a-9: 'di don bdag gis rab tu bstan //
T02TD1538E:149a-10: bla ma la ni mchod pa bya //
T02TD1538E:149a-11: he ru ka sogs bde mchog la //
T02TD1538E:149a-12: dngos po kun gyis legs mchod pa //
T02TD1538E:149a-13: rdzogs par gyur nas mkhas pa yis //
T02TD1538E:149a-14: de yi 'og tu spyod pa bya //
T02TD1538E:149a-18: // / yang na yid ni mngon dga'i gnas su 'khor lo'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan pa yi //
T02TD1538E:149a-19: dbang bskur don du yid 'ong ba yi 'khor lor cho ga thams cad byas //
T02TD1538E:149a-20: sngon du bstan pa'i rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sngags pas zas bzang po yi rgyan dang cho ga ni //
T02TD1538E:149a-21: sngon du bstan pa'i de 'dra'i slob ma la ni dbang bskur sbyin //
T02TD1538E:149a-22: gnas der rnal 'byor ba ni dang po'i dpa' bo dang ni dgus dang g-yon par ldan //
T02TD1538E:149a-23: g-yon pa'i sbyong ba'i cho gas shin tu mdzes pa thams cad rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD1538E:149a-24: shin tu rgyud du spas pa'i dga' ba bzhi yi cho ga legs par bstan //
T02TD1538E:149a-25: snying rje'i stobs ni lhan cig skyes par legs gnas bshad par gyis //
T02TD1538E:149a-26: padma'i nang na mchog gi sna yi rtse mo ru //
T02TD1538E:149a-27: rdo rje las byung 'o ma rgya mtsho gzugs ni yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun rang bzhin no //
T02TD1538E:149a-28: dpal ldan bde mchog rig pa rtag tu 'bab //
T02TD1538E:149a-29: gtor ma'i cho ga bsrung 'khor lo //
T02TD1538E:149a-30: kha sbyor grol ba bzang po dang //
T02TD1538E:149a-31: sngags btu ba dang de bzhin bsrung //
T02TD1538E:149a-32: spobs pa dkyil 'khor sgrub thabs te //
T02TD1538E:149a-33: de dag thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:149a-34: slob dpon des ni bstan par bya //
T02TD1538E:149a-35: de yi lag tu 'ongs pa'i dpal //
T02TD1538E:149a-36: 'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba'o //
T02TD1538E:149a-37: dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud du bden spas gyur pa'i dbang bskur shes //
T02TD1538E:149a-38: slob ma la ni bla ma des ni rgyud du de bzhin gsungs //
T02TD1538E:149a-39: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1538E:149a-40: legs par rab gnas cho ga 'di //
T02TD1538E:149a-41: gdod nas dag pa skyon med pa'i //
T02TD1538E:149a-42: dkyil 'khor kun dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:149a-43: rnam pa kun gyis legs par dkris //
T02TD1538E:149b-0: @149b gang phyir 'gro ba sems las byung //
T02TD1538E:149b-1: lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1538E:149b-2: de yi phyir na gnas kun du //
T02TD1538E:149b-3: blo bzang gis ni rab gnas kyis //
T02TD1538E:149b-4: lugs ma dang ni glegs bam ni //

T02TD1538E:149b-6: 'jig rten kun rdzob la brten nas //
T02TD1538E:149b-7: mkhas pa yis ni rab gnas bya //

T02TD1538E:149b-9: de ni bgrod nas sngags pa bzang pos rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus bya //

T02TD1538E:149b-11: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1538E:149b-12: dpa' bo'i srung ba yang dag ldan //

T02TD1538E:149b-14: a'a li k'a li legs brjod nas //
T02TD1538E:149b-15: lha rnams lhag par gnas par bya //
T02TD1538E:149b-16: lugs ma glegs bam la sogs rnams //

T02TD1538E:149b-25: aam aa: ka kha ga gha nga /
T02TD1538E:149b-31: sha sha sa ha ksha: / rnam rgyal bum pa bzlas pa yis //
T02TD1538E:149b-32: mkhas pas lha yi khrus bya'o //

T02TD1538E:149b-34: dngos grub rgyur ni dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1538E:149b-35: rnal 'byor chung ngu rdo rje sems //
T02TD1538E:149b-36: de lta bur ni mtshan nyid gyur //

T02TD1538E:149b-39: 'das pa bar ma'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1538E:149b-40: rten la bar ma'i cho ga bya //
T02TD1538E:149b-41: rab gnas la sogs gang yin kun //
T02TD1538E:149b-42: gang bstan pa ni de bzhin gsungs //
T02TD1538E:149b-43: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ldan bdag / dpa' bo'i yid ni mi g-yo ba'o //
T02TD1538E:149b-44: chen po'i yon tan dang ldan pas //
T02TD1538E:149b-45: sems tsam nyid du kun la spyad //
T02TD1538E:149b-46: skad cig gis ni thams cad nyid //
T02TD1538E:149b-47: rab tu gnas par nges par gyur //
T02TD1538E:149b-48: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing //
T02TD1538E:149b-49: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags //
T02TD1538E:149b-50: chen po yang ni chen po yi //
T02TD1538E:149b-51: rnal 'byor gnyis med mtshan nyid do //

T02TD1538E:149b-57: sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mchod //
T02TD1538E:150a-2: bzhad dang sreg pa la sogs ldan //

T02TD1538E:150a-4: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ldan //

T02TD1538E:150a-19: zhi la mtha' du sv'a h'a bri //
T02TD1538E:150a-20: rgyas pa la ni phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD1538E:150a-21: dbang la ho: dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:150a-22: bsad la h'um phat sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1538E:150a-23: he ru ka sbyor mi shes na //
T02TD1538E:150a-24: sems can don la brtson par gnas //
T02TD1538E:150a-25: dub cing ngal ba de rnams kyi //
T02TD1538E:150a-26: sems can don du mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1538E:150a-27: sgrub thabs gtor ma sbyin sreg dang //
T02TD1538E:150a-28: rab gnas dkyil 'khor de bzhin te //
T02TD1538E:150a-29: 'di dag thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02TD1538E:150a-30: he ru ka dpal lus mtshan nyid //
T02TD1538E:150a-31: dpal ldan rin chen ri gnas te //
T02TD1538E:150a-32: sems can kun gyi don gyi rgyur //
T02TD1538E:150a-33: slob dpon dbu ba blo ldan pas //
T02TD1538E:150a-35: 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so//
